101000101.name: Unyielding Newbie: Before
101000101.desc:
Aether Gazer——the group that fights against the so-called "Visbanes" that are born in Gaea's Source Layer; those who protect humanity from the shadows... The newly appointed Administrator faced one hell of a first task.
The Administrator and the Rookie Squad set out on their first investigation mission to figure out what was causing the Quake in a Line 3 subway station in Core City.

101000102.name: Unyielding Newbie: After
101000102.desc:
After beating back the Formisanes, and just as Zenkibo flashed a show-off pose at Verthandi, a frightening Behemoth Visbane appeared.
The Behemoth escaped from a fissure in the Source Layer. For the inexperienced Overture Squad, chasing it down was risky... but there was no way they were just going to let the culprit get away. And thus, the Administrator decided to entrust the mission to the squad.

101000201.name: Chase! Behemoth!
101000201.desc: The Behemoth escaped from a fissure in the Source Layer. For the inexperienced Overture Squad, chasing it down was risky... but there was no way they were just going to let the culprit get away. And thus, the Administrator decided to entrust the mission to the squad.

101000301.name: Reliable Seniors: Before
101000301.desc: With the help of Mimir, the crew locked in on the Behemoth's position. It seemed that Mimir was a bit upset that he had to work on the weekend... but everyone said he's always like that.

101000302.name: Reliable Seniors: After
101000302.desc: With the help of Mimir, the crew locked in on the Behemoth's position. It seemed that Mimir was a bit upset that he had to work on the weekend... but everyone said he's always like that.

101000502.name: The Existence of Modifiers: After
101000502.desc:
After a few bumps and scares, the first mission is completed without anyone getting hurt.
Should the Modifiers be treated with human emotions, or should they be considered as a coincidence that their programs are infused with human feelings?
After the battle, Shu and the Administrator had a short conversation about this deep, philosophical question.

101010101.name: Sisters
101010101.desc:
Hoping to catch up to the rest of the team, Hodur was practicing rigorously in the training room when she was interrupted by her sister, Baldr.
Hodur's training had surpassed the recommended time, and in order to get her sister to rest, Baldr cajoled her into stopping by suggesting they get a nighttime snack.

101010201.name: Strange Mecha
101010201.desc:
Ah... Everything felt so peaceful. Nothing was going to happen... right?
Zenkibo and Apollo were helping maintain order at the Spealght factory's AGI Mecha news conference. Just as they were starting to feel bored, some eerie AGI Mechas started acting out of control and nearly hurt an attendee.
A mass of creepy mechas poured out from the factory, and it looks like we've got no choice but to kick some butt... thought Zenkibo excitedly.

101010301.name: Zenkibo's Loot
101010301.desc:
Zenkibo and Apollo were surrounded by the factory's security guards after entering to investigate, who demanded that they hand over the mecha they'd taken from the factory.
But Zenki and Apollo wouldn't back down that easily!

101010401.name: Girl From The Cryptics
101010401.desc: Though Ookuninushi didn't really feel like doing so, she agreed to analyze the AGI Mecha parts handed over to The Cryptics, persuaded by the fact that Shu said they'd increase The Cryptics' budget.

101010501.name: Charred Mecha
101010501.desc: The analysis results revealed Spealght Industries had been mass producing AGI Mechas infused with Bane Energy for at least one year.

101010601.name: A Strange Smell
101010601.desc:
Locked in the factory's prep room, Asura kept saying that she was the champion of the underground boxing ring. When asked why she couldn't take out the security guards, she responded with the simple response: "I'm hungry". If she had to provide another reason, it'd be that——
She smelled the odor of some strange creature, something she'd once killed...

101010701.name: Welcome Back
101010701.desc:
Osiris returned to the Overture Squad after a long period of recuperation. Along with Shu and the other squad members, they headed to Spealght.
The Administrator was given the task of operating the Mimir system and serving as battle commander.

101010801.name: Investigation Kicks Off: Before
101010801.desc: Pretending to be a security guard, Baldr easily tricked another guard and made them go nappy nap for a short period of time.

101010802.name: Investigation Kicks Off: After
101010802.desc:
Baldr swiped the guard's mobile terminal and contacted the Administrator. The first major discovery she made was this:
These so-called "guards" weren't from your average security company. They were the Children of Iron, wanted criminals by CORG.

101010901.name: Outstanding Strategist: Before
101010901.desc: Given that Baldr snuck into the factory alone, Ver and Osiris were worried about her safety. But Shu was well aware of Baldr's capabilities and wasn't the least bit concerned.

101010902.name: Outstanding Strategist: After
101010902.desc:
Shu and the crew headed into the factory and they were met with wave after wave of Bane Energy infused AGI Mechas.
The Administrator figured out a gap in their patrol route, and helped the squad avoid an attack from all sides.

101011001.name: Minions' Hybrid
101011001.desc: On the other side of the Spealght grounds, in Factory No.2, Zenkibo and Apollo encountered an odd looking and even stranger speaking enemy, formed by three integrated AGI Mechas.

101011101.name: Skirmish
101011101.desc:
The Overture Squad met two security guards head on.
They tried the old "We don't want to fight... we just have a few questions," but after trying to talk things over, they realized it was going nowhere, and had no choice but to kick some ass...

101011201.name: The Old Man
101011201.desc: A lover of AGI Mechas, and a man of principle, Spealght's Chief Engineer Jolin urged the current chairman, Eugene, to abandon "the plan." All he got in return were bellows and disdain...

101011301.name: Savage Security
101011301.desc:
Beating down the security guards revealed that they had no intel to tell. All they knew was that in the depths of the night, the rumblings of some giant furnace could be heard below ground.
If they wanted to know more, the Mods needed to ask their boss, Ethan. But no one seemed to know where he was...

101020101.name: Mystery of the Factory
101020101.desc:
From what was currently known, Spealght Industries was nothing more than an outstanding AGI Mecha company.
The only thing that raised suspicion was the incident titled "the AGI Mecha Riot." To this day, no one knew why it occurred, and how Spealght so rapidly pulled itself out of the enterprise-crushing crisis was also a mystery.

101020201.name: Charge!
101020201.desc:
After the Overture Squad took out the Security Captain, one of the Children of Iron's captains appeared. His name was Olheim.
He didn't immediately trade blows with Verthandi and the squad. Instead, he released a mecha that Ethan picked up from the scrap site...

101020301.name: Mechanical Body
101020301.desc:
It turned out that the leader of Children of Iron, Ethan, and his primary officer, Zero One, have mechanical bodies.
Ethan's investigation had revealed that this strange enigma of their bodies had nothing to do with the mysteries of the factory. Unfortunately... his investigation had been found out.

101020501.name: Contact!
101020501.desc:
Eugene thought he took back the AI control permissions to the factory from Novich. He never expected that the so-called AI known as Halphas and Novich were in cahoots, disguising their real identities.
Eugene was surrounded by the rebellious AGI Mechas, and he learned of a terrifying truth...

101020601.name: "Artificial Intelligence"
101020601.desc: The Bane-energy-infused AGI Mecha retrieved from the scrap site was smashed beyond repair. An exasperated Olheim was mocked by Osiris and decided to teach the Modifiers a lesson himself.

101020701.name: Lashing Out
101020701.desc: The defeated Olheim pretended to surrender, but threw a smoke bomb when he got the chance, escaping while he could.

101020801.name: Wily
101020801.desc:
Jolin used his access card to temporarily stop the mechas surrounding Verthandi and the squad. It turned out that he had let the AGI Mechas leak out to warn CORG of impending danger.
His factory permissions wouldn't last for long, and all the mechas would soon restart and focus on eliminating the intruders.

101020902.name: Awarded Engineer
101020902.desc: After defeating all the AGI Mechas in the sorting room, Jolin told the Overture Squad the horrifying secret that lay below the factory: Eugene's mysterious partner had produced at least 4000 Bane energy infused AGI Mecha down there.

101021001.name: Secrets Behind the Scenes: Before
101021001.desc: Upon learning that the Modifiers were here to learn of and stop this conspiracy, Jolin begged them to protect Eugene when they found him.

101021101.name: Secrets Behind the Scenes: After
101021101.desc:
Bring it on! Olheim and his crew were caught, but weren't going to give up that easily.
Unaware of the trap, Verthandi charged forward and was ambushed by Zero One. The Overture Squad now had to face Olheim and Zero One together.
And yet, the two of them kept quarreling with each other. Looks like their relationship is pretty complicated...

101021102.name: The Chief Engineer's Request
101021102.desc: Even after having lost, Olheim was still trying to stall for time with some sneaky tricks. But there was no need, for the leader of the Children of Iron, Ethan, who the Overture Squad had been looking for all this time, had arrived.

101030101.name: The Sub-control Room
101030101.desc: Baldr successfully infiltrated the control room, hoping to uncover lots of intel. The Administrator told Baldr that the Overture Squad would hold off Ethan to buy her some time.

101030202.name: Under the Surface
101030202.desc:
Ethan had long ago discovered the secret below the Spealght factory.
Though Ethan was able to handle himself, Halphas captured him and hinted that his subordinates may not be so capable.
Using their safety as a bargaining chip, Ethan agreed to cooperate with the AGI.

101030301.name: Copper Duel
101030301.desc: Ethan suggested a round of Copper Combat to decide who was the more skilled fighter. It's said that in the world of bounty hunters, this is the most common method for resolving disputes. However, he wouldn't be the first to step into the ring.

101030401.name: Farce In the Ring: Before
101030401.desc:
After the first wave of opponents lost, Olheim hollered out that he wished to fight.
But before he could make a move, as if out of principle, Ethan told him "Olheim, you've already lost once." Thus, he stepped up to fight the Overture Squad himself.

101030402.name: Farce In the Ring: After
101030402.desc: Ethan overpowered the Overture Squad, but stopped fighting when his back pain flared up. He commanded his crew to retreat, and with that, the Copper Combat came to a dramatic end.

101030501.name: Decryption Progress
101030501.desc:
The Overture Squad had to get to Baldr immediately, but they didn't have the password to the elevator. Mimir told them that cracking the password required at least ten minutes. And just at the height of pressure——
Baldr hacked into the elevator system from the control room.

101030701.name: A Particular Case
101030701.desc:
In Factory No.2, Zenkibo and Apollo encountered an enemy that was quite the head-scratcher——Sobek, the oddball wielding an Access Key, didn't seem to get that he's a Modifier too.
Donning his croc mask, he kept howling erratically. What a nuisance...

101030901.name: Certain Danger
101030901.desc:
Though she managed to infiltrate the control room, Baldr was unable to investigate any further... for she'd been found.
Halphas had been using Ethan's subordinates as bargaining chips, and was forcing him to "resolve" the Baldr issue.

101031001.name: Children of Iron: Before
101031001.desc:
The Arrival Day gift that Hodur bought for Baldr had arrived on time, but Baldr herself had still not returned...
Just as she was backed into a corner, Baldr cried out for Shu. As if she knew how dire the moment is, Shu's silver lance screamed forth in response.

101031002.name: Children of Iron: After
101031002.desc:
Ethan unexpectedly threw the fight, pretending to accidentally smash all the mainframes in the control room, thereby cutting off Halphas' surveillance abilities.
Since preventing the underground conspiracy from getting worse is their priority, Shu and Baldr decided to let the Children of Iron go.

101040101.name: The Storm Is Coming: Before
101040101.desc:
Spealght had planned on producing a legion of AGI Mecha within two years that could take over Neuhansa. However, due to the morning's events, the plan had been exposed.
Allowing the rookies to continue on with the mission would be too risky, but Verthandi and Osiris were adamant. Plus——
in 20 minutes, the entire legion was going to be activated. There was no time to wait for reinforcements, so it was up to those already on site to stop the AGI Mechas from activating.

101040102.name: The Storm Is Coming: After
101040102.desc: Novich mocked the exasperated Halphas for having been betrayed by Ethan. But the so-called "great one" commanded him to cooperate with Halphas to push forth the "legion plan"...

101040201.name: Surprising Strength
101040201.desc:
After the Children of Iron left, Asura was still trapped in the prep room and was starving so bad she kept shouting out.
Luckily, Jolin discovered her, giving her buttered toast and taking off her shackles.
To thank him, Asura offered to serve as his bodyguard. Jolin thought she was just joking, but was shocked to see her trample on an AGI Mecha like a little toy.

101040301.name: Reinforcements Set Out
101040301.desc:
Just as she was enjoying a lovely dream with her master Vidar and some penguins in some polar region, Leviathan was awakened by a call from the Administrator.
Administrator wanted the Winter Squad, which means Leviathan and Vidar, to set off and provide support for the Overture Squad. However, Mimir reminded the Administrator that this would leave no Modifiers present to protect the Aether Gazer headquarters, which was a strict company policy.
Hodur volunteered to stand guard, but she had an ominous feeling about the whole situation...

101040401.name: Mr. Eugene: Before
101040401.desc: More and more Visbanes were pouring out from all sides, and Osiris was reacting in such a way that it caught Shu's attention. "I've got to overcome this!"——Osiris forced herself to carry on with the mission.

101040402.name: Mr. Eugene: After
101040402.desc:
The Modifiers discovered the bound up chairman of Spealght Industries, Eugene.
After rescuing him, he furiously accused Halphas and Novich of tricking him and emphasizing that it wasn't his fault that Spealght had turned out this way.
In exchange for his safety, the Overture Squad had Eugene take them to a location where the AGI Mecha legion activation could be stopped.
Osiris was the only one who sensed something strange about Eugene...

101040601.name: Humanoid AGI Mecha: Before
101040601.desc:
As Zenkibo was wrapped up in her duel with Sobek, humanoid mechas suddenly burst up through the floors and began chasing her.
These were the troops from the AGI Mecha legion that had been activated in advance. The Administrator told Apollo and Zenkibo to guard the factory doors and prevent the AGI Mechas from leaking out and endangering innocent civilians.

101040602.name: Humanoid AGI Mecha: After
101040602.desc: At the Aether Gazer headquarters, your run-of-the-mill employee was just about to get off work, and asked a service mecha to pour him some water. He never expected to get attacked for such a simple request.

101040701.name: Defend the HQ
101040701.desc:
At Aether Gazer, the mechas imported from Spealght had lost control and began wildly attacking Division Nine's protective gates.
Mimir was forced to cut off communications with the Overture Squad, focusing on providing support to the gates.
The Administrator applied to use firearms and assist in suppressing the mechas with Hodur.

101040802.name: No Leak
101040802.desc: Trapped by their own service mechas, the Aether Gazer employees were saved at the last moment by a man wielding a massive sword. From the shouting that could be heard, it seemed that it was the chairman of Division Three, Tyr...

101040901.name: Kusherfang: Before
101040901.desc:
The Overture Squad followed Eugene to the area above the energy reactor.
But then, a shocking surprise: A mammoth mecha appeared with the words AGI Mecha Legion Unit inscribed on it, stopping everyone in their tracks.

101040902.name: Kusherfang: After
101040902.desc:
Clearly pleased with himself, Eugene performed some operations and the rumbling of the reactor stopped.
But just at that time, Halphas' so-called "most powerful creation" appeared... Kusherfang.

101041001.name: Defender of Aether Gazer: Before
101041001.desc: At Aether Gazer, even though the AGI Mecha seemed to have been restored to normal, the Administrator pulled the trigger... albeit with a bit of hesitation. Even Hodur was shocked at the decision.

101041002.name: Defender of Aether Gazer: After
101041002.desc:
As the uncontrollable mechas were about to breach the defense lines, a massive sword crashed down, shattering the entire group into pieces.
The man who averted the crisis, Aether Gazer's chairman Tyr, commended the exceptional performance, even joked about recruiting Administrator for Division Three.

101041101.name: Crazy Idea: Before
101041101.desc:
Having returned to the Command Room, the Administrator realized that the Spealght factory had already turned into nothing more than ruins, and the nearby residents were panicking.
The Administrator told the despondent Hodur to contact CORG and evacuate the people on site.

101041102.name: Crazy Idea: After
101041102.desc:
One of the Spealght factories had collapsed from an explosion, and a massive amount of humanoid mechas began flooding out. The Winter Squad had arrived on scene and met up with Zenkibo and Apollo to help stop the outpouring of mechas.
On the other end of the Spealght grounds, Ethan vehemently expounded his views to the Children of Iron, saying that the chance to expand their resistance against CORG lay right before them:
Disable these mechas and take them back to base, so that they may be used to fight against CORG's "secret weapon".

101041201.name: Strongest Creation
101041201.desc:
The plan to stop the reactor had failed. Now stuck inside the rubble and ruins, the Overture Squad realized that their communications devices weren't working.
Kusherfang had been summoned, falling from the sky and launching an attack on the crew...

101050101.name: Top Priority
101050101.desc:
CORG commanded Aether Gazer that "capturing the Children of Iron" was the number one priority.
If that happened, the AGI Mechas would surely leak out of the factory grounds and hurt innocent civilians. Administrator made a decision: Ignore CORGs command.
Administrator did not wish to spark a conflict between them and the Children of Iron, so long as they too were fighting against the mecha. Leviathan summed it up nice:
"Point is, fight the AGI Mecha with the security guys, right?"

101050201.name: Promise to A Long Lost Friend
101050201.desc:
(Cough)... (Cough)... Jolin woke up among the ruins. Asura told him that the factory collapsed.
He asked Asura if she could clear a way out. He must keep a promise to an old friend...

101050301.name: Source Layer Rift
101050301.desc:
Kusherfang's energy had run out, and it had ceased functioning. But that didn't mean the Overture Squad was out of danger——
A hysterical Halphas had opened a fissure in the Source Layer and was trying to pull them in.
Back in the Command Room, the Administrator called to mind the horrifying experience of being pulled in the Source Layer several months ago.

101050401.name: Ausar Reawakens
101050401.desc:
Now in the Source Layer, something strange was happening to Osiris.
Verthandi moved close to her out of concern, but Shu commanded her to step back.
Though she had been managing to keep it under control, Osiris' second personality Ausar had been awakened after repeated stimulation. The look on her face had turned cold and foreign.

101050502.name: Personality Scramble
101050502.desc: Osiris did everything in her power to gain back control of her body. Right when she felt like she couldn't hold on any longer, Osiris apologized for being a burden on everyone. But that was not for her to say——Shu and the crew told her adamantly that this couldn't be further from the truth.

101050601.name: Scorched Battlefield
101050601.desc: Ausar may have been stopped, but Halphas refused to give up. It no longer attempted to hide its evil desires and schemes, summoning up innumerable Visbanes in an attempt to bury the Overture Squad.

101050701.name: Commitment to Protect
101050701.desc:
In one incredible punch, Asura smashed a hole right through the steel wall. Jolin was then able to enter the control room, and using his access card he shut down the reactor, fulfilling the promise he made to his old friend:
To guard the Spealght factory, and prevent it from becoming a weapon that brings disaster to humankind.

101050802.name: Interception
101050802.desc:
The transport vehicles had been stuffed to the brim with AGI Mechas, and CORG was closing in on the Spealght grounds. Ethan commanded the Children of Iron to evacuate immediately.
Without help from the Children of Iron, the Modifiers were finding it difficult to stop the outpouring of mechas. Just as the Administrator was about to give up and focus on ensuring the safety of the squad, a "miracle" occurred——
The mechas' energy supply suddenly cut out, and they all stopped functioning.
The Administrator and Hodur decided to take the photon ship to Neuhansa to find Verthandi, Osiris, and Shu.

101050901.name: Final Salvation: Before
101050901.desc: Having discovered that the reactor had stopped, now at a loss, Halphas turned his fury onto Verthandi and the squad.

101050902.name: Final Salvation: After
101050902.desc: After halting the reactor, Jolin got seriously injured by an AGI Mecha attack. Before leaving the control room, he placed the omni-access card in Eugene's pocket, the same man who gave it to him in the first place. Unfortunately... his long term partner had already stopped breathing.

101051001.name: Into the Darkness
101051001.desc:
The Administrator and Modifiers were fighting against the viscous Bane energy seeping into the factory. The Admin once again felt the horror and despair of falling into the Source Layer, and lost consciousness. With the protection and encouragement of the team, Admin finally came to senses.
Zenkibo used Comet R4Y to blow open a path, allowing them to reach the production room where the Overture Squad had been located before the communications cut out.

101051201.name: Attack from Behind
101051201.desc:
Under constant pressure from the Overture Squad, Halphas' true self——a twisted black shadow that words can't describe——emerged from the armor.
Halphas fled hysterically, but Verthandi smashed its crimson crystal core with her blade, finally putting an end to the mastermind behind the conspiracy.
The Administrator and the crew located the other Modifiers and blasted open an entrance to the Source Layer with their Access Keys in order to save them.
After convening with the other squad, they still couldn't figure out who stopped the reactor. And just then, Jolin appeared.
He was absolutely stunned when he saw that Eugene was with them. Having witnessed Eugene dead, he demanded to know who that was.
(Chuckle)——
Realizing he had been found out, Novich ambushed Baldr and disappeared from sight.

101051301.name: Returning with a Sigh
101051301.desc:
Back at Aether Gazer, Baldr's surgery was a success, and though she managed to hold onto her life, it was unclear when she would wake up.
Osiris regained consciousness, but she grew silent and did not wish to speak with anyone.
Amid the tense atmosphere, some shocking news came in from Sasanami...

101060101.name: The Five Mountain Gods
101060101.desc: In ancient times, Sasanami was lorded over by five mountain gods: Izuru, Karasugo, Miyahebi, Sanzaru, and Akishika. Infuriated by the ignorance of humans, these deities brought a period of disaster upon the lands which lasted for one hundred years. The Child of Heaven led five clerics and quelled the wrath of the gods. She were later venerated as the Sasanami Zun. The families of the five clerics rotates in their role as the leader of Sasanami. But the balance of power soon collapsed, and a dark undercurrent swept through Sasanami, with crisis lurking in every corner...

101060201.name: Aqua Lantern Festival
101060201.desc: The lord of the Izuru family, Izuru Masayoshi, headed to Miyahebi home to attend the Aqua Lantern Festival and mysteriously went missing. Kuninotokotachi and Buzenbo set out for the Miyahebi to find the prime minister, but it was eerily quiet for the festive holiday...

101060301.name: An Unusual Bodyguard
101060301.desc: The Miyahebi manor was heavily guarded, and the guards were emitting a visbanian energy. Even stranger, a black snake slithered through the grass and bit Buzenbo's calf.

101060401.name: Checkmate
101060401.desc: Miyahebi Syuu was inside the master room, playing weiqi with Izuru Masayoshi, when he told the prime minister how he felt: He was immensely dissatisfied with Izuru Masayoshi, who took over the Miyahebi's fishing zones and "temporarily" managed the Miyahebi affairs. Syuu revealed his ambition to use force to take over the Sasanami District.

101060501.name: Pawns and Lies
101060501.desc: The Strategist brought up the letter from Karasugo to Miyahebi Syuu. The letter indicated that the real culprit behind the Miyahebi fire four years ago was Izuru Masayoshi. Syuu didn't believe the Karasugo letter, but he mentioned that its validity was not what was important...

101060601.name: Unexpected
101060601.desc: Having arrived at the front courtyard's hallway, Kuninotokotachi wanted to get some intel from a guard, but soon discovered that none of them were actually human...

101060701.name: Emergency Contact
101060701.desc: Back at Aether Gazer, Tsukuyomi found Nuadha to adjust her Access Key and the two of them catch up. She was suddenly called to the Command Room and, after being caught up on the situation, she immediately set out.

101060801.name: The Snake God Awakens
101060801.desc: Miyahebi Syuu tried to use Orochi and her power to implement his plan. If it succeeded, he would become ruler of the nation. Orochi was disgusted by some scent she picked up on Izuru Masayoshi, but she couldn't recall what it was...

101060901.name: Evil Experiment
101060901.desc: A test subject was painfully fused with a Visbane and lost consciousness. He didn't react even when his daughter rushed to his side. After looking at her, Miyahebi Syuu mentioned that she looked like his sister Aya.

101061001.name: Cee-cee
101061001.desc: The servant who took the little girl out was actually a Karasugo mole——Shadow Crow. After running into Kagutsuchi, Kagutsuchi took Shadow Crow and the girl named Cee-cee to complete their mission.

101061101.name: Serpentine Shadows
101061101.desc: Kuninotokotachi encountered Orochi on her way to meet up with Buzenbo. She learned from Orochi that those creepy guards were test experiments created by fusing humans and Visbanes.

101061201.name: Fights and Illusions: Before
101061201.desc: While she battled with Kuninotokotachi, Orochi seemed to indicate that she knew where Kuninotokotachi's eye came from...

101061202.name: Fights and Illusions: After
101061202.desc: Kuninotokotachi's eye was almost stolen by Orochi, but just at the last moment Kuninotokotachi pulled off an amazing counterattack. Orochi managed to get away at the last moment, and the Miyahebi subject the Strategist saw this all unfold.

101061301.name: Purple Flash: Before
101061301.desc: Using himself as an example, the Strategist hoped that Kuninotokotachi and the Modifiers could understand the plight of the fused Visbanes. His words fell on deaf ears and a battle was inevitable. Tsukuyomi soon appeared to support Kuninotokotachi, who was drained from her fight with Orochi.

101061302.name: Purple Flash: After
101061302.desc: After beating back The Strategist, Tsukuyomi allowed Kuninotokotachi to tend to her injuries while she went to find Buzenbo and Izuru Masayoshi. Orochi sensed that her replica had been slain...

101070101.name: Haughty Helper
101070101.desc: A rather proud and haughty guest appeared at Aether Gazer. Coming from the Society of Muses, Hera headed to Sasanami with the Administrator and the crew to provide support to the Pheasant Squad.

101070301.name: Shadow
101070301.desc: Buzenbo was lost in some hallway and encountered a shadow version of herself. Their dialogue revealed her internal struggles and scars. Not long ago, her master Tsukuyomi had decided to remove her from the Pheasant Squad.

101070502.name: Exorcism: After
101070502.desc: Tsukuyomi's battle with the painter was no different from Buzenbo's, and was obstructed by her inner demons. The painter could perceive every single one of their psychological weaknesses.

101070701.name: An Odd Cee-cee
101070701.desc: It seemed that the Miyahebi family had been performing strange ceremonies in the middle of the night to summon the snake god. Right when Cee-cee recalled a sacred hymn, a Visbane appeared that was even more frightening than the Visbanic Canines.

101070801.name: Night Protector
101070801.desc: It seemed that Cee-cee had been inhabited by "some thing" from the Miyahebi home. The massive fused Visbane the General that she summoned, also known as Uncle Nagazane to her, addressed her as "My Lady". Together, they headed off in another direction...

101070901.name: An Elegant Victory
101070901.desc: Right when Ver and the gang arrived at the Miyahebi home, they sensed Visbanes. Before the Administrator had even initiated the Mimir battle system, Hera couldn't help herself and head in to take care of things alone. Was her pride really not going to be a problem...?

101071001.name: The Roaring Shade: Before
101071001.desc: Hera turned all the Visbanes into ash in a flash, but the light of the fire attracted the attention of The General. He mistook them for the ones responsible for lighting the Miyahebi home on fire years ago, and became enraged.

101071002.name: The Roaring Shade: After
101071002.desc: Miyahebi Aya risked her life to save the General from Hera's attacks, thereby bringing him to his senses. Hera ceased her attacks, so Aya and the General went looking for her brother——Miyahebi Syuu.

101080101.name: Ghosts of the Past
101080101.desc: The painter's illusions revealed visions of the Miyahebi home from the past——Miyahebi Syuu was at a loss as to his next move while he played weiqi with Takenaka. Aya made a genius move in passing, to the delight of the Miyahebi family that was watching. Why would the painter show this to Tsukuyomi and Buzenbo?

101080201.name: Dream Sequel
101080201.desc: During this memory, the utahime Kurimoto Aoi was seen chatting with Miyahebi Aya. Aya called out Mamoru for liking her brother, and it seemed that the two of them had quite a relationship. How could such a seemingly loving family turn into a laboratory for fusing Visbanes?

101080401.name: Ambition Rewarded: Before
101080401.desc: While reading about some "great general" from Sasanami's ancient times in the history books, Miyahebi Syuu had a vision for the future. Two of the Miyahebi subjects, Takenaka and Minori, swore that they would stand by his side. This wonderful sight was recorded by the painter as a way to commemorate the moment. But the scroll on which this was painted quickly burned to a crisp, while Tsukuyomi and Buzenbo were surrounded by a sea of flames.

101080601.name: Blank Canvas
101080601.desc: Buzenbo and Tsukuyomi saw a Karasugo crest amid the fire and flames, indicating that the incident at the Miyahebi home four years ago was more complicated than it appeared. The master behind these illusions, the painter, finally showed himself to the Modifiers. As a fused Visbane, he was in a constant struggle with the desires of the Visbane that had been implanted in him.

101080701.name: Circle of Life: Before
101080701.desc: The painter took the Modifiers to the Miyahebi's secret underground room and told them what had taken place here. Miyahebi Syuu used an ancient ceremonial practice to summon a god that had been sealed off from the world. He, Takenaka, Minori, and Mamoru became the first batch of fused Visbanes.

101080702.name: Circle of Life: After
101080702.desc: Right before he passed away, the painter called to mind when he left the monastery to search for the buddha. He was then liberated from this long-lasting battle with the Visbane. The illusion surrounding Tsukuyomi and Buzenbo disappeared along with him.

101080901.name: Unforgivable Sin
101080901.desc: Having discovered the Visbane fusing equipment, Hera could not bear to sit by and do nothing, preparing to burn it to the ground.

101081001.name: Strifesong
101081001.desc: After destroying the fusion equipment, an angry muse riding a giant visbanian whale appeared, infuriated. She accused the Modifiers for shattering the meaning of her existence.

101081101.name: Twilight Lament
101081101.desc: In a memory, Kurimoto Aoi expressed her heartfelt thanks to Miyahebi Syuu for entrusting her with the ceremonial mission. Back in reality, it was unclear where she and the whale went to.

101090101.name: A Meeting
101090101.desc: Tsukuyomi and Buzenbo met back up with Verthandi and the crew. After exchanging intel, they headed out to find Izuru Masayoshi.

101090201.name: Teacher and Student
101090201.desc: The group discussed the Cognizant Visbanes. If the legends of Sasanami were true, then these Cognizants had existed for more than one hundred years. Meanwhile, Tsukuyomi and Buzenbo seemed to have something they wished to say to each other...

101090301.name: People Change
101090301.desc: "The lady wishes to see the young master"——Upon hearing these words from The General's mouth, The Strategist indicated that there must be something wrong with Mamoru, but when he heard the girl call his name, he realized that this was indeed Miyahebi Aya.

101090401.name: Hatred's End
101090401.desc: Aya realized that she died in that fire four years ago, but her soul had seen everything that had occurred in the Miyahebi home. She believed that she must stop her brother from continuing with his plan.

101090501.name: Warped Ideals: Before
101090501.desc: The Strategist took Miyahebi Aya and The General to Orochi, hoping that she would take care of them. He was willing to do anything to help Miyahebi Syuu complete his plan.

101090502.name: Warped Ideals: After
101090502.desc: The General was killed by Orochi, and as The Strategist clenched ever more tightly on Aya's throat, she began to slowly lose power.

101090601.name: Nocked
101090601.desc: "Whether this is right or wrong is for the future to decide. I care only that I succeed." Those were Miyahebi Syuu's words to Izuru Masayoshi. The Modifiers finally arrived at the Miyahebi master room, and a battle was on the horizon.

101090801.name: Wrath of the Snake God
101090801.desc: The Modifiers defeated The Strategist and the other guards, and were preparing to rescue Izuru Masayoshi. But just then, the true form of the snake god appeared.

101090901.name: A Daring Adventure
101090901.desc: Tsukuyomi and Buzenbo were suppressed by Orochi's power. The snake god expressed interest in the Administrator, who realized she was close enough to Orochi to make a move. The Administrator used Ookuninushi's latest invention, the BunBun Pistol, to fire off some rounds at Orochi.

101091001.name: Shinri Unsheathed: Before
101091001.desc: Orochi's body faded away, but her energy hadn't completely gone. Buzenbo, who had been bit by one of the snakes, was infected with the snake god's data, which was using Buzenbo to revive Orochi. To stop this from happening, Buzenbo was preparing to take her own life with her Access Key——but the Administrator shot it out of her hands. Tsukuyomi told Buzenbo that she had never been a burden, and that she was the disciple of whom she was most proud. Tsukuyomi had Buzenbo unleash the snake god, so that she could battle Orochi with her 2nd Access Key, Shinri.

101091101.name: An Impossible Wish
101091101.desc: Kagutsuchi was carrying Miyahebi Aya, who wished to see her brother. Unfortunately, they came across Akika, who claimed to have encountered him four years prior. Realizing that this must be the mastermind behind all of this, Kagutsuchi sent Shadow Crow home, telling him that he would finish the mission here.

101091201.name: Good News
101091201.desc: After the tumultuous series of events had ended and everyone was back at Aether Gazer, Tsukuyomi decided to withdraw her decision to remove Buzenbo from the Pheasant Squad. Although what happened at the Miyahebi home was still a big mystery, and seemed to be indicative of more to come, the good news was that Kuninotokotachi's surgery was a success, and Baldr had safely awakened from her coma.

101130101.name: The City of Art
101130101.desc: The Aether Gazer team were invited by the Society of Muses to attend the Ardisis arts ceremony held at Omorfies, the Capital of the Arts. Although Omorfies' beauty inspired awe in the visitors, there were ripples beneath its peaceful facade: a string of art thefts was sowing panic in the city, and the people were turning against the Knights of Convallaria due to their inability to catch the culprit. In an attempt to get to the bottom of things, the Convallaria Commander Athena wanted to team up with Hades...

101130201.name: Enraged Lady: Before
101130201.desc: The real purpose of the Aether Gazer attendance was to identify what Novich's target was. However, things didn't go according to plan and, at the entrance to the Society of Muses, the Knights of Convallaria refused to honor the group's invitations, and blocked their path with spears. Hera was incensed by the knights' attitude, and a clash might be inevitable...

101130202.name: Enraged Lady: After
101130202.desc: The fight between Aether Gazer and the Knights of Convallaria was witnessed from the shadows by Leuce and Mintha of the Society of Muses. As Society of Muses assistants, and old acquaintances of Hera, they weren't sure whether they should intervene or not, and ultimately decided to settle the matter after preparing Hades's afternoon tea...

101130301.name: Afternoon Tea Interlude
101130301.desc: The fully armed Knights of Convallaria refused to budge, and the fight was showing no signs of ending. It wasn't until Athena appeared on the scene that the stubborn knights finally agreed to sheathe their swords. Once the head of the Society of Muses, Hades, explained the reason for their presence, Athena offered the Aether Gazer team her sincerest apologies, and told them about the recent spate of thefts. The Admin believed that Novich had something to do with this, and vowed to help them find the culprit. Relieved, Athena immediately called for Ron, an eye witness, to enter the room...

101130401.name: Dream-Weaving Sheep
101130401.desc: The culprit sounded like a Visbane according to Ron’s testimony. Hades then brought in a girl called Oneiroi, who the team were surprised to discover has the power to send people into a dreamland. Hades had everyone sit by her side, and with the sound of that soft, sweet voice, they all entered a dream...

101130501.name: The Dream Rejectee
101130501.desc: When they opened their eyes, they saw the bustling street where Ron was yesterday, and they followed him to the entrance of the Society of Sculptors. Unlike Oneiroi, who was lying lazily on a cloud, the dream version of Ron took exception to his dream being invaded by strangers, and the Knights of Convallaria once again attacked the group. This time round, however, there was no Athena to break up the fight, and the flames in Hera's hands were starting to dance...

101130601.name: Shallow Dream Corner: Before
101130601.desc: After the battle, the team arrived in the Society of Sculptors lobby, and looked for ways to pass time during the long wait. Hades told the group that, if a student cannot pass the Stellaris Academy by the time they are 16, they will never become an artist, meaning that today was Ron's last chance. At night, Visbanes broke in through the window and knocked over the display case as they looked for something, just like Ron said they did. Due to Ron's terror, the dreamscape began to shrink and darkness began to engulf everyone. Oneiroi said that defeating the Visbanes was the only way to escape from the dream...

101130602.name: Shallow Dream Corner: After
101130602.desc: After leaving the dream, the team believed the mastermind behind the thefts was a Cognizant Visbane. To protect Omorfies, Athena decided to join the team in their fight, although this did nothing to mitigate Hera's hostility towards her. After a while, the smell of delicious food came wafting over, and all quarrels were instantly forgotten at the sight of a table full of culinary delights.

101130701.name: The Sound of Dawn: Before
101130701.desc: The calm moonlight and warm candlelight were just what everyone needed after a hard day's work. Half asleep, the Admin overheard Hera making tea for Athena. Relief that the two seemed to have patched things up was shattered by the terrifying sound of Visbanes...

101130702.name: The Sound of Dawn: After
101130702.desc: After the battle, Athena declared that the mastermind behind the thefts had now been unmasked. As such, the martial law imposed by the Knights of Convallaria could now be lifted and she removed herself from the temporary anti-Visbane task force. The team was caught off guard by the sudden loss of a member.

101130801.name: Stellaris Temple
101130801.desc: Even though everyone was confused by Athena's sudden decision to close the case, the very next second Hades invited everyone to visit the world-renowned Stellaris Academy, all was forgotten. Amid the aesthetic wonderland, the team met Oceanus, member of the Astral Council, who was upset with Hades for failing to show up to work on her first day on the job...

101130901.name: Déjà Vu
101130901.desc: As Hades introduced the team to the Stellaris Academy, everyone got a sense of Omorfies' dark past before it decided to dedicate itself to arts. Hades, however, was reluctant to bring up the painful past. Everyone then turned to the security mechas, and were met with an array of red eyes...

101131001.name: The Commander's Worry
101131001.desc: Athena rushed over after hearing the news, and was told by Ver that the AGI Mechas had been corrupted by Visbanes. Innocent people might be in danger. Athena, touching one of the mechas, declared that she didn’t sense any Visbane involvement and that they probably just needed a routine inspection. She assured the team that the ceremony would proceed as planned under the protection of the Knights of Convallaria...

101131101.name: Library Mouse
101131101.desc: Mintha and Leuce heard strange noises coming from the Muse Library in the night. When they went to investigate, they saw someone sneaking around...

101131202.name: Planting Dreams
101131202.desc: Oneiroi was awoken by the sound of fighting, and found out that it was Ron. Reluctantly, he explained that he wanted to borrow Oneiroi’s powers so he could get a good night's sleep before his test the next day. Oneiroi agreed to plant the dreamscape seed for him, but Mintha didn’t understand why he didn't use the main entrance...

101131301.name: The Ideal Knight
101131301.desc: During one of her naps, Athena dreamed of her grandmother's strict instructions and her brother's accusations, and woke suddenly from the nightmare. She wiped the sweat from her forehead, and was told by a subordinate that the AGI Mecha inspection found no anomalies. However, with the opening ceremony imminent and Hades and other senior government officials arriving by chariot, Athena knew she couldn’t let up for even a second.

101131401.name: Eve of the Gala
101131401.desc: The opening ceremony was about to begin, and the Knights of Convallaria were in high spirits. Athena, on the other hand, was wearing a permanent frown, and told her subordinates that she would leave the team for a moment to go and investigate a matter on her own...

101131501.name: Cursed Jewel
101131501.desc: It turned out that Ron got help from a Cognizant Visbane called Ladon and passed his test, and now he was helping Ladon in return by collecting the materials needed to break the seal. By the time Athena arrived, she found all of the sentries posted outside the Temple of Art were destroyed, and spotted the culprit, Ron, holding an eerie mirror and talking to himself in a corner. She asked Ron to hand it to her, but he refused, saying that he's only helping a friend...

101131601.name: Lies from a Friend
101131601.desc: Athena's absence had not gone unnoticed by Hades, but little did she knew that Athena was currently locked in a fight to the death in the Temple of Art with Ron, who had been possessed by the Cognizant Visbane Ladon, who was sealed in a mirror...

101131701.name: Fatal Flaw: Before
101131701.desc: The smug Ladon exposed the reason for Athena's hasty dismissal of the thefts: She did not want to affect the ceremony in any way. Faced with Ladon's theft and mockery, Athena exploded in a rage, but Ladon disapproved of her desire to protect the temple and put in motion his plan to destroy it...

101131702.name: Fatal Flaw: After
101131702.desc: Ladon manipulated the Visbanes into destroying everything inside the temple. To make him stop, Athena agreed to kneel before him, upon which he knocked her unconscious. Ladon used a stolen Hexstone and Medusa's Statue to smash the mirror holding him prisoner, grabbed Omorfies' Sephirah Core and fled...

101131801.name: Broken Seed of Dreams
101131801.desc: Oneiroi sensed that the dreamscape seed planted in Ron had been ripped out, which could either mean he was dead, attacked by Visbanes, or he fell into the Source Layer. To save him, the team rushed to the Stellaris Temple where his sensor signal was last detected...

101131901.name: Even If All Is Lost
101131901.desc: The Stellaris Temple was in disarray. The team learned about what happened from Athena, and the eagle-eyed Admin noticed that the Omorfies Sephirah Core had been stolen. When everyone is standing around befuddled, Oneiroi's Drowsie said it can help them track Ladon. Athena, disheartened by her poor judgment and scolded by Hera, remembered her grandmother's words and resolved to help the team get the Sephirah Core back...

101140101.name: Shattered Mirror
101140101.desc: Ladon used the coordinates of the Hall of the Heart to enter the Source Layer. However, some error occurred with his landing point, and the resulting shock he suffered forced him to abandon Ron's body. Ron frantically fled from the one whom he has thought of as a friend...

101140201.name: Mutual Foe: Before
101140201.desc: The Administrator and the rest followed Oneiroi's doll, Drowsie, in search of Ron. A lack of information frustrated their efforts, and they were further slowed by the Visbanes lurking in the Source Layer.

101140202.name: Mutual Foe: After
101140202.desc: In her battle with the Visbanes, Athena discovered that she was able to direct Hera's flames to deal powerful attacks to the enemy.

101140301.name: Real Memory
101140301.desc: The dreamscape seed began to shift, and the fog on Ron's memory also started to lift. The group guessed that Ladon was already on the move, and so as they tried to track down Ron, they also seeked out Ron's memories in the dream shards to try and piece together the truth.

101140401.name: Unexpected Meetings & Flowery Speech
101140401.desc: (Ron's memory) Ron met the Ladon in the mirror for the first time at the Stellaris Academy library. Ladon won Ron's trust by claiming to be a master artist who could help Ron pass the Stellaris Academy test, and Ron agreed to help free Ladon.

101140501.name: "Return" on Friendship
101140501.desc: (Ron's memory) During the painting test, Ladon narrated the history of Omorfies to Ron, who used this information to come up with the portrait of Colleen Pallas, the founding head of the Knights of Convallaria. Ron passed the test with flying colors.

101140601.name: "Elf" in the Dark: Before
101140601.desc: (Ron's memory) Ron discovered a way to lift the seal on the mirror in a book. Ladon summoned a Visbane which he called an "elf" to help Ron sneak into the various art societies and look for the items needed to lift the seal.

101140602.name: "Elf" in the Dark: After
101140602.desc: Ron, who had run for some time in the Source Layer, and finally came to terms with Ladon's betrayal. However, he met with another Visbane attack and had no choice but to keep running.

101140701.name: Youth in a Bind
101140701.desc: The Administrator and the Modifiers learned the truth about how Ron came to collude with Ladon through Ron’s memory. Just as the fragments of dreamscape seed were consumed, they heard Ron's cries for help.

101140801.name: Bronze Mirror's Wanderings
101140801.desc: (Ron's memory) While looking for the items that would lift the mirror seal, to allay Ron's concerns, Ladon told him the story of his past, but in the form of a fairy tale.

101140901.name: The Blind Poet's Treasure: Before
101140901.desc: (Ron's memory) Bronze mirrors, silver coins, tulip petals, and the jewels of the blind poet everywhere... Ron and Ladon decided to sneak into the library at the Society of Muses to find clues to the last item they need...

101140902.name: The Blind Poet's Treasure: After
101140902.desc: Ladon located the entrance to the Hall of the Heart. However, his Visbane body triggered the defense system in place and he was unable to enter the hall. After talking over the plan again with a mystery accomplice, Ladon went off to look for Ron, for Ron would be his "key" to the Hall of the Heart.

101141001.name: Gloom over the Ceremony
101141001.desc: Enlil was unable to locate Athena. He learned from Leuce and Mintha that a fight had occurred at Stellaris Temple, and headed over to the temple to find out more. However, along the way Enlil encountered a rather suspicious troupe and he fell unconscious after being attacked.

101141101.name: Puppets' Performance
101141101.desc: At the square where the Ardisis Ceremony was being held, the appearance of a puppet troupe drawed the attention of Hades and Oceanus. The Admin's group rescued Ron inside a theater in the Source Layer, but then met with a Visbane horde.

101141201.name: Interscene Mishap: Before
101141201.desc: Leuce and Mintha reported to Hades about the ongoings at Stellaris Temple, and Hades made an educated guess about the whereabouts of the Admin and the rest. She also sensed something was not quite right with the puppet troupe. Over the Source Layer theater, the group found it difficult to navigate their surroundings, and the battles just kept on coming.

101141202.name: Interscene Mishap: After
101141202.desc:
Ladon's "companion" hid in the entryway to the ceremony venue in the guise of a puppet master.
Leuce sent out a Quake alert on Hades' behalf to evacuate the square. The puppet troupe threw off its disguise and started attacking the crowd.

101141301.name: Fervent Theater
101141301.desc: The Knights of Convallaria took charge of the crowd evacuation. A freed Enlil arrived on the scene in time to save the crowd from being attacked by the Visbanes, and also worked with Hades and Oceanus to clear out the attackers.

101141402.name: A Symphony of Wind and Water
101141402.desc: Hades, Oceanus, and Enlil worked together and eliminated the Visbanes. Oceanus then turned into a mist and disappeared. It turned out that it was an Oceanus avatar that was fighting the battle.

101141501.name: One-Man Show
101141501.desc: In the entryway to the ceremony venue, the Oceanus avatar lured out the enemy. Just as Novich thought that he had the upper hand, Oceanus' true form appeared and slayed him.

101141602.name: Overture's Discordant Final Movement
101141602.desc: The Administrator's group was surrounded by a swarm of Visbanes. Oneiroi used her special powers and managed to close all the Visbane fissures, but she also fell into a deep sleep as a result. Ladon, who had been observing from the side, finally showed himself.

101141701.name: Fall of the Dragon
101141701.desc: Ladon attempted to win over Ron with glib of the tongue once again, but Ron did not fall for it this time. Ladon showed his true self and battled with the Modifiers.

101141802.name: All-Out Curtain Call
101141802.desc: The battle ended, and the Admin returned to the Surface Layer with the Modifiers. The group met with Hades and Oceanus, and they updated each other on what had gone on. Hades meted out Ron's punishment but also gave him a chance at redemption.

101141901.name: "Daybreak"
101141901.desc: Hades delivered a speech on the problems present in the Omorfies art administration system, and set out some coming reforms. Several days later, at a new art event, the Administrator and Ver came across an artwork by Ron, in which certain true events had been recorded in fantasy form.

101160101.name: "The Suspense": Before
101160101.desc:
A CORG squad was in pursuit of a target named "0704." Just as they thought their mission was complete, they started attacking each other for some reason.
At the same time, two attacks on Modifiers occurred in Ain Soph, and Aether Gazer forbid its members from leaving headquarters alone. However, Poseidon and Zenkibo, who left Aether Gazer together, encountered danger nevertheless.

101160201.name: Returning Two: Before
101160201.desc: Two Modifiers had been hurt, and everyone at Aether Gazer was on edge. Odin and Thor returned from Xu Heng. The Administrator headed out with the two on an investigation at Odin's suggestion.

101160301.name: "Rising Action": Before
101160301.desc: A whole day of investigation went by with zero results. On Day 2, however, Thor discovered that someone else had been attacked.

101160302.name: "Rising Action": After
101160302.desc: The Administrator and the two Modifiers rushed onto the scene of the attack, where they found a young girl, injured and weak. Oddly, the girl seemed to think the Admin to be someone else...

101160401.name: Selective Amnesia: Before
101160401.desc:
In a bid to learn more, the Administrator made their way to find out more about the attack.
However, the girl, whose name was Skuld, could not remember a number of the more important details, and even insisted that the Admin was her friend "Tantan."

101160501.name: Go With the Flow
101160501.desc: Odin suggested that the Administrator help Skuld to recover her memories in the role of "Tantan."

101160601.name: "Elaboration"
101160601.desc:
The Administrator took Skuld out, hoping to jog her memory with the familiar, and they ended up having a good time.
Verthandi and Osiris shadowed the two to ensure their safety.

101160701.name: A Fable
101160701.desc: The Administrator and Skuld made their return to the medical center after the outing. To help Skuld get to sleep, the Admin told her a bedtime story about "the tower"...

101160801.name: Paper Planes: Before
101160801.desc: At the very last minute, Skuld decided that she did not want to go to the amusement park after all. The Administrator decided to stay in with her, and taught her how to fold paper planes.

101160901.name: "The Conflict": Before
101160901.desc:
The Administrator and Verthandi quickly made their way to the meeting room after receiving a message.
At the meeting room, they came upon a dying Shu who was inexplicably attacked by Thor wielding her hammer.

101161001.name: "Character-building": Before
101161001.desc:
Verthandi and the Administrator fled to the medical center, where they ran into a bullet-ridden Apollo. On the other hand, Zenkibo, who was supposed to be recuperating at the center, was nowhere in sight.
To help the Administrator escape, Verthandi decided to stay and fight Thor on her own.

101161101.name: "The Twist"
101161101.desc:
The Administrator left the medical center with Skuld and headed over to Odin for help, only to find Odin's dead body in the office.
Soon after, Verthandi walked up and killed the Admin.

101161201.name: "Non-Linear Narrative": Before
101161201.desc:
While talking to Shu about her trip to Xu Heng, Odin expressed her worries about what was happening. Upon hearing Skuld's cries after Odin's departure, Shu hurried to the medical center only to find Skuld safe and sound.
Out in the hallway, the Administrator ran into a frantic Skuld, as well as Shu who was determined to kill her. Following an exchange of words, the Admin also became Shu's target.

101161302.name: "Falling Action": After
101161302.desc: The Administrator and Skuld fled to the hangar. With no way out, they were killed by Shu.

101161401.name: "The Turn": Before
101161401.desc:
As Apollo was taking care of a recovering Zenkibo, he surmised that something was wrong with Thor. After Thor left, Skuld came to tell Apollo something
Therefore, Apollo decided to hide by the door to try and stop Thor.

101161402.name: "The Turn": After
101161402.desc: Although Apollo managed to get the better of Thor, he was unexpectedly shot by Zenkibo, and was subsequently killed by Thor.

101161501.name: "Multiple Narrative": Before
101161501.desc:
Ookuninushi and Heimdall were out on an investigation when something unexpected occurred. It was during this time that Heimdall caught a glimpse of the attacker.
However, Thor's sudden disappearance brought everything back to square one.

101161502.name: "Multiple Narrative": After
101161502.desc: The absurd fighting finally came to end. However, Thor's words seemed to suggest that a more frightening crisis was about to come...

101161601.name: The Park: Before
101161601.desc:
Skuld, who had earlier refused to go to the amusement park, changed her mind again, and so she headed to the park with the Administrator as planned.
At the park, the Admin noticed that Skuld was distracted and had something on her mind.

101161701.name: Beneath the Surface: Before
101161701.desc:
A CORG squad appeared at the amusement park to hunt down "0704."
At the same time, the Administrator and Skuld were enjoying themselves in another corner of the park while Verthandi and Osiris continued to covertly protect them.

101161801.name: The Target: Before
101161801.desc:
The Administrator noticed the presence of the CORG operatives. For some reason, Skuld appeared to be hiding from them.
Then, all of a sudden, Skuld took the Admin by the hand and started running towards the Ferris wheel.

101161901.name: Daylight
101161901.desc:
As the Administrator and Skuld rode the Ferris wheel, Skuld looked at something down below, and asked if the Adimin would run away with her.
Then, the Ferris wheel stopped, and someone broke into their pod. It was Thor.
Thor killed the Admin without giving the them a chance to speak.

101162001.name: In the Mind's Eye: Before
101162001.desc:
Skuld decided to skip the log flume and went to the haunted house.
Verthandi and Osiris rushed ahead to the haunted house first. However, their comms with the Admin were suddenly cut off.
By the time the Admin arrived on scene, Verthandi and Osiris were in a fight.

101162101.name: Debut: Before
101162101.desc:
Osiris managed to subdue Verthandi.
A dark fog appeared, and out of it came a silver-haired youth Uld (or "0704"), who addressed Skuld as "0705."
Under Uld's influence, Osiris launched an attack on the Admin and Skuld.

101162201.name: Wind and Thunder: Before
101162201.desc: Ausar appeared and fought Thor, who was under the control of Uld.

101162301.name: Right Track: Before
101162301.desc: Ausar, with great effort, managed to get the runaway roller-coaster under control and helped the Administrator and Skuld to escape the haunted house.

101162401.name: Means of Escape: Before
101162401.desc: The Administrator and the two escaped the haunted house, where they encountered Thor again. With Ausar providing cover, Skuld fled deeper into the labyrinth along with the Administrator.

101162501.name: The Path Ahead: Before
101162501.desc: Skuld's power began to show. Using her visions, the two managed to make their way to the exit.

101162601.name: The Future
101162601.desc:
The Administrator deduced that Aether Gazer might be in danger and brought Skuld somewhere safe before returning to Aether Gazer alone.
Before leaving, the Admin promised Skuld that they would ride the Ferris wheel again when everything was over.

101162701.name: Return: Before
101162701.desc:
Upon returning to Aether Gazer, the Admin found that Uld had the entire organization under his control, and Odin dead in her office.
Verthandi came to in the nick of time and managed to protect the Admin from the CORG operatives controlled by Uld.

101162702.name: Return: After
101162702.desc:
It turned out that Skuld, who had rushed back to Aether Gazer HQ, was the one who helped Verthandi come to herself.
The Administrator also came to realize that whenever Skuld used her power she would lose some of her memories.

101162801.name: Teammates: Before
101162801.desc: Verthandi attempted to help Apollo and Zenkibo recover their memories and regain control of themselves, but was found out before she could do so.

101162802.name: Teammates: After
101162802.desc: Apollo and Zenkibo were lured to Skuld who then freed them of Uld's control. The group then decided to rescue the others, while trying to figure out how to help Thor.

101162901.name: Old Wounds: Before
101162901.desc: Apollo and Zenkibo came up with a plan to take down their captain.

101162902.name: Old Wounds: After
101162902.desc: With the help of Apollo and Zenkibo, the Administrator managed to subdue Thor and lift the mind control she was under.

101163001.name: A New God: Before
101163001.desc: After a fruitless round of questioning, Uld transformed into an even more dangerous Black Valkyrie.

101163101.name: Way Out Is Way Back: Before
101163101.desc: Skuld transformed into a White Valkyrie to protect everyone.

101163102.name: Way Out Is Way Back: After
101163102.desc:
Tyr and Hodur, still under Uld's control, attacked the others, who were too fatigued to put up effective resistance.
Just as Uld was going to tamper with the Administrator's memories, Skuld came forward and stood between them, and Uld had no choice but to stop. It was then that Skuld saw his weakness.

101163201.name: An Old Friend Lost
101163201.desc:
At the CORG Research Institute. Rata would always tell Skuld stories before bedtime. But for some reason, she did not show up on this day.
After multiple attempts by Rata to escape the facility, it was ordered that she be destroyed.

101163301.name: A Door Wide Open
101163301.desc:
In the wide world outside were the mountains and the seas.
Skuld wanted to see and understand for herself the meaning of these words that Rata had told her about.

101163401.name: A Dream Once Lucid
101163401.desc:
In Ain Soph, Skuld met the kind-hearted owner of a boutique, and also met Tantan.
However, this was all a dream.

101163501.name: You, In a Sea of People
101163501.desc:
Skuld located Tantan once again in a vision, and saw the sea as she had longed to do. However, Skuld was still unable to understand the phrase "the wide world."
"See you next time."

101163601.name: You, Beyond the High Wall
101163601.desc:
Skuld once again met Tantan in a vision.
However, as result she forgot that she was not allowed to leave the Institute.

101163701.name: The Wall Falls
101163701.desc:
The Institute was turned upside down by Uld seeking to escape.
Amidst the chaos, Skuld finally stepped out of the facility in reality.

101163801.name: Echo From the Past
101163801.desc:
Skuld found a way to counter Uld in her recovered memories.
The correct answer.

101163901.name: Back to Zero
101163901.desc:
To tamper with a target's memories, Uld had to first read them. When Skuld returned to her present reality, Uld was trying to using his power on her.
As he tried to read memories, Skuld unleashed a torrent of visions.
Hundreds and thousands of visions overwhelmed Uld entirely.

101164001.name: Empty Words: Before
101164001.desc: Odin and Thor, who were out on a search, came upon a confused and incapacitated Uld and destroyed him.

101164002.name: Empty Words: After
101164002.desc: After Uld was killed, Odin seemed to have something else to attend to.

101164101.name: Empty
101164101.desc: Odin killed Skuld to keep up her end of a certain agreement.

101164201.name: Separate Ways
101164201.desc: Odin and Paracaesar met up at the amusement park as planned. Sensing something was off, Odin issued a warning to Paracaesar.

101164301.name: Before the Rain
101164301.desc:
A mysterious sound shattered the quiet of the real world. Faced with the girl never seen before, the Administrator pulled the trigger.
The CORG operative who arrived on scene later didn't find 0705's central chip.

101200101.name: Arrival in Xu Heng
101200101.desc: Following the Uld incident, Odin returned to Xu Heng to look for the Cinders. The Administrator and Verthandi arrived at the floating city of Yu Jing in Xu Heng at the request of the Quad.

101200201.name: The Quest
101200201.desc: At Tian Lu Traders, the Administrator and Verthandi met the Quad Modifiers Lingguang, Jianbing, and Linyu for the first time, and also learned about their mission: to locate the Heterocore for the good of Xu Heng.

101200301.name: A Mild Wind Blows: Before
101200301.desc: The group traveled to the Old Town, where the Administrator then attempted to look for the Heterocore with the help of Mimir. Unfortunately, they were attacked by Bane-corrupted AGI Mechas.

101200302.name: A Mild Wind Blows: After
101200302.desc: How the AGI Mechas were corrupted by Bane Energy was a mystery. The group put up in one of Tian Lu Traders' safehouses for the night as Mimir continued its search for the Heterocore.

101200401.name: Late Night: Before
101200401.desc: The Administrator and Lingguang got to talking late at night, and Lingguang learned that the Admin had lost their memories. Later in the night, Linyu was injured by a group of AGI Mechas.

101200402.name: Late Night: After
101200402.desc: Jianbing, Verthandi, and the Administrator managed to destroy the AGI Mechas attacking the safehouse. They ran into another Modifier from the Quad, Mengzhang, who then decided to travel with the group.

101200501.name: Fog and Mirrors: Before
101200501.desc: The group, taking its cue from Mimir, arrived at Mount Jingdu. Mengzhang cracked the code to the complicated spatial defense system in place, and then tried to ascend to the top.

101200502.name: Fog and Mirrors: After
101200502.desc: The puzzle was cracked, and a couple of Visbanes, eliminated. As Mengzhang and Linyu rejoined the group after a brief absence, they continued up the mountain.

101200601.name: Shifts and Changes: Before
101200601.desc: Midway up the mountain, the group walked into some kind of spatial trap and became separated. Linyu and Verthandi suspected that someone was behind this.

101200602.name: Shifts and Changes: After
101200602.desc: The Administrator, having become separated from the rest of the group, had to contend with the Visbanes on the mountain all by themselves. Thankfully, they were saved by Mengzhang just in time.

101200701.name: Paths Coming Together Again: Before
101200701.desc: Mengzhang gave a firearm to the Administrator, and managed to find a way out of their predicament. The two discussed the situation they were in and concluded that someone else was also after the Heterocore.

101200702.name: Paths Coming Together Again: After
101200702.desc: Linyu and Verthandi managed to avoid a powerful Visbane. After breaking out of the trap they were in, they continued up the mountain and encountered Lingguang along the way.

101200801.name: All But One
101200801.desc: The group was reunited but for Jianbing, who had been with Lingguang. Tension developed as Lingguang and Mengzhang began to doubt each other. As they pressed forward, they encountered an AGI Mecha guarding the mountaintop workshop.

101200901.name: Delusion Busted: Before
101200901.desc: The Administrator received a surprise stream of data after the AGI mecha was defeated, leading Mengzhang to take action and stop everyone else from heading up the mountain.

101200902.name: Delusion Busted: After
101200902.desc: Mengzhang, who took the Administrator hostage, told everyone else to head back down the mountain. But he was then unexpectedly killed by the Admin using his own gun.

101201001.name: Just One Step Away: Before
101201001.desc: The group continued up the mountain, leaving Lingguang behind to tend to Mengzhang's body. The Administrator, Linyu, and Verthandi hurried to the mountaintop workshop but ran into several AGI Mechas along the way.

101201002.name: Just One Step Away: After
101201002.desc: With the others gone, Lingguang suddenly launched a flame attack on the seemingly lifeless Mengzhang...

101201101.name: Surprise Turn: Before
101201101.desc: Inside the workshop, the Administrator, Linyu, and Verthandi located the Heterocore, and cracked its security mechanism. All of a sudden, however, Linyu turned to attack the Admin and Verthandi.

101201102.name: Surprise Turn: After
101201102.desc: The Administrator and Verthandi were attacked by a swarm of Visbanes summoned by "Linyu," who was however caught in yet another trap as she attempted to grab the Heterocore. Mengzhang and Lingguang fought their way into the workshop.

101201201.name: The Virtue of Distance: Before
101201201.desc: It turned out that Mengzhang's "run-in" with the group at the Old Town was quite deliberate, as was his "death by firearm." However, he did not manage to fool Lingguang and had to tell her about his plan.

101201202.name: The Virtue of Distance: After
101201202.desc: Mengzhang and Lingguang, who arrived at the mountaintop workshop before the rest of the group, laid a trap using the Heterocore while the others were being held up by the AGI Mechas.

101201301.name: Danger in the Fog: Before
101201301.desc: Following the great separation, Jianbing and Lingguang found themselves in a stranger-than-strange space brimming with Bane Energy.

101201302.name: Danger in the Fog: After
101201302.desc: With great exertion, Jianbing managed to send Lingguang back to Mount Jingdu, and Lingguang decided to focus on the Heterocore.

101201401.name: Feathers of Fire
101201401.desc: An injured Lingguang managed to force Gremory out from Linyu's body and protect the rest of the group from the Visbanes summoned. Gremory escaped with the Heterocore, and Mengzhang gave chase.

101201501.name: Back to the Fold
101201501.desc: Jianbing managed to free himself, and together with Mengzhang, took back the Heterocore in the Source Layer, while Gremory was saved by a mysterious power. The Modifiers, as well as Odin and Gengchen, the head of the Quad, reunited at the workshop, and everyone then made their way back to Yu Jing.

101204101.name: "Visitors"
101204101.desc: The day after everyone returned from Mount Jingdu. Odin granted permission for the Administrator and Verthandi to have a short break in Xu Heng, and Gengchen treated the trio from Aether Gazer to a feast. Deep down inside, however, the Admin knew that the peace in Xu Heng was temporary...

101204201.name: Of Dreams and Awakenings
101204201.desc: Plagued by dreams she could hardly remember, Verthandi told Lingguang about the time she had spent at the hospital. Yingzhao, Linyu's older sister, looked in on her, who had just awakened.

101204301.name: Reminiscence
101204301.desc: The trio from Aether Gazer had dinner with Gengchen, Lingguang, and Jianbing. Later on, the Administrator sent Odin off at the photon rail station, and Gengchen shared her thoughts about Modifiers with Verthandi.

101204401.name: Wander in Yu Jing
101204401.desc: The Administrator and Verthandi spent a day out together, during which they found out that they had a lot more things in common than they had thought.

101204501.name: The Great Swarm: Before
101204501.desc: A large number of Visbanes suddenly appeared at Tian Lu Traders. The Administrator and Verthandi arrived to help, and searched for lurking Visbanes in the courtyard.

101204502.name: The Great Swarm: After
101204502.desc: The troublesome Visbanes were finally disposed of by Gengchen. However, something was wrong with the Astral Engine, and Mimir detected signals from the Sephirah Core.

101204601.name: Lurking Presence
101204601.desc: The Administrator came to learn that the core of the Astral Engine was the Sephirah Core of Xu Heng itself, and that Gengchen had taken damage from keeping the core inside over a long time. On the streets of Yu Jing, a force that had hitherto lain dormant was watching...

101210102.name: Restart Progress
101210102.desc: Odin and Gengchen arrived at Old Town. As they opened up a passage to the Source Layer, they also began talking about the purpose of their search for the Cinders.

101210201.name: Declaration: Before
101210201.desc: In the Source Layer, Odin and Gengchen spoke about the "Source" that they were looking for, and what Odin found on her last outing with Thor.

101210202.name: Declaration: After
101210202.desc: Odin and Gengchen had a chat about the past while searching for the Cinders. Odin located the signal coordinates, and the two of them ventured deeper into the Source Layer.

101210301.name: Deep Dive: Before
101210301.desc: A giant Visbane fled with the Cinders; Odin and Gengchen had a difference in opinion during the pursuit. Eventually, the two agreed to first catch up with the Visbane before killing it at close range.

101210302.name: Deep Dive: After
101210302.desc: Odin and Gengchen managed to eliminate the Visbane and obtain the Cinders. Odin attempted to take the Cinders herself.

101210401.name: Seal Reversion
101210401.desc: Gengchen used her Prime Power to place a temporary seal on the Cinders as they were capable of corrupting Odin's Divine Power. The two agreed that Gengchen would hold on to the Cinders until Odin found a suitable way to transport them.

101210502.name: Return
101210502.desc: Odin and Gengchen encountered a powerful force of Bane Energy on their way back. They rushed to the source and ran into Jianbing and Mengzhang.

101214101.name: Reverse Collapse
101214101.desc: Gremory finally came to after being unconscious for four days, during which a companion had watched over her. They would also appear to have obtained some unexpected intel.

101214201.name: The Aftermath
101214201.desc: The attack on Tian Lu Traders had created quite the stir, and Khnum made his way to Tian Lu Traders again to try to get the evacuation going. The Administrator and Verthandi bade farewell to Gengchen as Odin had summoned them back to Ain Soph.

101214301.name: Under the Surface: Before
101214301.desc: Luliang came to Mount Jingdu after receiving a message from Yingzhao and discovered that the AGI Mechas on the mountain had all been corrupted by Bane Energy. Yingzhao was caught in a battle with these AGI Mechas, and fortunately Luliang was there to lend a hand.

101214302.name: Under the Surface: After
101214302.desc: Yingzhao provided Luliang with an update on the progress of her workshop task: the Cloudsong Ore on Mount Jingdu was showing signs of instability, meaning that the situation for the Astral Engine was probably not looking good, too.

101214401.name: The Actual Situation
101214401.desc: Lingguang learned that there had been further damage to Gengchen's Prime Power, and that it could never be fully restored. At this time, the Administrator and Verthandi arrived at the Quad, and Lingguang asked for the Administrator's help with investigating an energy signature down on the ground.

101214501.name: Item Not Found: Before
101214501.desc: Together with Gengchen, the Administrator and Verthandi traversed the Source Layer to get to the energy signature. Gengchen believed that someone or something might be after the Sephirah Core.

101214502.name: Item Not Found: After
101214502.desc: A special energy from the void was captured by Gengchen. However, the Cryptics were unable to identify it. As the trio were about to leave, Mimir received an SOS signal coming from somewhere nearby.

101214602.name: The Departed
101214602.desc: A prospecting team was attacked by an Encroacher Type Visbane. However, the trio arrived too late to save them. On a plain far, far away, a batholith was being torn from the ground by Cloudsong Ore...

101214701.name: To Stay or Go
101214701.desc: News of the Cloudsong Ore's instability had reached Yu Jing, and a crowd had formed outside the Quad seeking assurance. Gengchen chose to tell the truth but also promised that Xu Heng would never be abandoned. The Administrator and Verthandi decided to stay in Xu Heng to help. Odin agreed.

101214801.name: Blind Chess: Before
101214801.desc: Luliang arrived at the Quad to exchange intel with Gengchen. Having overheard that the Quad was short on Modifier manpower, Jianbing chose to investigate the situation down on the ground on his own. As he followed the Bane Energy trail, he ran into a Cognizant Visbane.

101214802.name: Blind Chess: After
101214802.desc: The Cognizant Visbane killed by Jianbing resurrected and also triggered a massive trap. Jianbing, swarmed by countless Visbanes, was dragged into the Source Layer.

101214901.name: Night Falls
101214901.desc: Two days later. A special Photon Rail service was about to depart. Luliang and Gengchen were discussing the future of Xu Heng when Luliang realized what Gengchen was planning, though she could not bear to put Gengchen on the spot. Together with Lingguang, the Administrator and Verthandi were working to maintain order at the Photon Rail station when they noticed that something was not quite right with Khnum.

101215001.name: The Secret is Dead
101215001.desc: Back in Ain Soph, Odin received a report from the Administrator. After obtaining more information about Khnum from Paracaesar, Odin surmised that something untoward had happened to Khnum and decided to travel to the Sephirah Zone Kemet to find out the truth herself.

101215003.name: New Leads
101215003.desc: Paracaesar's agents discovered some new leads on Khnum in Kemet.

101215101.name: Turing
101215101.desc: The Administrator received a CORG notice recalling Khnum all of a sudden, as well as instructions from Odin. Together with Lingguang and Verthandi, they exposed Khnum's true identity: a strange phenomenon who was able to use both Divine Power and Bane Energy and which called itself "Turing."

101215201.name: Aboveboard Plan: Before
101215201.desc: Odin rushed to Xu Heng, and at the Port, she cleared out the Visbanes which Turing had left behind. However, she left immediately after. A short time later, power to the Astral Engine was cut, CORG's particle cannons began firing at the city, and a Quake occurred in Yu Jing...
