101215202.name: Aboveboard Plan: After
101215202.desc: After quelling the situation at Port Carp with some difficulty, Lingguang made her way back to the Quad, which was under attack by Visbanes. The Administrator and Verthandi began looking for Odin.

101215301.name: Our Battle: Before
101215301.desc: Tian Lu Traders' response to the sudden Quake was a swift one: Luliang led a group of Modifiers, including Yingzhao, to the streets to fight the Visbanes, while Linyu stayed behind to watch over Tian Lu Traders.

101215302.name: Our Battle: After
101215302.desc: The little girl hiding by the road was saved by a whisker. Luliang learned that the folks who had been rescued earlier were all joining the rescue effort themselves. Yu Jing was standing strong in the face of disaster.

101215401.name: Why Not Go Back?: Before
101215401.desc: Luliang hurriedly got in touch with Gengchen when power to the Astral Engine was cut. Despite her misgivings about what Gengchen was going to do, she put on a cheerful face.

101215402.name: Why Not Go Back?: After
101215402.desc: Gengchen sensed Turing's presence and gave pursuit into the Source Layer. However, she then returned to the Surface Layer after realizing something was wrong with the Astral Engine and was intercepted by Odin at Chang'an Bridge as she was rushing back to the Quad.

101215501.name: Path of Prime
101215501.desc: Gengchen planned to sacrifice herself and use the Heterocore and the Cinders to stabilize the Astral Engine. Odin, who was aware of Gengchen's plan, believed however that Gengchen's life was more important than the continued existence of Xu Heng. The two were unable to agree on the subject and eventually started fighting.

101215601.name: By This Name Only
101215601.desc: Odin had no choice but to relent. After asking Odin to stabilize Xu Heng when the Sephirah Core appeared, Gengchen set off for the Astral Engine alone. The Administrator and Verthandi, who were looking for Odin, ran into Mengzhang, and the trio suddenly came under shelling. The Administrator's whereabouts became unknown.

101220101.name: Misjudgment: Before
101220101.desc: The Administrator was struck unconscious by the cannon fire and later roused by Verthandi. However, they came to only to discover that they'd been surrounded by Visbanes. Mengzhang, who'd been protecting the two of them, realized that he couldn't hold off the Visbanes any longer, and decided to try and break out with the two of them instead.

101220103.name: Misjudgment: During
101220103.desc: The group ducked into an alley to take shelter from the Visbane attack. Verthandi seemed to have something she was unable to share when questioned by a suspicious Mengzhang.

101220102.name: Misjudgment: After
101220102.desc: In the chaos of battle, Mengzhang found himself having to choose between escorting the Heterocore and ensuring the Administrator's safety. Just when he was about to make his decision, Luliang arrived with a group of Modifiers and defeated the Visbanes.

101220201.name: Splitting Up: Before
101220201.desc: Just half an hour prior, Luliang had led a group of Modifiers and defeated a swarm of Visbanes plaguing key infrastructural facilities in Yu Jing. However, unwilling to simply wait for the Quake to end, Luliang decided to be proactive and try to close the space rift caused by the Visbane invasion.

101220202.name: Splitting Up: After
101220202.desc: As the Visbane invasion on ground level came to an end, Luliang and Yingzhao received news of Visbanes now to their front and rear. Yingzhao returned to Tian Lu Traders by herself while Luliang led a group of Modifiers to rescue the Administrator's group surrounded by a Visbane swarm.

101220301.name: Regrouping: Before
101220301.desc: Tian Lu Traders was besieged by Visbanes all of a sudden. To reduce the load on the shield, Linyu decided to limit its protection to the bunker where people were hiding out while she fought the Visbanes herself. Just as it looked like all was lost for her, Yingzhao arrived.

101220302.name: Regrouping: After
101220302.desc: Together, Yingzhao and Linyu fought off the ferocious enemy, and regrouped with the returning Luliang and Administrator.

101220401.name: Goal of All: Before
101220401.desc: Following an analysis of the situation at Tian Lu Traders, it was decided that Mengzhang, Yingzhao, the Administrator, Verthandi, and Linyu would go to the Quad together. The Administrator received an improved Delusion Buster from Mengzhang.

101220402.name: Goal of All: After
101220402.desc: Just as everyone was about to arrive at the Quad, a huge Source Layer fissure opened up in the sky. Countless Visbanes began falling from above, worsening the battle situation.

101220501.name: Every Second Counts: Before
101220501.desc: To prevent the Source Layer fissure from swallowing up the Astral Engine, Mengzhang decided to make one last-ditch attempt, even if it'd cost him his life. Just as everyone had lost hope, Gengchen appeared and rushed into the fissure to close it.

101220502.name: Every Second Counts: After
101220502.desc: Odin came to where Xu Heng's ley lines converged, and tried to use her Divine Power lock the data underlying Xu Heng's space. But because of this, she was also unable to solve the problem that was going on up in the skies.

101220601.name: Ready to Go
101220601.desc: The Quad's defensive front was holding strong. Following the arrival of the Administrator and the rest at the Quad, Yingzhao took Linyu to the Engine Monitoring Room inside the Quad while Mengzhang took the Administrator and Verthandi to the Astral Engine.

101220701.name: But for One Thing
101220701.desc: The Administrator, Verthandi, and Mengzhang rushed to the Engine Monitoring Room and successfully restarted the shield around the Astral Engine. But just as Mengzhang was about to replace the Sephirah Core inside the Engine with the Heterocore, Turing suddenly appeared in the main control room.

101220801.name: Black Box: Before
101220801.desc: The gray-skinned Cognizant Visbane who'd come with Turing was Novich. Turing defeated Mengzhang with ease and then began to take apart the defenses Mengzhang had established for the Sephirah Core.

101220802.name: Black Box: After
101220802.desc: Novich urged Turing to kill the Administrator and Verthandi, and Mengzhang gave it his all to try and send the two of them back to Yu Jing. However, Turing had already noticed that there was something different about the Administrator's and Verthandi's bodies...

101220901.name: Looking Back With a Startle: Before
101220901.desc: On the streets, the Administrator and Verthandi detected Odin's Divine Grace, and decided to look for her to see if they could find a way to counter Turing.

101220902.name: Looking Back With a Startle: After
101220902.desc: Verthandi was abducted by Gremory. Guided by the jade pendant given by Gengchen, the Administrator tried to locate Verthandi by themselves. As communications resumed, the Administrator informed the Quad that Turing was on board the Astral Engine.

101221001.name: Unspoken Regret: Before
101221001.desc: The Administrator traveled to Port Carp but was unable to locate Verthandi. The signals from the jade pendant disappeared, and the Admin then encountered Gremory and inexplicably passed out. When they came to, the Admin found that they had lost all their memories and was in Ain Soph's Source Layer for some reason. They were later rescued by a young female Modifier.

101221002.name: Unspoken Regret: After
101221002.desc: The Administrator's monster was defeated by the girl. Although the Administrator suffered no injury, they passed out from extreme exhaustion.

101221101.name: A Stray Bird
101221101.desc: The Administrator came to in Ain Soph, but without any memories of the past. With the help of a girl named Verthandi, they began to re-integrate themselves into everyday human life.

101221201.name: Alone in the Wild: Before
101221201.desc: Things went well for the Administrator at work, and they managed to maintain a positive relationship with Verthandi. However, as disaster struck, the two were forced to take separate ways due to their identities and responsibilities. What do you do when you find yourself absolutely powerless? Would you resign yourself to your fate, or fight...?

101221202.name: Alone in the Wild: After
101221202.desc: The Administrator trudged through the Source Layer alone, but found their consciousness just as they were on the brink of death. They used Delusion Buster to shatter the illusory world they were in and found Verthandi, who was also looking for them.

101221301.name: Unwitting Conflict: Before
101221301.desc: The Administrator and Verthandi awoke from the illusion at the same time. Although they were by themselves, they had no intention of capitulating to Gremory. However, their resistance was perhaps futile.

101221302.name: Unwitting Conflict: After
101221302.desc: Verthandi's Access Key was shattered by Gremory, but the Administrator bought precious time for Verthandi with a stealth attack. A new burst of power emerged from Ver's body: it looked like she'd had this counterattack brewing for a while now.

101221401.name: Follow The Heart: Before
101221401.desc: Not long after Verthandi fell prey to Gremory's illusion, she was awakened by the voice that had appeared in her dreams countless times. However, after learning that the Administrator was also trapped in the illusion, Ver decided to take the risk and go back to rescue them.

101221403.name: Follow The Heart: During
101221403.desc: At this moment, Verthandi was engaged in a fierce fight with another voice deep in her heart. After stabbing her opponent with her long sword, though, she heard something totally unexpected...

101221402.name: Follow The Heart: After
101221402.desc: In her childhood, Verthandi used to cower in a corner of the yard, until her companion encouraged her to step out, and made a promise with her that inspired her to move forward: they'd muster up their courage to protect everything around them.

101221501.name: Even When Ground to Dust: Before
101221501.desc: Before leaving the illusion, Verthandi braced herself to accept a dangerous power inside her body. While there was the possibility that she'd be devoured by this power in turn, she'd do whatever was necessary to protect Yu Jing and the Administrator.

101221502.name: Even When Ground to Dust: After
101221502.desc: Gremory was defeated by Verthandi. However, a mountain top from the ground crashed into Yu Jing, and the Administrator was knocked off Yu Jing by Visbanes sent by Gremory. Ver made a difficult choice.

101224101.name: An Old Acquaintance: Before
101224101.desc: Novich located the Administrator and Verthandi. But just as he was about to kill them, he was forced back by a mysterious Modifier.

101224103.name: An Old Acquaintance: During
101224103.desc: The sudden appearance of the Modifier forced Novich to retreat using a Visbane cover.

101224102.name: An Old Acquaintance: After
101224102.desc: Jianbing fought his way back to Old Town from the Source Layer, and recognized the mysterious Modifier, Thoth. Jianbing entrusted the injured Administrator and Verthandi to Thoth, then rushed back to Yu Jing to help.

101224203.name: With New Doubts: During
101224203.desc: Several decades prior: the Astral Engine had just been completed. Thoth and Lingguang co-led a team to clear out Visbanes from Old Town.

101224202.name: With New Doubts: After
101224202.desc: Although the Cloudsong Crisis was resolved in the end, everyone at the Quad as well as Thoth (whom CORG had sent to assist Xu Heng) had questions about what happened.

101224302.name: Rendezvous and Reconnection
101224302.desc: CORG's reinforcements met up with the Modifiers led by Luliang at Tian Lu Traders. The situation gradually improved. Comms were restored in Yu Jing, and the Quad received news about Turing.

101224401.name: Last Resort: Before
101224401.desc: Mengzhang feigned cooperation with Turing, hoping to buy some time, but Turing finally saw through his gambit. Fortunately, Mengzhang found a way to escape.

101224402.name: Last Resort: After
101224402.desc: Time was not on the Quad's side: signs that the Cloudsong Ore was going out of control were emerging. Seeing that Turing was about to get his hands on the Sephirah Core, Mengzhang decided to take a drastic measure.

101224501.name: Despite the Dead End: Before
101224501.desc: Decades prior, not long after the Cloudsong Crisis. Mengzhang, who had lived in the mountains for a long time, prepared to leave the mountains for the Quad after paying respects to the deceased Zhu.

101224502.name: Despite the Dead End: After
101224502.desc: Mengzhang met with Gengchen. After listening to Gengchen explain her vision for the Quad and the deputies' responsibilities, he accepted the position of deputy of Yuyi Isle. It was time for him to give up everything and take up his responsibilities as Gengchen had hoped.

101224602.name: Endless Night
101224602.desc: The chaos of the Yu Jing Quake was finally over thanks to the efforts of Tian Lu Traders and CORG. However, the Astral Engine suddenly stopped, and unknown to the others, inside the Engine Monitoring Room, Mengzhang had been severely injured by Turing. What had become of him?

101224701.name: A Game of Chess
101224701.desc: Today's game was an echo of all the chess games of the past. But even if everything was destined, Gengchen's only choice nevertheless was to do her best to try and change the future.

101224801.name: Spare No Effort: Before
101224801.desc: Mengzhang was saved by Gengchen, though seriously injured. He was then taken off the Astral Engine by Lingguang for treatment. Mengzhang rushed back to the Engine Monitoring Room after a slight rebound, for he had something important for Linyu.

101224802.name: Spare No Effort: After
101224802.desc: Mengzhang handed the Heterocore to Linyu, hoping that Linyu could use the Heterocore to restart Astral Engine and stabilize the Cloudsong Ore while Gengchen was holding Turing at bay.

101224901.name: Parallel Wills
101224901.desc: A face-off between Gengchen and Turing on the Astral Engine. The two could not come to an agreement on the Sephirah Core, and nor could they understand each other, and so the inevitable fight ensued.

101225003.name: Heaven and Earth
101225003.desc: The battle between Gengchen and Turing was interrupted by a commotion caused by Verthandi over in Port Carp, and Turing attempted to escape into the Source Layer. However, his escape route was blocked off by Gengchen, and the two started fighting again.

101225103.name: Heavy is the Weight
101225103.desc: Gengchen removed the seal that was on Sephirah Core, and threw herself into battle against Turing as Odin continued to keep Xu Heng stable.

101225201.name: God's Fury: Before
101225201.desc: Seeing that Gengchen had gone missing, Turing made a plan to return to the Astral Engine with Cognizant Visbanes by his side to try and snatch the Sephirah Core. However, he was intercepted in the Source Layer by Odin.

101225202.name: God's Fury: After
101225202.desc: The Cognizant Visbanes suffered a major setback due to Odin's attacks, and the remaining ones only managed to retreat at the cost of a grave injury to Turing. Odin, unable to give chase, returned to Yu Jing by herself.

101225301.name: Departure Impending
101225301.desc: The next day. The Administrator came to at the Quad. Lingguang found a letter from Gengchen entrusting the Quad's affairs to Mengzhang. Odin and the Administrator made their return back to Ain Soph, and something had changed with the both of them.

101225401.name: The Tea is Cold
101225401.desc: Odin questioned Red Fox, the head of the CORG Supreme Directorate President, and Paracaesar about recent events. The Administrator learned about what happened to Verthandi and paid her a visit.

101230101.name: The Autumn Wind Blows
101230101.desc: The shadows from the forest have enveloped Sasanami again. The Administrator has no choice but to bid goodbye to the still-unconscious Verthandi and embark on this new mission.

101230201.name: Back to Sasanami: Before
101230201.desc: For this operation, the Administrator and the Pheasant Squad must work together with a CORG operative—That in itself will be no easy feat.

101230202.name: Back to Sasanami: After
101230202.desc: The investigation team discovers the unknown creature in their intel, raising new questions.

101230301.name: Gallant in the Woods: Before
101230301.desc: In an unexpected development, the team—ever vigilant for Visbanes—is led into a trap by a human.

101230302.name: Gallant in the Woods: After
101230302.desc: Deep in the forests, the investigation team meets with an unexpected foe, and also an unexpected leg-up.

101230401.name: Ninkyoumon
101230401.desc: Their newest companion calls herself "Ninkyoumon". She is a Modifier, but claims to have received a job from a human.

101230501.name: Lady of the Akishikas: Before
101230501.desc: The first wave of beasts has already reached Shimogyou District. The Administrator must solve this crisis first.

101230502.name: Lady of the Akishikas: After
101230502.desc: After a heated battle, the Administrator finally meets the head of the Akishikas that Kuramitsuha spoke of.

101230601.name: Retreat to Advance: Before
101230601.desc: Akishika Himiko persuades the Administrator to accept her tactical arrangement. Perhaps this will be a new turning point.

101230602.name: Retreat to Advance: After
101230602.desc: It's a huge risk, but Akishika Himiko's plan manages to repel the wave of beasts.

101230701.name: A New Situation: Before
101230701.desc: Following Shu's cautious reminder, the Administrator still decides not to fully trust Akishika Himiko.

101230702.name: A New Situation: After
101230702.desc: Saboteurs suddenly appear near the city walls, and there seems to be more to the Visbeast crisis than meets the eye. The investigation team has no choice but to split up.

101230801.name: The Deer God
101230801.desc: While the Administrator looks into the legend of the Deer God, Buzenbo is getting closer to the secret hidden deep in the forest.

101230901.name: The Breath of the Hills: Before
101230901.desc: Buzenbo has a lone encounter with a formidable opponent, but she still has a mission to carry out.

101230902.name: The Breath of the Hills: After
101230902.desc: After analyzing the legend of the Deer God, the Administrator decides to take the investigation in a new direction. However, this leads to new problems.

101231001.name: Shimogyou: Before
101231001.desc: Kuramitsuha suddenly appears and uses a simple trick to come to the beleaguered Administrator's aid. She may be of some help in the investigation to come.

101231002.name: Shimogyou: After
101231002.desc: Kuramitsuha helps the Administrator to locate the suspects, but the truth must be uncovered before catching them.

101231102.name: A Strange Kind of Chivalry: After
101231102.desc: As the team takes a short rest after losing its target, the Administrator unexpectedly learns about Kuramitsuha's past.

101231201.name: The Dark Side of the Akishika Family: Before
101231201.desc: An unexpected informant makes a sudden appearance. After reluctantly coming to an agreement, the investigation team is finally closing in on its objective.

101231202.name: The Dark Side of the Akishika Family: After
101231202.desc: A sudden reversal of the truth baffles the Administrator, and a greater crisis has already reared its ugly head.

101234301.name: A Memory With No Name: Before
101234301.desc: After escaping into the memory of a certain existence, the Administrator surprisingly encounters Akishika Himiko at a time before she's become the head of her family.

101234302.name: A Memory With No Name: After
101234302.desc: A conversation allows the Administrator to finally understand the real reason Akishika Himiko became the head of her family.

101234402.name: A Fight From Days Past: After
101234402.desc: The Administrator helps the Akishika Himiko in the memory to complete her mission. However, they return from the chaos only to remain trapped in the hands of the Deer God's followers.

101234501.name: A Futile Attempt at Assistance: Before
101234501.desc: Kuninotokotachi learns a part of the truth about the Akishika from Kuramitsuha. However, she is still worried about the Administrator, whose whereabouts remain unknown.

101234502.name: A Futile Attempt at Assistance: After
101234502.desc: Just when all seems bleak again, a special signal flare promises to bring about a turn for the better.

101234601.name: Unexpected Aid: Before
101234601.desc: The Administrator gets an unexpected helping hand.

101234602.name: Unexpected Aid: After
101234602.desc: Sekhmet, who's been away from the squad for some time, appears and helps the Administrator out of trouble. However, the intel obtained from these believers only brings on more questions.

101234701.name: Shinku's Blade: Before
101234701.desc: Buzenbo, who's been fighting by herself for a while, notices a change in the enemy's movements. This may be the opportunity she's been waiting for.

101234702.name: Shinku's Blade: After
101234702.desc: Buzenbo finally sends back a message. The investigation squad no longer has any time for rest.

101234801.name: A Promise Witnessed By Fireworks
101234801.desc: The memories of the fireworks are long gone, and the only thing Kuramitsuha, who has made a promise, can do is to move on.

101234901.name: What They Call Destiny: Before
101234901.desc: As the investigation squad give all they've got on the battlefield, Akishika Himiko seems to have already made a certain decision.

101234902.name: What They Call Destiny: After
101234902.desc: Akishika Himiko is taken down by a family elder using despicable means. The situation in Shimogyou rapidly deteriorates.

101235001.name: Silence of the Cannons: Before
101235001.desc: Buzenbo finally returns to the squad. But the sudden halt in the city's artillery defense turns the heat up on the squad again.

101235002.name: Silence of the Cannons: After
101235002.desc: After finally getting back to the city wall, the Administrator discovers an even bigger crisis.

101235101.name: The Oracle: Before
101235101.desc: Akishika Hisahide's speech has captivated his audience. However, those who would never allow Akishika Himiko to be sacrificed has also arrived on the scene.

101235102.name: The Oracle: After
101235102.desc: After using her fists to clear the way and save her best friend, Kuramitsuha reiterates the promise she's decided to keep.

101235201.name: Night Parade of the Beasts: Before
101235201.desc: The beasts are here, and the Administrator must make a decision.

101235202.name: Night Parade of the Beasts: After
101235202.desc: The leader of the zealots martyrs himself in the end, though his final words foreshadow some kind of ending that is simply unacceptable to the Administrator.

101235301.name: A Heart On Madoibi Fire: Before
101235301.desc: Akishika Himiko finally makes it clear that she's ready to rewrite her own destiny and meet the end she has chosen for herself.

101235302.name: A Heart On Madoibi Fire: After
101235302.desc: The originally promised farewell is finally here. As the sun rises, an old friend leaves.

101235401.name: A New Promise
101235401.desc: Now that one has decided to look to the future, it's time for a new promise to be made.

103170101.name: Before The Rain Falls: Before
103170101.desc:
Lord Karasugo Sendou wants CORG to stop the investigation into the Karasugo family, but he is met with Izuru Masayoshi's refusal.
Carrying out the mission Odin assigned to her, Tsukuyomi crosses blades with Kagutsuchi in the Karasugo family home.

103170102.name: Before The Rain Falls: After
103170102.desc:
Tsukuyomi winds up trapped in a strange space with no means of escape, while a mysterious girl creates a force field for the Karasugo family.
Soon after, Aether Gazer and CORG's join investigation into the Karasugo family is about to begin.

103170201.name: Message From the Shadows
103170201.desc:
CORG loses contact with all the agents it sent to investigate the Karasugo family. All attempts to reach them return the same reply: "The Crow God has been destroyed."
With the new-and-improved Mimir in tow, the Administrator and Kuninotokotachi head to Shimogyou.

103170301.name: Strange Rules: Before
103170301.desc: Sekhmet senses that the Crow God's sway over the people of Sasanami has weakened. She regroups with the Administrator and the two head to the Karasugo family home to investigate.

103170302.name: Strange Rules: After
103170302.desc: The group learns of the Crow God's resurrection from the Karasugo servants. Meanwhile, a note from the missing Agent H describes some strange Karasugo family rules.

103170303.name: Strange Rules: During
103170303.desc: The group runs into the missing Agent K, who offers them some new information.

103170401.name: Separated: Before
103170401.desc: The group decides to break the rules and use Mimir to call in help from outside, but Kagutsuchi stops them.

103170402.name: Separated: After
103170402.desc: To get Mimir back, the group breaks the rules again, entering a corridor that leads out of the Karasugo home. But the changing space separates the Administrator from the others.

103170501.name: Senba: Before
103170501.desc: The Administrator is ambushed by Karasugo servants, but a girl calling herself "Senba" comes to the rescue. Senba decides to take the Administrator to a safe place.

103170502.name: Senba: After
103170502.desc: The Modifier called Senba clams up whenever the Administrator mentions the Karasugo family. Her aloofness keeps the two from getting any closer to each other.

103170601.name: To the Source: Before
103170601.desc: Kuninotokotachi and Sekhmet regroup after being separated. Now, their top priority is to locate the Administrator and continue investigating the Karasugo family.

103170602.name: To the Source: After
103170602.desc: Sekhmet gleans from the Karasugo servant's questions that the Karasugo family head isn't Karasugo Sendou—Rather, it's a horrifying creature responsible for shaping the vision of the Karasugo family today.

103170701.name: The Girl's Promise
103170701.desc: The Administrator manages to get closer to Senba through the sharing of food. Meanwhile, Senba makes good on her promise to bring the Administrator somewhere safe.

103170801.name: The Emotional Choice: Before
103170801.desc: Even Karasugo servants that are rebelling against the Crow God take the two for enemies upon seeing Senba.

103170802.name: The Emotional Choice: After
103170802.desc: Realizing that Senba is on the side of the Crow God, the Administrator wants to make a run for it, but ultimately decides to trust her and try to understand where she's coming from.

103170901.name: Crow Visbane: Before
103170901.desc: During the investigation, Sekhmet and her team are attacked by power Visbanes with mentally destructive capabilities.

103170902.name: Crow Visbane: After
103170902.desc: After wiping out all the Visbanes, Sekhmet and her team regroup with Agent K and continue their investigation into the Karasugo family.

103171002.name: Breaking the Cycle: After
103171002.desc: Deducing that there must be both a way in and out of the looping space, Sekhmet finds the mechanism by paying attention to the environmental changes between loops.

103171003.name: Breaking the Cycle: During
103171003.desc: Sekhmet and the others infer that they'll be able to defeat the Crow God by defeating the true head of the Karasugo family. To find that person, the group decides to adopt the same behavior as the Karasugo servants.

103171101.name: Inevitable: Before
103171101.desc: A dispute breaks out among the Karasugo servants in front of them. With the Administrator following her lead, Senba prepares to give the Karasugo servants the slip so they can reach the safe zone.

103171102.name: Inevitable: After
103171102.desc: After being discovered, Senba makes quick work of the Karasugo servants. The Karasugo servants are convinced that the Crow God has influenced the Administrator's mind.

103171201.name: Strength and Weakness: Before
103171201.desc: After reaching the safe zone, Senba insists that the Administrator stay there, but the Administrator wants to do something. As they argue, a group of Visbanes descend upon them.

103171202.name: Strength and Weakness: After
103171202.desc: Seeing the wounded Administrator reminds Senba of her mother. They talk, and the Administrator realizes that Senba intends to sacrifice herself to put an end to all this. The Administrator wants to stop her, but loses consciousness instead.

103171301.name: The Scroll: Before
103171301.desc: Agent F rescues the gravely wounded Agent G, who possesses a scroll with vital information on it. Meanwhile, Sekhmet and the others hear gunfire and rush to help.

103171302.name: The Scroll: After
103171302.desc: Agent F takes the dying Agent G to regroup with Sekhmet and the others.

103171401.name: Izanami: Before
103171401.desc: The group gathers that the "Izanami" mentioned in the scroll is the incarnation of the Crow God. Kagutsuchi then makes a timely appearance with the intent to stop their investigation.

103171402.name: Izanami: After
103171402.desc: Sekhmet tells Kagutsuchi her theory, but she's unable to explain the first rule. Meanwhile, droves of Karasugo servants are converging in a certain direction—the location of Izanami.

103171501.name: Devotion: Before
103171501.desc: Regaining consciousness, the Administrator learns Senba's real name—Izanami. Kuninotokotachi and the other arrive and battle with Izanami.

103171502.name: Devotion: After
103171502.desc: Izanami is defeated. The alter-dimension enveloping the Karasugo home shifts sharply, once again separating the group.

103171601.name: His Choice
103171601.desc:
Before the space changes, Kagutsuchi asks the Administrator—whose memory is still intact—to help Izanami escape her tragic fate.
Meanwhile in the real world, Izuru Masayoshi meets with the present-day Child of Heaven.

103171701.name: Return: Before
103171701.desc: Tsukuyomi is trapped endlessly battling past enemies before finally facing Orochi again.

103171702.name: Return: After
103171702.desc: A mysterious being wants to make a deal with Tsukuyomi, but she refuses. The being then dispels the strange place, sending Tsukuyomi back to the Karasugo family home.

103171801.name: Bladechoosing: Before
103171801.desc: After losing his memory, Kagutsuchi dreams about having a conversation with Izanami before immediately being faced with the first trial of the Bladechoosing.

103171802.name: Bladechoosing: After
103171802.desc: The mysterious being wants to get rid of the Administrator, but is stopped by Ryugiri. The Administrator learns from Shadow Crow that they're currently in the Bladechoosing from four years earlier.

103171901.name: Caged Bird: Before
103171901.desc: The two find the amnesiac Kagutsuchi, and he accepts their suggestion. Using Ryugiri, he wins one competition after another.

103171902.name: Caged Bird: After
103171902.desc: The Administrator and Shadow Crow ponder over the true objective of the Bladechoosing. The Administrator then accidentally meets Izanami again.

103172001.name: Regroup: Before
103172001.desc: Sekhmet rescues Kuninotokotachi, whose mind has been rewritten. Just then, Visbanes attack.

103172002.name: Regroup: After
103172002.desc: Faced with so many Visbanes, Kuninotokotachi and Sekhmet plan to withdraw, only to run into Tsukuyomi as she arrives.

103172101.name: Truth in a Paper Ball: Before
103172101.desc: The three begin to doubt whether Izanami is the true form of the Crow God. Hearing gunfire in the distance, they rush over to help.

103172102.name: Truth in a Paper Ball: After
103172102.desc: The gravely wounded Agent R sacrifices his life, and a paper ball found in the hand of the body of Agent B beside him reveals a new clue.

103172201.name: The Meme Crow: Before
103172201.desc: Based on the new information, Sekhmet begins an experiment to delve into the true nature of the Crow God.

103172202.name: The Meme Crow: After
103172202.desc: The group learns that Crow God is essentially a kind of meme monster. Just then, Sekhmet receives a communication from the Administrator.

103172301.name: Trust: Before
103172301.desc: The Administrator opens up Izanami's heart, gaining her trust and a "mark." The Administrator gives the mark to Kagutsuchi to use in the competition.

103172302.name: Trust: After
103172302.desc: With the Madoibi generated by the mark and the power of Ryugiri, Kagutsuchi wins another victory.

103172401.name: Operation Twilight: Before
103172401.desc: Kagutsuchi senses that his mind has been rewritten. To stop the Bladechoosing from ending in massive casualties, the group decides to contact the outside world. That night, they arrive at the Crow's Nest, ready to take back Mimir.

103172402.name: Operation Twilight: After
103172402.desc: The group distracts the guards while Shadow Crow goes to retrieve Mimir on his own, not expecting to be discovered by eyes watching from the darkness.

103172501.name: Rebellion of Flame: Before
103172501.desc: Caught by the guards, Shadow Crow becomes Kagutsuchi's opponent in the competition. Finding himself in a predicament, Kagutsuchi decides to rebel.

103172503.name: Rebellion of Flame: During
103172503.desc: It's as if Kagutsuchi's own determination is pulling him down, into some illusion.

103172502.name: Rebellion of Flame: After
103172502.desc: Confronted directly with his own inner weakness, Kagutsuchi regains his memory. After escaping the ring, he takes Mimir to regroup with the Administrator and the others.

103172601.name: The Path She Chose: Before
103172601.desc: Mimir contacts Sekhmet and gives her the Administrator's coordinates. Tsukuyomi and the others mount a rescue.

103172602.name: The Path She Chose: After
103172602.desc: After the two groups meet back up, Kagutsuchi reveals Izanami's plan. The key to rescuing Izanami is Agent E, who has the memory-wiping device.

103172701.name: Nightmare
103172701.desc: Izanami remembers her mother's murder. The killer was Izanami's adoptive sister, Akika—the current Child of Heaven.

103172801.name: Case 2950: Before
103172801.desc: After overcoming the Karasugo servants' attempt to thwart them, the group finally finds the seriously injured, memory-wiped Agent E.

103172802.name: Case 2950: After
103172802.desc: The recording pen in Agent E's bag contains a record of the agents' operation to resolve the Karasugo family crisis. However, the Crow God rewrote the agents' minds again, and they ran off in the direction of the Crow's Nest.

103172901.name: Brutal Solution: Before
103172901.desc: The influenced agents' feelings allow them to break free of the Crow God's mind rewriting. But just then, a pack of Visbanes launch an attack on the group.

103172902.name: Brutal Solution: After
103172902.desc: Karasugo Sendou agrees to help the Crow God spread the meme's influence, which seeps into the Surface Layer. Right at the critical moment, Agent H is ready to solve Case 2950.

103173001.name: Meeting Death: Before
103173001.desc: In order to weaken the Crow God's power, the CORG agents decide to turn their guns on themselves take their own lives.

103173002.name: Meeting Death: After
103173002.desc: The group splits up. While they destroy the Crow God, the Administrator will save Izanami.

103173101.name: Fall of the Crow: Before
103173101.desc: Tsukuyomi, Kuninotokotachi, and Kagutsuchi face the Crow God in its new corporeal form—Kamonomakoto.

103173102.name: Fall of the Crow: After
103173102.desc: The agents' heroic sacrifice brings the meme data below critical mass. The Administrator seizes this opportunity to rescue Izanami from the Crow God's clutches.

103173201.name: Last Light of the Day
103173201.desc: The Crow God finally beaten, the space enveloping the Karasugo house shatters, and the Karasugo family sees the light of day again. In her conversation with Karasugo Sendou, Sekhmet gets the feeling that the source of Sasanami's problems is the Child of Heaven, as well as the Izuru family...

103180101.name: Discussion
103180101.desc: With the Karasugo Family affair settled, those who had been hostile not long ago get together to discuss the Child of Heaven intel. However, the situation is turned on its head before a conclusion can be reached.

103180201.name: Gunfire: Before
103180201.desc: With the Imperial Army and their artillery fire drawing near, the Karasugo Family decides to abandon this place before they're surrounded.

103180202.name: Gunfire: After
103180202.desc: Having regrouped deep in the woods, Mimir analyzes the strange energy in the artillery fire.

103180301.name: Branching Paths
103180301.desc: The injured Karasugo Sendou and Kuninotokotachi regain consciousness, and the Admin suggests that the troops be split between three targets: the Imperial City, the Shimogyou District, and the Photon Rail Nexus.

103180401.name: Amnesia
103180401.desc: Buzenbo and Ningishzida meet in Reiten. Buzenbo is the first to try and pull the Sakuragiri out, but is instead pulled into the blade's painful memories of an apocalyptic battlefield.

103180501.name: Tumult in Reiten: Before
103180501.desc: The Imperial Army is advancing on Reiten, leaving all of the citizens in their wake in some kind of strange, dazed state. Buzenbo and Ningishzida leave the bunker to see what changes have come over the city.

103180502.name: Tumult in Reiten: After
103180502.desc: Buzenbo decides to explore the so-called "Imperial City," Reiten Palace, while Ningishzida leaves Reiten to find reinforcements.

103180601.name: Reiten Palace: Before
103180601.desc: A deathly silence hangs over Reiten Palace, and the place is crawling with Visbanes. Buzenbo goes deep into the palace complex and takes out the turrets suspected of targeting the Karasugo Family.

103180602.name: Reiten Palace: After
103180602.desc: Buzenbo is considering whether she should continue exploring the palace when a strange girl appears before her.

103180701.name: The Fall: Before
103180701.desc: After talking to the strange girl, Buzenbo realizes that she's actually the Child of Heaven, who easily defeats her with Bane Energy and sends her plummeting into the palace moat. Buzenbo finds an underwater structure and decides to search for another path.

103180702.name: The Fall: After
103180702.desc: Buzenbo looks for another exit to the underwater building, but is assailed by a swarm of Visbanes. Just as they're about to overcome her, someone appears.

103180801.name: Kamigyou: Before
103180801.desc: Two people on their way to the Photon Rail Nexus and the Imperial City reach the Kamigyou District and notice that something's off.

103180802.name: Kamigyou: After
103180802.desc: Everyone meets up with Ningishzida and tells her the intel they have on the Child of Heaven. A local Sasanami Mod who isn't strong in combat offers to help resettle the civilians.

103180901.name: Separation and Meeting: Before
103180901.desc: Having assessed the current situation and set a time to meet again, the two people on their way to the Photon Rail Nexus and the Imperial City part ways. Tsukuyomi and Kuninotokotachi enter the Imperial City.

103180902.name: Separation and Meeting: After
103180902.desc: Tsukuyomi and Kuninotokotachi come across Akika, the Child of Heaven, disguised as a little girl.

103181001.name: Initial Battle: Before
103181001.desc: Akika uses her sensory blocking ability. In the darkness, Tsukuyomi suddenly recovers her lost memories before Kuninotokotachi breaks the spell. Furious, Akika summons a horde of Visbanes.

103181002.name: Initial Battle: After
103181002.desc: Akika taunts Kuninotokotachi about the exiled Sansaru clan and shows Tsukuyomi an illusion of Buzenbo's dead body. She capitalizes on their weaknesses.

103181101.name: Unbeatable Adversary: Before
103181101.desc: The person who showed up to help Buzenbo is the Prime Lord Izuru Masayoshi, who leads her to safety. However, Buzenbo can sense the Bane Energy emanating from him and does not trust him.

103181102.name: Unbeatable Adversary: After
103181102.desc: After resting up, Buzenbo continues searching for the exit, but she comes across the slain Snake God who possesses her again. On the brink of death, Buzenbo has no choice but to pull out Sakuragiri.

103181201.name: Fearless Heart
103181201.desc: Finding herself back inside Sakuragiri's pained memories, Buzenbo remembers Tsukuyomi saying she believes in her, and this gives her the courage to face the apocalyptic battlefield.

103181301.name: Simple and Fast: Before
103181301.desc: Buzenbo awakens and uses the moves she's practiced thousands of times to shake off the Snake God, removing its corrosive influence.

103181302.name: Simple and Fast: After
103181302.desc: Having taken care of the Snake God, Buzenbo practices the new moves she learned in the Sakuragiri memories against the Visbanes and decides to cut out a new path directly above her.

103181401.name: Sly Victory: Before
103181401.desc: Buzenbo reaches the fight in Reiten Palace at a critical juncture. Reunited, the Pheasant Squad battle Akika together.

103181402.name: Sly Victory: After
103181402.desc: The three of them want to interrogate the defeated Akika, but she disappears. They decide to reconvene in Reiten, but Kuninotokotachi senses an immense build-up of Bane Energy in the air.

103181501.name: Photon Rail Nexus: Before
103181501.desc: The CORG garrison are forced to retreat from the Photon Rail Nexus, and they are struggling to resist the Visbane onslaught. The new arrivals head straight to the front line to offer their support.

103181502.name: Photon Rail Nexus: After
103181502.desc: The manager of the Photon Rail Nexus is close friends with H and E, who sacrificed themselves in the Karasugo Family incident. Sekhmet reassures him that their deaths won't be in vain. Right after the group has rested and prepared themselves, there's an explosion at Reiten Palace.

103181601.name: Exploring the Path: Before
103181601.desc:
Progress is made when Shu finds information about Sasanami being disconnected in Odin's archives.
The Admin and three Mods form an advanced exploration party to find clues on the edges of Photon Rail Square.

103181602.name: Exploring the Path: After
103181602.desc: The group returns to their temporary base and contacts Shu.

103181701.name: Ready to Act
103181701.desc: Right as Heimdall provides a way to reconnect Sasanami, Reiten Palace explodes into flames.

103181801.name: Shimogyou: Before
103181801.desc: The evacuation does not go as planned. Kagutsuchi finds a distraught Karasugo Sendou, and the two of them head to the city wall to meet the Imperial Army's advanced troops.

103181802.name: Shimogyou: After
103181802.desc: Shimogyou residents welcome an Imperial Army squadron through one of the side gates.

103181901.name: Wisdom and Folly: Before
103181901.desc: Karasugo Sendou tries his best to persuade the Shimogyou residents to evacuate, but to no avail. He therefore decides to order the Karasugo servants to defend Shimogyou District to the last man.

103181902.name: Wisdom and Folly: After
103181902.desc: Just as things are looking bleak for Karasugo Sendou, Kagutsuchi learns that the residents in the rear have been evacuated and that Kuramitsuha is on the way with reinforcements.

103182001.name: Act Together: Before
103182001.desc: Crowds of Shimogyou residents rush to the city wall, even those who were just opposed to Karasugo Sendou. With the city emptied, the group can now concentrate on street warfare.

103182002.name: Act Together: After
103182002.desc: The Kiwamikawagumi lead the civilian evacuation. After the battle, Kuramitsuha and Kagutsuchi confess their feelings about Himiko and the Madoibi to each other. They then go to contact the Photon Rail Nexus.

103182101.name: Production Line: Before
103182101.desc: When Reiten Palace explodes, Buzenbo takes Tsukuyomi and Kuninotokotachi to the underground bunker. There, they discuss and decide to evacuate after exploring the location.

103182102.name: Production Line: After
103182102.desc: Based on Akika's performance and the production line records, the Pheasant Squad conclude that she hasn't been able to absorb the other mountain gods' powers yet.

103182201.name: Life and Death: Before
103182201.desc: Armed with the experimental data they found underground, the Pheasant Squad comes to the realization that the Crane God has even more formidable regenerative powers than the Snake God and Deer God.

103182202.name: Life and Death: After
103182202.desc: The Admin has a heart-to-heart with Sekhmet before battle. The Pheasant Squad sends word that Tsukuyomi has just provided them with new intel about the Child of Heaven.

103182301.name: Set Out
103182301.desc: After contacting Shu for confirmation, Ningishzida tells the CORG officers what to do. Sekhmet gives the order to depart.

103182401.name: The Feast: Before
103182401.desc: The crowd cautiously enter the Photon Rail Nexus, which is eerily quiet.

103182402.name: The Feast: After
103182402.desc: Akika and Izuru Masayoshi throw a feast for the Modifiers and Admin in the square. The conversation takes an ugly turn, and Akika is killed by Izuru as she tries to leave.

103182501.name: Success or Failure
103182501.desc: Izuru Masayoshi explains how he researched the Crane God's Divine Grace and worked hard to bring order to Sasanami and counter Akika's influence. Before discussions can go any further, Akika suddenly reappears.

103182601.name: Anchor Point: Before
103182601.desc: Akika once again seizes the anchor point and refuses to talk to anyone.

103182602.name: Anchor Point: After
103182602.desc: Izanami attempts to draw out the power from Yata no Shinkyou, but crashes the anchor point instead. Furious, Akika reveals her true Visbane form and attacks Izanami. Sekhmet parries the blow but is seriously injured.

103182701.name: The Vulnerable: Before
103182701.desc: The Admin shoots a flare in the direction of the Photon Rail Nexus. Just as Akika is about to strike the Admin, Kuramitsuha and Kagutsuchi arrive from Shimogyou to provide back-up.

103182702.name: The Vulnerable: After
103182702.desc: The Imperial Army gradually regains awareness, while Karasugo Sendou implores the residents of Sasanami to resist the demons trying to manipulate them.

103182801.name: Standing Fast: Before
103182801.desc: Akika is unable to maintain control over the anchor point, and the Pheasant Squad arrives from Reiten to provide support.

103182802.name: Standing Fast: After
103182802.desc: Akika uses the Photon Rail's IT system to knock back the Mods and Admin. The Admin raises a shield to give Sekhmet enough time to activate the Omega gear.

103182901.name: The Power of Humanity: Before
103182901.desc: Sekhmet uses the Omega gear to temporarily gain the power of a Prime Modifier, which she uses to break the connection between Akika and the computer interface.

103182902.name: The Power of Humanity: After
103182902.desc: Before her death, Akika reveals that Sasanami's Prime Modifier, Amaterasu, has been missing for a long time. Sasanami is reconnected, and Sekhmet confides her feelings about humans to the Admin.

103183001.name: The World
103183001.desc: Sasanami is back on track after the battle. Some people are nostalgic for the way things used to be, whilst others seek a new direction. The Admin receives information about Ver and hurries back to Ain Soph.

103190001.name: Main - 01: Heartlock
103190001.desc: It's the rainy season, and the osmanthus flowers are in full bloom. In a hospital room, Dr. Gloria is performing a routine check-up on Tarina and tells her she needs to rest up if she wants to recover. However, Tarina wants to be better now and her mind is wandering.

103190301.name: Main - 08: Belligerent
103190301.desc: The group returns to the Surface Layer, but are followed by a pack of Visbanes. The soldiers stop them in their tracks. Lokken ignores Thoth's orders and charges straight into the middle of the Visbanes.

103190402.name: Main - 14: Agent in Action
103190402.desc: The enemy is defeated, but the Hyperspace has been damaged. Thoth explains the difficulties associated with the presence and operation of Hyperspace, and warns Ver not to take off her watch or reveal her identity.

103190501.name: Main - 19: Urgent Assistance
103190501.desc: Ver tells Ningishzida some of the truth about the Data Plane Layer, where the two of them bump into Thoth. Ver hints at Thoth not to expose her, and the three of them take on the enemy together.

103190601.name: Main - 24: The Other Side
103190601.desc: Ver wakes up in Molander's Nordburg and is greeted by Shu and the Admin, who are both acting strangely. They are on their way to deal with the Realm Cleansers, and Ver quickly volunteers to come along.

103190701.name: Main - 28: Shadowy Tide
103190701.desc: Thoth warns Ningishzida to be careful with Gremory, and the three of them transport themselves to the Data Plane Layer. However, they discover the transport destination is the entrance to the medical center.

103190901.name: Main - 35: Fantasy From The Past
103190901.desc: Little Ver and the Prez visit the seaside. Little Ver is astounded by the sight of the ocean. They hunt for shells on the beach, and the Prez tells little Ver about secretly coming to see the sea earlier this year. Just as all seems calms, the Realm Cleanser suddenly appears and attacks them.

103191001.name: Main - 40: The Search
103191001.desc: Once in the Source Layer, Ver tries to describe the weird space she'd found herself in before. Thoth and the other agents use this information to try and find clues in the Source Layer.

103191101.name: Main - 42: Winners and Losers
103191101.desc: Lokken blocks Ver's path. Ver's explanations fall on deaf ears, as Lokken is determined to attack her.

103192801.name: Main - 02: Post-dream Emptiness
103192801.desc: Ver awakens to find herself in a strange space suspended in the air. When she tries and fails to contact the outside world, she finds out she's been fitted with a new earpiece and watch. Before she can figure out what's happening, she is ambushed by Visbanes.

103192901.name: Main - 04: Glimmer of Hope
103192901.desc: Ver is in trouble because she cannot control her Divine Power. In desperation, she tries to escape toward a building that not even the Visbanes dare approach, but just as she's about to reach it, she is stopped in her tracks by a hazy figure who drives away the Visbanes and shows her how to escape this place.

103193001.name: Main - 05: The One With No Name
103193001.desc: Thoth is leading a team in the Source Layer to carry out a mission and locate Lokken, when they bump into Ver who's just leaving the platform. Thoth searches the database but can't find anything about Ver or the Admin, but ultimately decides to take her back to the Surface Layer.

103193101.name: Main - 07: OPRIC
103193101.desc: Thoth's team is finally reunited with the AWOL Lokken, who immediately attacks Ver. Thoth stops her, then checks that Ver's watch has OPRIC-level permissions. Their conflict is put aside for now as Thoth takes everyone back to the Surface Layer.

103193201.name: Main - 09: Molander
103193201.desc: After wiping out the Visbanes, Ver asks Thoth where she is. She has a very strong reaction when Thoth replies "Molander City," and hurriedly says goodbye as she runs to the south. Lokken once again questions Ver's identity, but Thoth still refuses to get involved.

103193301.name: Main - 10: The Year 2305
103193301.desc: Ver revisits her hometown of Molander, but discovers nothing is how she remembers it. Her middle school teacher Erica claims she doesn't recognize her, and tells Ver that it's the year 2305.

103193401.name: Main - 11: Branch-off
103193401.desc: Ver frantically asks passers-by what the date is, but every single one of them keeps telling her it's the year 2305. Just as Ver feels like she's about to crack, she bumps into Thoth from her timeline, who tells her that they've both come from the year 2315 and are currently in something called the "Off-axis Branching Space Algorithm Experiment."

103193501.name: Main - 12: Hidden in the Moonlight
103193501.desc: Thoth takes Ver to a bookstore called "Land of Moons," and starts to help Ver recover her Divine Grace. The two are then commanded to transfer to the Data Plane Layer.

103193601.name: Main - 13: Bird in a Cage
103193601.desc: Thoth explains to Ver what the Data Plane Layer is, and that their mission is to stop Gaea's "Realm Cleansers." Ver tells Thoth she's from Molander, and that she wants to go to the Saint Sophia Medical Center to see herself when she was younger and her childhood friend, Tarina.

103193701.name: Main - 15: Keys
103193701.desc: Back at the bookstore, Ver tells Thoth what happened to her in the Source Layer. Thoth's eyes widen as though something has finally fallen into place, and she immediately rushes out the door, leaving Ver the keys to the bookstore and telling her to stay put.

103193801.name: Main - 16: Lifting the Seal
103193801.desc: As Ver is prevented from entering the medical center by a security AGI Mecha, she comes across Ningishzida, who's also having the same problem. As they try to think of a solution, Ver has a sudden stroke of genius—she uses her watch and the OPRIC password to bypass security and open the medical center doors.

103193901.name: Main - 17: The Past
103193901.desc: The two women finally make it into the medical center, where they see Ver's childhood doctor, Gloria. However, she refuses both Ningishzida's request for assistance and Ver's request to see her younger self and Tarina. It's just then that the alarm on Ver's watch begins to ring. Disappointed, she turns to leave, but Gloria suddenly blurts out that the two are in a stable condition.

103194001.name: Main - 18: Disruption
103194001.desc: Ver returns to the bookstore but doesn't see Thoth. As an alarm sounds, she decides to go into the Plane Layer herself, but Ningishzida enters as she's reading the command. Ver decides to drag Ningishzida with her into the Plane Layer.

103194101.name: Main - 20: Simulated Nest
103194101.desc: After the battle, Thoth gives Ningishzida the choice to work together or wipe her memory. She tells Ningishzida that she and Ver have come from the future—the world is going to collapse in six months, and they came back to destroy the source of the Visbanes. Ningishzida chooses to work together to save the world.

103194201.name: Main - 21: Chance and Effect
103194201.desc: After seeing Ningishzida off, Thoth tells Ver that she's invited Ningishzida to work with them, and then asks about the medical center. Thoth leaves, and Ver is permitted to move around freely.

103194301.name: Main - 22: First Meeting, Again
103194301.desc: Ver goes to the place where she met the Admin when she was a child. She's about to send a message when she sees the Admin as a child, and learns that the young Admin is the owner of the medical center. They talk for a while, and the Prez invites Ver inside.

103194401.name: Main - 23: Inquietude
103194401.desc: The Prez asks Ver if she knows where "Norvi" is. Ver sees a photo of herself and Norvi, who bears a striking resemblance to her, but she doesn't recognize her. The Prez doesn't trust Ver, and activates a system that weakens Ver's Divine Grace. As her Divine Power fades, her Bane Energy surges.

103194501.name: Main - 25: True Feelings
103194501.desc: Ver wakes up in the ward, where the Prez and Gloria tell her she's been asleep for a long time. Their attitudes toward her have changed completely. They give her a comprehensive medical examination, and ask about her and Tarina. Eventually, the Prez allows Ver to see little Ver and Tarina, but just then, Thoth arrives and Ver leaves in a hurry.

103194601.name: Main - 26: Reins on the Sun
103194601.desc: At the drink shop, Ver confides in Thoth what happened at the medical center. Thoth asks Ver to investigate the space rift in Nordburg and the energy spike that's about to happen near Saint Sophia. They then bump into a familiar face in the street.

103194701.name: Main - 27: Thread Interwoven
103194701.desc: Gremory appears in the street. Ver and Thoth follow her into a restaurant, where they're shocked to see her pull up a chair next to Ningishzida. Ver secretly tells Ningishzida who Gremory is, while Thoth and Gremory exchange remarks. Suddenly, the watch alarm sounds and Ningishzida, Ver and Thoth must leave.

103194801.name: Main - 29: Thorn in the Flesh
103194801.desc: The three of them have just defeated the Realm Cleanser when Gremory suddenly appears before them. She asks them to tell her everything they know, but when they refuse, she attacks. However, Ver sees straight through her tactics.

103194901.name: Main - 31: Balance
103194901.desc: Thoth seizes an opportunity to take Gremory to the Surface Layer, where she dares not attack. An uneasy peace is found. Ningishzida and Thoth leave separately, but Ver is not assigned to any task.

103195001.name: Main - 32: What I Wish to Say to Me
103195001.desc: With nothing to do, Ver goes to the Saint Sophia Medical Center, where she's finally able to visit little Ver and Tarina. Ver tries hard to encourage her shy and introverted younger self. Little Ver asks Ver if she can help Tarina.

103195101.name: Main - 33: Meeting You Again
103195101.desc: Ver, little Ver, the Prez, and Gloria go to see Tarina. After a while, Tarina sends the other three away and Ver has the chance to scan her with her wristband, although Tarina remains guarded around this stranger.

103195201.name: Main - 34: Visitor and Visitor
103195201.desc: Ver is eating in the barbecue restaurant when she spots the little Admin and little Ver from ten years ago come in for a meal. Lokken suddenly appears and demands Ver take her to see Thoth. Ver refuses. After Lokken leaves, Ver follows the little Admin and little Ver.

103195301.name: Main - 36: Hope for the Future
103195301.desc: During the fight, Ver discovers that the Prez seems to know about the Cleansers. Afterwards, they both leave separately. The Prez returns to the medical center and finds out that little Ver has been infected by what just happened and has begun to admire Ver.

103195401.name: Main - 37: Night Meeting
103195401.desc: The Prez sneaks into the Land of Moons bookstore late at night, but accidentally awakens Ver and is pinned to the floor. The Prez prepares to leave after making certain that Ver poses no threat to little Ver and Tarina, but bumps into Thoth and Ningishzida on their way back.

103195501.name: Main - 38: Wheels in Motion
103195501.desc: Thoth bids farewell to the Prez, then starts to arrange the investigation into the Visbane source. She tells Ver about the Admin's movements in this timeline, then reviews Tarina's health scan.

103195601.name: Main - 39: Mission from the President
103195601.desc: Thoth and Ver are about to put their plan into motion when Ningishzida tells them that CORG is going to the outskirts of the city to deal with the Visbanes there. Thoth continues with the original plan, with fellow agent Raphael leading everyone into the restricted area on the pretext of it being a "mission from the President."

103195701.name: Main - 41: Unwelcome Complication
103195701.desc: Ver returns to the Surface Layer, where she is instructed by Nishida to acquire materials from CORG. Her success in the mission alleviates any misgivings Nishida might have harbored about her work and personality, but she is stopped by someone on her way back.

103195801.name: Main - 43: Emergency Call
103195801.desc: During the battle, Thoth sends a message that they've reached the location where Ver awakened. They temporarily team up with Turing and Gremory to fight the Cleansers, while Ver is instructed to seek CORG reinforcements. Upon hearing this, Lokken rushes off. Ver follows in pursuit once she's asked Ningishzida to provide backup.

103195901.name: Main - 44: High-risk Agreement
103195901.desc: Lokken pulls Ver into the space where the Structure is, and together they clear it of Cleansers. Everyone is in a state of high alert. Lokken's attack on Turing is unsuccessful. Thoth and Turing reach an agreement that CORG will vacate the area as soon as they've collected data on the Structure, but Lokken ignores this and stays behind.

103196001.name: Main - 45: So Close, Yet So Far
103196001.desc: Ignoring Thoth's orders, Ver rushes back to the Source Layer to rescue Lokken, but Turing picks up on her anomaly. He plans to extract the Structure's secret and then deal with the two intruders, but the Structure unexpectedly puts up a fierce resistance and he and Gremory disappear. A wave of Cleansers approach.

103196101.name: Main - 47: Out-of-balance Creation
103196101.desc: The situation is back under control, but Lokken is still making life difficult for Ver. Lokken questions why Ver is being given an easy ride when she's regarded as a "defective product." Before Ver knows what's happening, Lokken raises her weapon against her.

103191401.name: Main - 53: Rehabilitation Training
103191401.desc: Ningishzida repurposes the bookstore's basement as a simulation dojo and runs Ver through a custom-made combat training program to help her suppress her Bane Energy.

103191501.name: Main - 56: So-called Resolve
103191501.desc: Paracaesar assigns Lokken to take part in the Hyperspace experiment, and orders Ver to stay behind in the research institute for her own protection. Ver refuses. Ver is stopped by CORG soldiers as she tries to leave and keep the promise she'd made. She summons her Access Key and charges through the defensive line.

103191601.name: Main - 60: Mistaken Understandings
103191601.desc: The Prez refuses to reveal any personal information, and also refuses to transmit information about the future Administrator. Thoth discovers that what they'd thought was an alarm is actually the Prez's cloaking device. Gaea sends wave after wave of Cleanser attacks.

103191701.name: Main - 64: Dancing With Dragons
103191701.desc: Ver watches as Lokken plays on a gaming device in the bookstore entrance. Talk about the game soon leads into an in-depth discussion about their life philosophy, and they begin to argue over the meaning of life. The discussion is cut short by a Cleanser sent by Gaea.

103191801.name: Main - 66: Effective Sparring
103191801.desc: Ningishzida makes the training room look as good as new. Lokken, who's spending the night on the rooftop, comes to watch Ver's rehabilitation. After learning about Ver's condition, Lokken immediately volunteers to act as her training partner.

103191901.name: Main - 70: To the Peak: Before
103191901.desc: It's a new day of training, and Ver says that she wants to rediscover her mountain-shattering power so she can use it to take down the Purifiers. She asks Ningishzida if she can begin special training to achieve this.

103191902.name: Main - 70: To the Peak: After
103191902.desc: Ver is unable to control her Divine Power, and has no choice but to guide it to her Access Key. However, there's too much Divine Power for the Access Key to handle and it explodes, tearing the ground apart. Thoth comes back just in time to see this.

103192001.name: Main - 73: Into the Unknown
103192001.desc: The Hyperspace is becoming too unstable, and Gaea begins to reject it fiercely. To buy more time, Ver and Thoth once again team up to take down the Cleansers.

103192101.name: Main - 76: The Living Must Go On
103192101.desc: The Hyperspace collapse factor is increasing sharply. Thoth consoles a lost Ver, and tells her there are plenty of people waiting for her on the outside and that she wants nothing more than to bring Ver back in one piece.

103192201.name: Main - 80: Revisiting History
103192201.desc: Thoth is thoughtful after learning about the heart transplant procedure. The Cleansers attack again, landing near the CORG Research Institute.

103192501.name: Main - 91: Wishes, Yours and Mine
103192501.desc: Tarina and Ver arrive at Molander as the world is on the brink of collapse. They buy some fruit juice, but even this rare moment of relaxation is interrupted by Cleansers. Ver goes to take out the Cleansers on the high street. Tarina comes with her because she wants to see Ver in action.

103192601.name: Main - 94: Forbidden Overtime
103192601.desc: The decisive battle draws near. Instead of extracting from the Hyperspace, the CORG agents led by Raphael decide to stay behind to support Thoth to fight the Cleansers in the square.

103192701.name: Main - 96: My Wish
103192701.desc: The Controller is even more powerful than expected, and the agents are forced to retreat. Even Lokken struggles. Just as things are looking hopeless, Ver appears with her new Access Key and takes the final stand against the Controller.

103196201.name: Main - 49: Dream Reunion
103196201.desc: A distant dream has brought back old friends who exist now only in memories. Questions directed at the dream only lead to answers from the self.

103196301.name: Main - 50: Paradox of Origin
103196301.desc: The dream is over, but life goes on. Once you open your eyes, you have to face both the things you want to see and those you don't.

103196401.name: Main - 51: Risk Mitigation
103196401.desc: A compromise for the time being is for a far greater goal. The road to truth has only one destined end.

103196501.name: Main - 52: A Brand New Goal
103196501.desc: Nothing beats seeing the truth for yourself, and the worried heart is comforted by a reunion. To return to the starting point is to set off again towards a new goal.

103196601.name: Main - 54: Differentiation and Discrimination
103196601.desc: To know someone is to call them by the right name. Two persons, alike from head to toe. But do they act the same too?

103196701.name: Main - 55: Secret Interrogation
103196701.desc: How many new secrets have to be created to cover up an existing one? The best way to deal with leaks is to cut off the possibility of leaks.

103196801.name: Main - 57: Proper SOP
103196801.desc: Non-standard or prescribed actions must be terminated in a timely manner. The core issue must be handled through the correct channels no matter what.

103196901.name: Main - 58: The Meaning of Existence
103196901.desc: It is a truth of our world that those who are ignorant do not know fear. Why is that so? What is it that can allow us to transcend fear and keep on moving forward?

103197001.name: Main - 59: Unexpected Visitor
103197001.desc: Forbidden thoughts aren't necessarily true forbidden zones. Where there is existence, there is always a path. An unexpected visitor or two is not that surprising.

103197101.name: Main - 61: A Peek
103197101.desc: The abnormality is hidden beneath the surface, and only by breaking through the surface can we get a glimpse of it. It is something that should never be seen.

103197201.name: Main - 62: Backup
103197201.desc: The facts are hidden in the fog, and the path of pursuit is paved with only fragmented information. One wrong inference, and one may tread down a dangerous path.

103197301.name: Main - 63: The New Store Clerk
103197301.desc: A calm and safe environment is destabilized by new elements. When new members join the team, the existing employees will inevitably experience some turbulence.

103197401.name: Main - 65: Unhelpful Thinking
103197401.desc: Avoid distractions when playing games. Only by focusing on the set goals will you be able to complete them with ease. Is it really necessary to think so much?

103197501.name: Main - 67: Absolute Trust
103197501.desc: To convey your faith across the yawning cold, there must be absolute trust.

103197601.name: Main - 68: Everything About You
103197601.desc: Time awakens longing, and longing breeds desire. Longing for your voice, your smile, your gaze, everything about you.

103197701.name: Main - 69: The Way Forward
103197701.desc: Life needs direction, and so does the mind. The direction of life is called a goal, and the direction of the mind is called a wish.

103197801.name: Main - 71: Finding the Right Method
103197801.desc: The physician has to tailor the treatment to the patient to get the results they want, and only through thorough analysis of the cause of the disease can a good plan be drawn up.

103197901.name: Main - 72: Precision Medicine
103197901.desc: No matter how good a plan is, the only way to find out if it works is to apply it.

103198001.name: Main - 74: The Physician's Aspirations
103198001.desc: "Now that I'm part of the medical profession, I hereby pledge myself to it. The lives of my patients are my primary concern. I am responsible for all my patients, no matter who they are."

103198101.name: Main - 75: Gone But Not Forgotten
103198101.desc: No matter how beautiful one's appearance is, it will all eventually end with death with no physical trace left behind. But one can still be missed in the hearts of friends and thus not be forgotten.

103198201.name: Main - 77: Mutual Support
103198201.desc: The blazing sun overhead is unforgiving, and the road is long. Walking this road with companions who comfort you, support you, and wipe away your tears, however, can make it easier and allow us to overcome every difficulty as we move towards a better tomorrow.

103198301.name: Main - 78: Perceived Value
103198301.desc: What is poison to others is honey to me. The value of an object often does not lie in its material or craftsmanship, but in the ideas and meanings it carries.

103198401.name: Main - 79: Plan of Last Resort
103198401.desc: The idea of using something simple and low-cost to solve a complex problem is a beautiful fantasy. When the problem cannot be solved, we can only rely on backup plans, even if the cost is higher.

103198501.name: Main - 81: Impending Collapse
103198501.desc: The building is about to collapse, and chaos is beginning to emerge. The world is going off the rails. There is not much time left, and yet the wish remains unfulfilled. What does one do in these circumstances?

103198601.name: Main - 82: Always With a Smile
103198601.desc: Regardless of the ups and downs, or whatever losses or misunderstanding or disputes that have occurred, always face them with a smile. To be happy in this way is to be fortunate.

103198701.name: Main - 83: Cycles and Gyres
103198701.desc: The past is full of regrets, and there is always the impulse to make up for these regrets one way or another. But are impulses and good intentions nearly enough?

103198801.name: Main - 84: Who Am I?
103198801.desc: The paradox has bared its fangs as it gnaws at the self-evident truth in one's cognition. If the ground on which we stand collapses, what awaits us is only an endless fall.

103198901.name: Main - 85: The Monster
103198901.desc: In the fall there are cries for help, cries that have become piercing screams. The feelings that cannot be communicated are regarded as abnormal and are rejected and isolated.

103199001.name: Main - 86: Gentle Wings
103199001.desc: The wings hold up the falling body, the feathers embracing the wounded heart. A gentle harbor one has sailed into. Take some rest before you go on.

103199101.name: Main - 88: Fixing a Broken Dream
103199101.desc: Even a beautiful wish shattered by misfortune and tainted by bitterness will surely bloom again as long as it is recast with sincerity.

103199201.name: Main - 90: We Two
103199201.desc: Looking at you is like looking myself. We share one beating heart along with the same fears.

103199301.name: Main - 92: As One
103199301.desc: We hold each other's hands, unwilling to lose each other. Together, we overcome confusion and fear, and our hearts beat together as one.

103199401.name: Main - 93: The Power I Have
103199401.desc: Your mind is no longer confused, and the power is in your hands. The wish is within grasp. For your own sake and everyone else's, it's now time to go and protect everything that you cherish.

103199501.name: Main - 95: Fiery Sun Overhead
103199501.desc: The appearance has been shattered and the world is falling apart.

103199601.name: Main - 97: A Long Way Home
103199601.desc: After traversing time and space and overcoming all the difficulties and obstacles, one can finally... go home.

103199701.name: Main - 98: A New Agreement
103199701.desc: It's been a long time. Let's talk to one another and forge a new promise between us. Despite this respite, a new storm has already appeared...

103200101.name: Infinite Night
103200101.desc:
Kubera caught sight of the CEO of Infinite Power, Mandaviya, and the CEO of Biotech, Jivika, at a charity event in the Affluent District. However, he was ambushed upon leaving the party.
Meanwhile, the Midnight Thorns stole Biotech products from another gang, the Burning Scars.

103200201.name: Rocky Road: Before
103200201.desc: The Admin, Verthandi, and Osiris arrived in Shashvat, bringing with them a whole host of missions. After making contact with Nekhbet from CORG, the Admin met with Parvati, sent by Meruism to greet them.

103200202.name: Rocky Road: After
103200202.desc: The Admin and Parvati dealt with a group of Midnight Thorns who'd set up a roadblock to steal goods from passersby. The team received a message informing them that Kubera, a member of Meruism, required assistance.

103200301.name: Help: Before
103200301.desc: The team rushed to the location Kubera provided. Sensing Bane Energy nearby, the three Modifiers prepared for battle.

103200302.name: Help: After
103200302.desc: After dealing with the Visbanes, the team met up with Kubera. They also discovered several other members of the Midnight Thorns who'd been trapped there.

103200401.name: Brambles and Flowers: Before
103200401.desc: The Admin had an encounter with the boss of the Midnight Thorns, Yudini, helping them gain an understanding of the grievances held by the area's gangs. Here, the team encountered a more powerful Bane Energy reaction—however, they also met a powerful ally.

103200402.name: Brambles and Flowers: After
103200402.desc: After easily dispatching the Visbanes, Brahmā, head of Meruism, erased the memories of Yudini and the other normal humans nearby. The team arrived at Meruism, where they were welcomed by Kali.

103200501.name: The Embers Burn Again
103200501.desc: Meruism did its best to bring order to Gharpur, which was beleaguered by the chaos of gang warfare. However, the Burning Scars, funded by large corporate backers, started kicking up trouble in Gharpur's north district.

103200601.name: A Moment of Peace
103200601.desc: After a bit of R&R, the Admin and Zhiming had a meeting with Brahmā and the others. Kubera led Osiris and the Admin to take a look at an Access Key in Meruism's warehouse that Odin felt would be very helpful to her. Little did they know that upon touching the massive sickle, Osiris would lose control of Ausar.

103200701.name: Stop Looking for Trouble: Before
103200701.desc: With Osiris in a coma, the injured Admin and an out-of-sorts Parvati took a much-needed rest. When night fell, Ranvier led a group of Burning Scars to rob Meruism. Kali headed out to handle them on her own.

103200702.name: Stop Looking for Trouble: After
103200702.desc: Kali defeated Ranvier's underlings, only to take a hit from a sniper. While Admin was quickly able to handle the shooter, the conflict escalated dramatically. However, at just the right moment, Brahmā arrived, a group made up of members of other Gharpur gangs in tow. Together, they drove back Ranvier and his gang.

103200801.name: City Periphery: Before
103200801.desc: After debriefing everything that happened before, the Admin planned to ask Kali to show them around as they investigated the city's main district.

103200802.name: City Periphery: After
103200802.desc: The Admin cleverly used their Aether Gazer background to get some info on the Affluent District and Ravana from the owner of Bright Eyes. On the way back, Kali discovered Joint Arbitration seemed to be planning something in the north of Gharpur.

103200901.name: Spinal Crush: Before
103200901.desc: A Joint Arbitration engineering team entered the north of Gharpur and knocked down the homes of those living there to make room for a new industrial park. Gang members who mounted a resistance were put down by corporate security. When the Admin and Kali arrived on the scene, Krol, Biotech's chief assistant, claimed everything that had been done was above board.

103200902.name: Spinal Crush: After
103200902.desc: As night fell, the angered gang members of the north district set out to exact vengeance on the Burning Scars, only to find Mandaviya waiting to clear them out with corporate security.

103201001.name: Storm Clouds
103201001.desc: After consulting with Nekhbet, the Admin decided to investigate Biotech. Osiris woke up, but Ausar didn't answer any questions about the "traitor" she mentioned while she was out of control.

103201101.name: A "Legal" Punishment
103201101.desc: Mandaviya threw together a last-minute sentencing, during which the magistrate sentenced the gang members who'd attacked the Burning Scars to death and placed Gharpur's north district under the control of Joint Arbitration. Ranvier himself carried out the executions.

103201201.name: Biotech: Before
103201201.desc: The Admin, along with Ver and Osiris, went to Biotech under the ruse of discussing a business agreement, where they were attended to by Krol. The Admin distracted Krol while Verthandi and Osiris slipped into the shadows to investigate.

103201202.name: Biotech: After
103201202.desc: After they finished their covert investigation of Biotech, the Admin planned to continue to Infinite Power. However, Krol warned them that might not go as smoothly as they planned.

103201301.name: Storm Brewing
103201301.desc:
Ranvier's executions riled the people of Gharpur into a fury. Brahmā showed up to straighten out the situation, setting up a meeting with Mandaviya three days later.
The Admin and his team left Biotech to head to Infinite Power, but ran into a Visbane ambush on the way.

103201401.name: Battle and Desire: Before
103201401.desc: Ravana appeared and attacked the team. The Admin, Ver, and Osiris joined forces to take him on.

103201402.name: Battle and Desire: After
103201402.desc: After a vicious battle, they drove back Ravana. Nekhbet and her team showed up to tell the Admin the results of their investigation into Mandaviya—they hadn't found evidence of any wrongdoing. After returning to Meruism, the Admin and Ver encouraged Osiris, who was feeling a bit discouraged in the face of such a powerful enemy.

103201501.name: At the Negotiation Table
103201501.desc: Brahmā arrived at the new industrial park with an escort of Gharpur gang members. Negotiations with Mandaviya failed to yield common ground. Mandaviya attempted to use a great host of security AGI Mechas to threaten Brahmā.

103201601.name: Punch Attack
103201601.desc: Kali knew that Brahmā wasn't in a position to fight back. After a discussion with Parvati allayed her concerns, she headed to the negotiation to be on hand in case of any possible surprises.

103201701.name: Troublesome Embers
103201701.desc:
After Kali destroyed many of the AGI Mechas, Jivika suggested allowing those who lived in the industrial park area to vote on the issue.
Meanwhile, in an unknown location, the Cognizant Visbanes met to discuss their past battles and plans for the future.
