103201801.name: Lifespan Control: Before
103201801.desc: The results of the vote showed Joint Arbitration having won the day. The plans for the new industrial park started moving forward. The leader of the gang that joined the factory crew was required to have prosthetics installed. They were injected with an unknown medication while on the operating table.

103201802.name: Lifespan Control: After
103201802.desc: Marduk learned of a plan to control the lifespan of factory workers while questioning one of the industrial area thugs. Nekhbet believed it had something to do with the now-escaped Otis. The Admin, Ver, and Osiris went with Kubera to prepare for their investigation, studying yoga to learn more about the lifestyles of the rich.

103201901.name: Lifestyle Choices
103201901.desc:
Kali didn't find any issues at the industrial park, but noticed many gang members choosing employment with the company. Soon after, she discovered Joint Arbitration was fabricating gang attacks on the industrial park, then reporting the attacks on the news.
Zhiming debugged the Admin's Delusion Buster before they left on their investigation.

103202001.name: In the High-rise Building: Before
103202001.desc: Nekhbet, the Admin, and the others went to investigate Biotech on CORG's behalf, where they were met by Jivika. Nekhbet entered the lab Ver and Osiris had discovered before and asked to test the military prosthetic mods being developed there.

103202002.name: In the High-rise Building: After
103202002.desc: The Admin asked to inspect the floors that couldn't be reached by elevator. To their surprise, they found them to contain a yoga studio built by Jivika's father. The team left the high-rise with nothing to show for their efforts. Nekhbet theorized that the irregularities in computing power near Biotech had something to do with Otis.

103202101.name: Infinite Greed
103202101.desc:
The Admin returned to Meruism and swapped findings with Kali. Both believed that Joint Arbitration would continue their expansion.
Joint Arbitration announced plans to create an isolation zone surrounding the industrial park, much to the chagrin of Ranvier, who felt they were encroaching on his territory.

103202201.name: Getting Closer and Closer: Before
103202201.desc: After seeing Osiris and Ver in the morning, the Admin met with a reporter, where they learned about Jivika's past, how she'd had mysterious visitors, and how she'd gone to the area around Vimoksha Pharma several times before.

103202202.name: Getting Closer and Closer: After
103202202.desc: After a visit to Kumar at Vimoksha Pharma, the Admin and Kali learned there had indeed been some out-of-the-ordinary trades taking place between Vimoksha Pharma and Biotech. They also learned that Seema and Jivika had once been classmates. While preparing to leave Vimoksha Pharma, the Admin and Kali discovered Joint Arbitration forces heading toward Gharpur's north district.

103202301.name: Same-same and Not That Different: Before
103202301.desc: The Burning Scars began forcefully clearing out the new industrial park area. Affected gang members went to Meruism to ask Parvati for help.

103202302.name: Same-same and Not That Different: After
103202302.desc: After the Burning Scars were driven back by Meruism, Ranvier went to ask Mandaviya for more equipment.

103202401.name: Midnight Conflagration: Before
103202401.desc:
While leading troops to take on Ranvier, Yudini ran into a mysterious acquaintance.
Upon learning of Yudini's disappearance, Kali went to the new industrial park, where she found there'd been an explosion at a chemical factory the previous evening. Mandaviya had come personally to take the gang responsible to trial.

103202402.name: Midnight Conflagration: After
103202402.desc: Mandaviya pinned responsibility for the chemical factory explosion on Deepak, a Meruism member who had taken a job at the industrial park. He also informed him that several Midnight Thorns members had died in the explosion. Kali rushed to the scene to rescue Deepak and confront Mandaviya in court.

103202501.name: Bitter Fruit: Before
103202501.desc: Joint Arbitration pushed south once more. Parvati sent Kubera to lead the gangs in resisting the company's security, while she and Kali took on a humanoid fighting machine armed to the teeth with prosthetics.

103202502.name: Bitter Fruit: After
103202502.desc: The next day, both sides agreed to a ceasefire. Ranvier represented the company's side. After the negotiations, Ranvier thought back on all the brothers he'd lost and felt upset that Mandaviya forced him to the buffer zone. The chasm between them grew wider.

103202601.name: For the Sake of Living
103202601.desc: The Admin visited Jivika's father's grave on Passing Day. Free for a moment from squabbles over business, Jivika showed the Admin a bit of the real her.

103202701.name: Endless Conflict
103202701.desc:
Nekhbet confirmed something was up with Jivika. Together, she and Admin headed to Biotech.
In the new industrial park, internal strife was brewing in Joint Arbitration. Jivika's bodyguard Kalan took down several security officers from other gangs, making the conflict decidedly more one-sided.
Zhiming analyzed how Kalan was able to come back to life after he died, coming to the conclusion that he was able to steal some of the computing power that Gaea assigned to humanity.

103202801.name: Deep Into the Storm: Before
103202801.desc:
Yudini told Kali Kalan's story. Kali and Parvati decided to enter the conflict themselves.
Mandaviya assembled a team to attack Biotech, but was taken down by Jivika's bioweapons.
The Admin and their team arrived at Biotech with Krol, and decided to go rescue those within.

103202802.name: Deep Into the Storm: After
103202802.desc:
After saving the people inside, the Admin sent Osiris to take the survivors out of the building before heading further in to find the source of the computing power abnormality with Ver and Nekhbet.
Ausar interrupted Osiris' plan to leave the building out of fear for her safety. Before she left, Osiris discovered something was wrong in the building's basement, and decided to go see if she could help.

103202901.name: Life and Death, Endlessly: Before
103202901.desc: Parvati and Kali ran into Kalan in the high-rise. Unable to communicate with him, they were forced into combat.

103202902.name: Life and Death, Endlessly: After
103202902.desc: Kalan continued to heal his injuries, so Parvati used two special bullets to create a wind barrier that blocked his access to computing power; however, she froze herself in place in the process. The job of taking down Kalan fell to Kali.

103203002.name: Fall Back to Earth
103203002.desc: Kalan recovered once more when the wind barrier dissipated; luckily, however, the Admin was able to find and destroy the computing power nexus, robbing Kalan of his superiority. Yudini arrived on the scene. Seeing the near-dead Kalan training his gun on Kali, she put a bullet through his heart. With his last breath, Kalan warned everyone present to get away before he self-destructed.

103203101.name: Soul Split: Before
103203101.desc:
Jivika had been stabbed through the heart in her office. Critical Biotech files had been destroyed. Nekhbet installed Krol as temporary CEO of Biotech, and instructed her to help CORG keep an eye on the company.
Ausar encountered the powerful Bathin in the basement. Bathin planned to kill the girl and take her Access Key. At the cost of her sword wings, Ausar held Bathin off, sending out Osiris, while attaching herself to Living Soul and escaping somewhere unknown.

103203102.name: Soul Split: After
103203102.desc: Admin and Ver found Osiris in a coma, before being caught in the midst of a chain explosion themselves. Luckily, Brahmā showed up and vanished the entire explosion from existence, while simultaneously healing everyone's wounds and repairing the destroyed city.

103203201.name: The Way to Go
103203201.desc: The gang members were able to repair their homes in the north district, but the future of Jivitabad remained uncertain. Osiris told everyone about Ausar's disappearance once she woke up from her coma. Having discovered Krol seemed to have something to do with Otis, Nekhbet talked their next move over with the Admin. And Brahmā seemed to have finally finished whatever she'd been doing all this time.

101100101.name: The Sheep
101100101.desc: "So long as the sheep does not hear the words of the fox," Osiris thought after hearing this story.

101100201.name: Dream Negotiations
101100201.desc: In order to awaken Osiris' consciousness, the Administrator and Ausar made a wager to enter the dreamworld...

101101301.name: Imago Room
101101301.desc: Admin finally met Osiris in her Imago Room, but she is still unwilling to return to reality. The little Sheep with its open wounds locks itself within the room in its heart.

101101401.name: Facing Oneself
101101401.desc: "I will no longer use Ausar as an excuse. I must return to my friends, and thus... I will defeat you, Osiris."

101101501.name: A Bitter Battle
101101501.desc: Ver and Shu saved the Administrator in time. Soon after they faced the raving attacks of Ausar. But just then... the girl liberated herself and rushed to the battlefield.

101101601.name: The Sheep's Conclusion
101101601.desc: Osiris wrote a new ending to the fairy tale, just as she made a new decision concerning her future.

101110101.name: The Phantom Butterfly Begins
101110101.desc: The Phantom Butterfly effect continued to spread. Even Admin was troubled by it and saw black butterflies fluttering about...

101110201.name: Quake Rescue: Before
101110201.desc: A Quake struck the Duskfall Area of Ain Soph. Shu dispatched a rescue team, with Admin leading a group of Mods.

101110203.name: Quake Rescue: During
101110203.desc: At the border of the disaster zone, the team learned from one of the wounded that the Visbanes had already arrived. After providing emergency treatment, the team then ventured deeper into the zone to clear out the Visbanes.

101110202.name: Quake Rescue: After
101110202.desc: In the disaster zone, the team rescued someone claiming to be doctor. He told them of others who had been attacked by the Visbanes.

101110301.name: Mourner: Before
101110301.desc: The team continued onwards to where the doctor told them the Visbane attack happened. While investigating, they spotted someone acting strangely and decided to go check it out.

101110302.name: Mourner: After
101110302.desc: While following the person, the team split up because the Admin saw another phantom butterfly, and soon after encountered a girl named Hel...

101110401.name: Butterfly Returns
101110401.desc: After safely returning to the shelter, the Admin ran into the previously rescued psychologist, Zery, who recommended going to where the black butterfly mentioned to look for clues. That night, after waking from a dream about the butterfly, the Admin went to the rooftop for some fresh air and once again met Hel...

101110501.name: Butterfly Graveyard
101110501.desc: In the dead of night, Hel brought the Admin to a graveyard. The black butterfly was already there, as if it was waiting for them...

101110601.name: Bed of White Flowers: Before
101110601.desc: Following the butterfly as it flew through the graveyard, the pair arrived at Hel's sister's grave, where they saw a young girl dressed in white. It was at this moment that Visbanes appeared...

101110602.name: Bed of White Flowers: After
101110602.desc: After defeating the Visbanes, the Admin comforted the frightened young girl, Vina, who told them the story of the black butterfly. In the subsequent investigations, it was discovered that the grave of Hel's sister, Vena, was actually empty. As they stood about confused, trying to figure out what to do, the deceased Vena appeared before them.

101110701.name: The Promise: Before
101110701.desc: The thing that appears to be Vena's spirit appeared and asked the pair to protect Vina. But there seemed to be something going on between her and Hel...

101110702.name: The Promise: After
101110702.desc: After promising to protect Vina, the pair decided to take her back to the shelter, but on their way back they attracted the attention of the Visbanes. Hel decided to fight them on her own to distract them, which worried Vina. Everything turned out all right in the end, and after settling everyone down, the Admin reported back to Shu...

101110801.name: Recurring Dream
101110801.desc: In a daze, Hel had a long dream about the past... Over a communal meal, the Admin suggested sending Vina back to her parents, but it was then revealed that Vina is an orphan. Whilst on a stroll, Zery showed up again and told the team he would be happy to take her in.

101110901.name: Midnight Chat: Before
101110901.desc: That night, Hel was comforted by Vina after struggling with memories caused by the reappearance of her sister. The next night, Zery told her that Vina was seriously ill, so Hel decided to go into the restricted area to get the medicines Vina needed.

101110902.name: Midnight Chat: After
101110902.desc: The pair chatted on their way back after getting the medicine, and the Admin helped Hel realize how much she cherished Vina, and that this might be because Vina was a reincarnation of her sister's soul. At that moment, Ver sended an urgent message that the shelter had been invaded...

101111001.name: Corrosion: Before
101111001.desc: The Admin and Hel rushed to meet up with Ver, who told them that Vina had disappeared. The decision was made to look for clues while ridding the shelter of the Visbanes.

101111002.name: Corrosion: After
101111002.desc: As time went on, Hel got more and more anxious, until Ver came with an eye-witness report. They decided to split up, with the Admin and Hel following up on the lead.

101111101.name: Tracks
101111101.desc: The two returned to the graveyard and, thanks to the phantom butterfly, found one of Vina's belongings...

101111201.name: The Truth: Before
101111201.desc: The pair managed to get into a secret lab hidden in the graveyard where, with Mimir's help, they started to analyze the data in the terminal.

101111202.name: The Truth: After
101111202.desc: Having accidentally triggered the security alarm, the pair barely managed to hide from the Visbane attack, taking cover in a corner room. By collating the data they just collected, they came to an awful realization—someone was trying to use Vena and Vina to complete the Soul Replenishment Plan.

101111301.name: The Experiment Begins: Before
101111301.desc: Determined to foil the lab's plan, the pair reached the facility's central area, where they saw Vena and Vina locked up in a chamber. The mastermind behind this entire scheme was in disguise all the time.

101111302.name: The Experiment Begins: After
101111302.desc: Despite fighting their hardest, the pair were outnumbered and could do nothing but watched as the lab staff completed their preparations. However, just as the soul fusion process was about to finish, something unexpected happened.

101111401.name: Hidden Scar: Before
101111401.desc: Hel, after coming into contact with a ball of light, found herself engulfed by a flood of suppressed emotions, and faced the mental block she had never been able to overcome. Just as her mind was about to collapse, a black butterfly appeared before her in the form of Vina's soul, and fought with her.

101111402.name: Hidden Scar: After
101111402.desc: Having overcome her mental block, Hel and her sister Vena reached a new level of understanding. Vina told Hel to cherish the present instead of dwelling in the past, and then dissipated entirely.

101111501.name: Partners: Before
101111501.desc: Across the room, the Admin suddenly regained consciousness to see that the fusion process had made all the Visbanes in the lab aggressive, and had to hold out until the Rookie Squad arrived.

101111502.name: Partners: After
101111502.desc: The sheer number of hostile Visbanes was too much for the team to handle, even with the support of the Rookie Squad. Hel awakened at just the right moment and realized what she must do. With her help, the team managed to get the situation under control.

101111601.name: New Family
101111601.desc: With Shu on the scene and Hel deciding to take in Vina, it looked like the adventure was over. While helping Hel tend to Vena's grave, the Admin told her the results of their own investigation. Hel was greatly relieved to know the truth.

101111701.name: Whistling Wind: Before
101111701.desc: When Shu and Ookuninushi were discussing the Visbanes, Ookuninushi said that she might have found a solution—although she'd require the assistance of a Mod. At the same time, in a corner of the disaster zone, a man was about to be attacked by a Visbane when a young girl appeared out of nowhere and saved him with incredible skill.

101111702.name: Whistling Wind: After
101111702.desc: The man's mysterious savior went by the name Hermes, who had been contacted by Aether Gazer and told by Ookuninushi that they required her assistance.

101111801.name: Data-gathering: Before
101111801.desc: Hermes was distraught by the sight of the ruined city. Ookuninushi explained to her what a Data Spill was, and asked if she thought she'd be able to collect the data.

101111802.name: Data-gathering: After
101111802.desc: The Visbanes had made it impossible to gather the data. Ookuninushi had an idea, but their communication link was cut. Hermes had no option but to return to the shelter.

101111901.name: Lost Objects: Before
101111901.desc: Hermes was helping to deliver supplies in the shelter when a girl asked if she could help her find her "friend" Ivan, who she dropped in the disaster zone.

101111902.name: Lost Objects: After
101111902.desc: Hermes found Ivan, but this attracted the attention of the Visbanes. Ookuninushi discovered the memory data attached to the teddy bear, and suspected someone was extracting data from the Source Layer. She decided to start her investigation at the coordinates obtained from the data she'd just collected.

101112001.name: Tracking Coordinates: Before
101112001.desc: The location of the coordinates had been severely damaged, and there were some strange-looking data ports...

101112002.name: Tracking Coordinates: After
101112002.desc: Hermes came across a Visbane carrying an enormous amount of Data Spill, but it managed to escape before she could get her hands on it. Despite losing its trail, she was still able to find a mysterious entrance thanks to Ookuninushi.

101112101.name: Strange Room
101112101.desc: Hermes followed the tracks underground, where she found a strange room. Upon closer investigation, she found out that it was an abandoned laboratory, and the Visbane that escaped earlier reappeared. Hermes hurried to locate the path leading to the Source Layer.

101112201.name: Race: Before
101112201.desc: Upon reaching the Source Layer, Ookuninushi soon noticed something strange: Someone seemed to be using equipment to extract data from the Source Layer's control axles. The Sephirah Zones were in grave danger...

101112202.name: Race: After
101112202.desc: Ookuninushi told Hermes that, if she couldn't stop the data from being extracted, the Sephirah Zones would collapse. Hermes steeled her nerves and stepped up to the challenge—even though it would take everything she had, she was willing to sacrifice it to protect her beloved city and the people who lived there.

101112301.name: Rest
101112301.desc: Everything was almost wrapped up by the time Hermes awoke, but she still had work to do. She figured that as long as stuff like this only happened once in a while, it would be no big deal.

101120101.name: The Strange Beach: Before
101120101.desc: All the survivors of the catastrophe are left on a deserted beach to face the dangers of a surprise attack.

101120102.name: The Strange Beach: After
101120102.desc: After repelling the enemies, everyone agrees they should explore the island while Skadi and the Admin stay on the beach to keep a look out for Snowflake 2.

101120201.name: A Miracle Named Snowflake 2: Before
101120201.desc: Skadi's confidence results in a miracle: Her companions find that the Snowflake 2, which everyone thought had sunk, was actually stranded on the shore.

101120202.name: A Miracle Named Snowflake 2: After
101120202.desc: After defeating the enemies blocking their way, the group gets back on Snowflake 2. However, all the food has spoiled since they've been gone, and the Admin faints from hunger...

101120301.name: The Captain's Sleepless Night: Before
101120301.desc: After reviving the Admin, everyone votes to venture into the heart of the island to find food.

101120302.name: The Captain's Sleepless Night: After
101120302.desc: The meal made from tubers finally restores the Admin's strength. Skadi promises to repair the ship so everyone can leave, but things don't go as smoothly as expected...

101120303.name: A Pitiful Harvest
101120303.desc: No one can find any food except tubers, but they must get back as soon as possible.

101120401.name: Target: The Next Island
101120401.desc: Persuaded by the Admin, Skadi finally tells everyone about the plight they're in and what they all have to do. An expedition is bound to begin.

101120502.name: The Strange Reunion: Before
101120502.desc: When the strange object is pulled out, the entire island begins to shake.

101120503.name: The Strange Reunion: After
101120503.desc: As Leviathan is about to find the part that was tasked to her, she also gets closer to the mysterious sound.

101120601.name: Crisis, as Promised: Before
101120601.desc: Leviathan still isn't back and the island's vibrations have attracted swarms of Visbanes. Skadi battles to protect everyone as they board the ship.

101120602.name: Crisis, as Promised: After
101120602.desc: Everyone is safely on board, but Leviathan still isn't back.

101120701.name: The Final Dash: Before
101120701.desc: As she rushes back to the meeting point, Leviathan hears that mysterious voice guiding her again.

101120702.name: The Final Dash: After
101120702.desc: Leviathan finally makes it back to the meeting point, but the island completely collapses before she's able to board the boat...

101120801.name: Skadi's Resolution
101120801.desc: With Leviathan sucked into the whirlpool, Skadi's determination inspires everyone to launch a rescue operation.

101120901.name: Waking Moment
101120901.desc: Everyone wakes up in the classroom, as if nothing had happened, but the Admin sees through the illusion.

101121001.name: The Ocean Floor's Secret: Before
101121001.desc: With the dream world collapsed, everyone falls into an underwater world of bubbles and becomes separated from Snowflake 2.

101121002.name: The Ocean Floor's Secret: After
101121002.desc: Back on Snowflake 2, Skadi surmises that the underwater bubble world was actually an illusion created by the Siren, and that Leviathan is in some other bubble world.

101121101.name: The Price of Charging Ahead: Before
101121101.desc: After reaching the other bubble using diving equipment, they realize that there are Visbanes here as well.

101121102.name: The Price of Charging Ahead: After
101121102.desc: Everyone can see that there's something odd about this place, but it's already too late.

101121202.name: Siren's Return: After
101121202.desc: Victorious from their battle, everyone is finally able to find an escape route, but the Admin is swept out of the bubble world by the waves raised by the Siren.

101121301.name: Leviathan's Confusion: Before
101121301.desc: Leviathan finally wakes up, and is surprised to discover that she is still with Vidar on the mission.

101121302.name: Leviathan's Confusion: After
101121302.desc: Leviathan is suspicious of Vidar, and she begins to hear the mysterious voice again.

101121401.name: The Trial That Must Be Cleared: Before
101121401.desc: Guided by the mysterious voice, Leviathan finally realizes that Vidar is a fake. Battle is inevitable.

101121402.name: The Trial That Must Be Cleared: After
101121402.desc: Leviathan defeats the illusion of Vidar, which shatters the dream world and allows the mysterious voice to finally assume form.

101121501.name: My Name Is Labbi: Before
101121501.desc: Having fallen into a bubble world, Leviathan meets "Labbi", an AI attached to an Access Key. She also discovers she is capable of new powers now.

101121502.name: My Name Is Labbi: After
101121502.desc: With the Visbanes defeated, Leviathan has a premonition that the Admin is in danger.

101121601.name: A Worthy Heroine
101121601.desc: After rescuing the Admin, Leviathan decides to join everyone in their fight against the Siren.

101121701.name: Countertide Whalesong: Before
101121701.desc: With Leviathan and the Admin joining the ranks, the final battle against the Siren can finally begin.

101121702.name: Countertide Whalesong: After
101121702.desc: With the Siren defeated, all of the bubble worlds are destroyed.

101121801.name: Summer Will Eventually Fade
101121801.desc: Everyone is rescued, and their adventures fade into the depths of the sea.

101142001.name: Convallaria Selections: Before
101142001.desc: The nine-year-old Athena took part in the selections run by the Knights of Convallaria for the very first time.

101142002.name: Convallaria Selections: After
101142002.desc: Athena passed both the written and battlefield parts of the selection. However, she was then informed that there was one more hurdle she had to cross.

101142101.name: Determined
101142101.desc: Despite being told that there was an additional test after having passed both the written and battlefield parts of the selection, Athena accepted the challenge without complaint.

101142201.name: An Unexpected Trial
101142201.desc: Athena, who had entered Stellaris Temple alone, was attacked by the newly installed AGI Mecha guarding the temple which failed to recognize her.

101142301.name: Unmarked on the Map
101142301.desc: Athena, who was being pursued by the AGI Mecha, found herself in a room that she had never seen before on the map. There, she met a sculptor who was hard at work.

101142401.name: The Uncompleted Gift: Before
101142401.desc: It turned out that the sculptor was a friend of Colleen Pallas, Athena's grandmother, who had borrowed the Pallas family treasure to create a gift for Colleen.

101142402.name: The Uncompleted Gift: After
101142402.desc: The sculptor asked Athena to wait until the sculpture was completed.

101142501.name: In a Race With Time: Before
101142501.desc: The sculptor was becoming visibly weaker. However, he continued to work as hard as he can to try and complete the gift he had promised.

101142502.name: In a Race With Time: After
101142502.desc: The sculptor took Athena on a tour of his living quarters outside the room while a short break from his work.

101142601.name: Athena's Promise: Before
101142601.desc: Seeing that the artist had become weak, the Visbane hiding in the mirror launched its attack.

101142602.name: Athena's Promise: After
101142602.desc: To protect the artist and his work, Athena wielded her sword against a mighty foe.

101142701.name: It's Finally Over
101142701.desc: Athena's incredible journey came to an end with the delivery of the completed sculpture as promised.

101142801.name: The Youngest-Ever Knight: Before
101142801.desc: Artemis, who was waiting for Athena outside the temple, was on pins and needles, and nearly got into a fight with Argo.

101142802.name: The Youngest-Ever Knight: After
101142802.desc: Athena finally emerged from the temple. She was now indisputably the youngest-ever person to become a Knight of Convallaria.

101142901.name: Eyes on the Starry Sky
101142901.desc: Athena delivered the statue to her grandmother, and conveyed a message from the sculptor.

101150101.name: Secret Deal
101150101.desc: Late in the night, Kingu met up with a mystery person, and steeled himself for an unpleasant undertaking.

101150201.name: The Rebellion: Before
101150201.desc: The Akkadian Guild was under heavy assault by those who called themselves the Resistance. Marduk arrived on the scene to the relief of the besieged.

101150301.name: Stealthy Shadow: Before
101150301.desc: In a container zone far from the battle front, Anubis received an order that come from Paracaesar herself.

101150302.name: Stealthy Shadow: After
101150302.desc: Anubis handily completed the mission that was given to her. However, Paracaesar seemed to have other plans lined up.

101150401.name: The Dilemma: Before
101150401.desc: Father and son, facing off against each other in what was a complicated situation, made their respective choices.

101150402.name: The Dilemma: After
101150402.desc: Kingu played a plethora of tricks. Marduk had no choice but to take drastic action.

101150502.name: Turning the Tide: After
101150502.desc: Marduk forced Kingu to show his trump card. The price for this, however, was the complete collapse of the Akkadian Guild battle line.

101150602.name: The Dark Gold Menace: After
101150602.desc: Marduk fell to Kingu in battle and was captured.

101150701.name: The Jackal's Choice: Before
101150701.desc: Paracaesar finally issued a new order. However, Anubis must consider the price of carrying out this order.

101150702.name: The Jackal's Choice: After
101150702.desc: Anubis experienced a rush of memories after watching Marduk and Kingu went against each other, and came to a decision.

101150801.name: An Unexpected Encounter
101150801.desc: Anubis came to the Rostach Drinkery to receive his punishment from Paracaesar. There, he met Bastet, whom Paracaesar had sent, instead.

101150901.name: Jack of Hearts: Before
101150901.desc: To find out where Marduk was, Bastet engaged Jack in a card game and won. However, Jack didn’t seem to be one who played fair.

101150902.name: Jack of Hearts: After
101150902.desc: Jack tried to pull a fast one on Bastet, but was eventually overcome by Anubis (who had been secretly watching) instead. He had no choice but to give up some closely held information under Anubis’ interrogation.

101151001.name: King of the Ring: Before
101151001.desc: The clue pointed to a legendary fighter in the container zone, and there was only one way to extract information from a man like this. Anubis decided to go it alone.

101151002.name: King of the Ring: After
101151002.desc: Anubis earned the right to question the legendary fighter after a bracing battle and he learned something else apart from Marduk's whereabouts.

101151101.name: Buried Deep
101151101.desc: Following the information they had been given, Anubis and Bastet located an old record treasured by Marduk. The record contained a shocking secret.

101151201.name: Skulking in the Night: I
101151201.desc: Bastet and Anubis sneaked into the forbidden zone where Marduk was. They started talking about Anubis' past.

101151203.name: Skulking in the Night: During
101151203.desc: Bastet and Anubis ran into Resistance patrollers, and heard that monsters had appeared in the vicinity.

101151202.name: Skulking in the Night: After
101151202.desc: Bastet and Anubis brought Marduk to safety. Faced with Anubis’ questioning, Marduk finally resolved to tell him the truth.

101151301.name: Project Graytower
101151301.desc: Marduk recounted his memories of Project Graytower. Anubis finally learned the awful truth about his adoptive father's sacrifice.

101151401.name: Resistance HQ: Before
101151401.desc: Kingu, who was busy recruiting new blood, learned about Marduk's escape and decided to lead the pursuit himself. At the same time, Bastet, Anubis, and Marduk had no choice but to fight.

101151501.name: Copper Duel I: Before
101151501.desc: Reinforcements from the Akkadian Guild finally arrived in the nick of time. Father and son were once again facing off against each other on the battlefield. But this time round, they had opted for the Copper Duel.

101151502.name: Copper Duel I: After
101151502.desc: An old injury hobbled Marduk in the duel. Just as he was going to meet his end in the hands of Kingu, however, Anubis appeared.

101151601.name: Copper Duel II: Before
101151601.desc: Kingu was intractable, and Anubis decided to use some elbow grease.

101151602.name: Copper Duel II: After
101151602.desc: The more experienced Anubis prevailed over Kingu in the battle, making Kingu once again call for his trump card. However, the AGI Mecha known as Dark Metal triggered an unexpected disaster.

101151701.name: Resolve and Resilience: Before
101151701.desc: The sudden Quake resulted in countless casualties. Standing by his fallen aide, Kingu was determined to fufill his responsibilities.

101151702.name: Resolve and Resilience: After
101151702.desc: Kingu finally caught up with Dark Metal, but was almost killed by the haywire AGI Mecha.

101151801.name: Order and Defiance: Before
101151801.desc: Anubis once again got in touch with Paracaesar after the Quake, and finally learned about her cold-blooded plan. This time round, Anubis was going to defy her orders once again.

101151901.name: A Father's Resolve: Before
101151901.desc: Marduk saved the careless Kingu but sustained a severe injury in the process. He declined Anubis' request. This time he was determined to do the right thing as a father.

101152001.name: Father and Son
101152001.desc: Marduk fought to the very end and defeated the corrupted Dark Metal. As the Children of Iron arrived, he decided to let Kingu chose his future path on his own.

101152101.name: Infiltration: Before
101152101.desc: As the bounty hunter was locked in a fierce battle with the Resistance, Sobek arrived at a hidden warehouse on an "infiltration" mission.

101152202.name: The Underground Factory: After
101152202.desc: Sobek discovered an underground factory beneath the warehouse. He also found lab logs at the factory which seemed to have something to do with that Dark Metal mecha.

101152302.name: Urgent Retreat: After
101152302.desc: Sobek inadvertently tripped an alarm but managed to escape the warehouse, and was rescued by Ethan and Olheim who arrived in time.

101152401.name: Project Dark Metal
101152401.desc: Ethan learned more details about Project Dark Gold from the lab logs brought out by Sobek, and decided to rescue Kingu.

101152501.name: Codename 0704
101152501.desc: Paracaesar decided to place the matter of the Rostach incident aside after hearing about how it ended from her secretary. She seemed to have another more important plan.

101152601.name: Act I: Opposition
101152601.desc: The youthful pyrotechnic designer Chloe asked for help between the Society of Muses and the Society of Fireworks, and found herself the target of those who objected to the proposed art reforms.

101152701.name: Act II: Embers Igniting
101152701.desc: At a rehearsal for the Salon, Chloe received wide praise for the ground fireworks she designed. Hera, however, pointed out the many ways in which it could be improved.

101152801.name: Act III: Flames Devouring
101152801.desc: At the Salon, something went wrong with Chloe's ground fireworks, and Hera used the power of Phantasmal Dawn to suppress the resulting explosion. The Salon came to an abrupt end and Chloe was taken away for investigation.

101152901.name: Act IV: A Call in the Night
101152901.desc: Chloe asked the Society of Fireworks for an explanation for the incident but was attacked instead. Just as she was about to give up, Leuce appeared and extended to her an invitation from Hera to visit the Society of Muses.

101153001.name: Act V: What the Beginning Felt Like
101153001.desc: Hera and Chloe had a long talk at the Society of Muses late in the night. With Hera’s help, Chloe recalled her initial motivations as a pyrotechnic designer and was re-energized.

101153101.name: Fin: Dawn Star
101153101.desc: The Salon was held again at a later date, and at the event, Hera engaged in an open war of words with those who objected to the proposed art reforms, and showcased Chloe's new work. She also righted the wrong suffered by Chloe.

101170101.name: Fire at the Mansion
101170101.desc: A puzzling fire drew the attention of Odin. The Valleyrand Family was in the midst of a major upheaval.

101170201.name: Fire Scene: Before
101170201.desc: Heimdall was instructed to investigate the fire. Another fire broke out on the scene, and a large number of Visbanes emerged from the flames. Battle appeared imminent.

101170202.name: Fire Scene: After
101170202.desc: Heimdall, trapped in the fire, received help from Tyr in the nick of time.

101170301.name: Tyr Valleyrand: Before
101170301.desc: Two Modifiers of dramatically different positions made their identities known to each other, and embarked on a new partnership.

101170302.name: Tyr Valleyrand: After
101170302.desc: After exchanging some intel, Tyr and Heimdall decided to continue working together.

101170401.name: Family
101170401.desc: While unable to awaken Tyrfing's power, Tyr was determined to fight.

101170501.name: Partners Contingent: Before
101170501.desc: Tyr and Heimdall officially began working together, and would soon come upon an astonishing discovery.

101170502.name: Partners Contingent: After
101170502.desc: At the fire scene, the two found a Source Layer rift and ventured into it.

101170601.name: Firebrand Space: Before
101170601.desc: Deep inside the Source Layer, danger came from everywhere. Tyr battled as best as he could to allow Heimdall to collect the data needed.

101170602.name: Firebrand Space: After
101170602.desc: At the core of the Source Layer, the duo encountered the giant flame beast Garmr. To ensure that they could get to the truth, Tyr had to keep fighting the Visbane no matter what...

101170702.name: Hell Hound: After
101170702.desc: The fierce battle finally gave the two the data they were seeking. However, irreconcilable differences also meant that their provisional partnership was at an end.

101170801.name: Promises and Lies
101170801.desc: Tyr finally returned to a home where he could rest easy. There, he reflected on some memories before setting off once again.

101170901.name: Fruitless Investigation: Before
101170901.desc: Aether Gazer became involved in the fire incident at the Valleyrand mansion, and once again Heimdall was asked to investigate.

101170902.name: Fruitless Investigation: After
101170902.desc: Heimdall did not encounter Garmr again. But something Odin said made Heimdall uneasy.

101171001.name: Burning Vengeance: Before
101171001.desc:
Heimdall visited the Valleyrands at their apartment, and managed to convince Edward to take her to Tyr.
While this was happening, Tyr and Grandet were meeting at an abandoned construction site.

101171002.name: Burning Vengeance: After
101171002.desc: Nephew and uncle, long rivals in business, finally met, and Tyr exacted his vengeance with help from the Visbanes.

101171101.name: Ray of Hope
101171101.desc: Heimdall and Tyr were greeted by the sight of a mansion engulfed in flames: there had been a distortion in the Surface Layer.

101171201.name: Fiery Showdown: Before
101171201.desc: Forced to choose between his loved ones and his mission as a Modifier, Tyr made the impossible choice.

101171202.name: Fiery Showdown: After
101171202.desc: Heimdall and Edward arrived on scene, and, with the encouragement from his kin, Tyr redeemed himself.

101171301.name: A New Era
101171301.desc: The potential disaster was quelled at last, paving the way for what was a destined partnership.

102210101.name: Thoughts Over Tea
102210101.desc:
According to a program on TV, the stock price of Tian Lu Traders had plummeted, and its president had resigned to take responsibility for this occurrence.
Gengchen watched the program without saying a word, though Lingguang could sense her agitation and asked her if she wanted to go see Luliang, whom she hadn't seen for many years.

102210201.name: Yu Jing Memories
102210201.desc: Luliang thought back to the days when she could have a meal with Gengchen and the two of them would talk about their dreams and how they would help each other. But now... it looked like she couldn't even hold on to Tian Lu Traders any longer...

102210301.name: Images of Days Past
102210301.desc: Luliang returned to the streets where she grew up, feeling lost. However, the sight of the bustling street gave her new motivation. She entered a gallery where her eyes fell on a painting titled "Along the Luo River"...

102210401.name: Reunion
102210401.desc: It was as if the two of them had just met the day before. Gengchen brought a valuable bottle of liquor to cheer Luliang up, and the latter invited her to watch a magic show called "Business."

102210501.name: So-Called "Businessperson"
102210501.desc: Seeing that Luliang was in good spirits, Gengchen planned to make her way back to the Quad. However, due to Luliang's pestering, she eventually decided to spend another afternoon with her. Along the way, she found herself cheered up by the hustle and bustle of Xu Heng as well...

102210601.name: Along the Luo River
102210601.desc: In the final scene of "magic show," Luliang brought Gengchen to the gallery where she gifted "Along the Luo River" to Gengchen. This painting illustrates your wish, Luliang said.

102210701.name: Return
102210701.desc: Luliang returned to Tian Lu Traders with a gift for Yingzhao as well as a grand present for everyone: a declaration from an alliance of small and medium businesses in Xu Heng for the titans.

102220101.name: And So Lie The Mountain and Rivers
102220101.desc: Yingzhao arrived on Nanjiao Isle on behalf of Tian Lu Traders to participate in a bid for mineral development rights, but eventually lost to San Ding Group. After consoling the Nanjiao workshop owners who had bee squeezed out by San Ding, Yingzhao received an urgent message from Linyu.

102220201.name: This and That: Before
102220201.desc: Yingzhao rushed to Mount Xiaoyang, where Linyu was on an investigative mission. There, she encountered AGI Mechas that'd been corrupted by Bane Energy.

102220202.name: This and That: After
102220202.desc: Linyu was thankfully rescued by a Modifier named Jinwu, though by then she'd already passed out. Yingzhao took the two of them to an old craftsman at the foot of the mountain, and then went out alone again to investigate the situation.

102220301.name: Competing Concerns
102220301.desc: Upon questioning the old craftsman, Yingzhao learned about the unscrupulous methods used by San Ding Group to obtain mineral rights. Linyu regained consciousness, and told Yingzhao that there was a powerful Visbane at Mount Xiaoyang, and Yingzhao and Jinwu decided to tackle the Visbane problem first.

102220401.name: Problem To Be Solved: Before
102220401.desc: Yingzhao and Jinwu ran into Bane-corrupted AGI Mechas again on the way to the mine where Linyu encountered the powerful Visbane.

102220402.name: Problem To Be Solved: After
102220402.desc: On the mountain, Yingzhao and Jinwu started to feel dizzy for no reason, but became better after consuming some hibiscus blooms Jinwu picked. As Yingzhao searched for the Visbane, San Ding Group was hatching yet another scheme...

102220501.name: Tableau Crisis: Before
102220501.desc: Yingzhao and Jinwu came across a broken stone tablet, which Jinwu recognized to be the so-called "Ruomu Tableau," a boundary stone that kept up the barrier keeping in Chaos, the formless Visbane. But before the two of them could move past the barrier, they encountered the powerful Visbane that Linyu had mentioned.

102220502.name: Tableau Crisis: After
102220502.desc: Yingzhao and Linyu had no choice but to retreat as the Visbane was continuously strengthened by some kind of power. Fortunately, the Visbane remained trapped behind the barrier. As the barrier was set up by Jinwu's teacher Xihe, they decided to go to Mount Dayang to find Xihe, who had disappeared for several days.

102220601.name: Of Chivalry
102220601.desc: Though Yingzhao did not manage to meet Xihe, during her conversation with Jinwu she became moved by the latter's pure dream of becoming a hero. The two ran into Mengzhang, who had come to visit Xihe, as they came down the mountain. Unfortunately, Mengzhang had brought bad news about the world outside...

102220701.name: Realm of Imago: Before
102220701.desc: The workshop owners, who could not bear being squeezed out by San Ding Group any longer, formed a team to go into the mountains to mine Songjade. Yingzhao followed them into the mountains, but could not stop the agitated workshop owners, and in a moment of weakness, she became prey to the inner demon unleashed by Chaos...

102220702.name: Realm of Imago: After
102220702.desc: Yingzhao was able to free herself of the inner demon, and sent the civilians who fell unconscious to Vermilion Wellness for treatment. At the same time, CORG applied for a cordon to be placed around the mountain. Yingzhao returned to the old craftsman's workshop to rest, but received news that San Ding Group had entered the mountain earlier than expected to start their mining...

102220801.name: Inside and Outside: Before
102220801.desc: The seal from the Ruomu Tableau was broken by San Ding Group's heavy machinery, and a Visbane appeared and attacked everyone. Mengzhang knocked out the humans present and sent them outside the barrier, then started fighting the Visbane alongside Yingzhao and Jinwu.

102220802.name: Inside and Outside: After
102220802.desc: Although the Visbane was eliminated, the Ruomu Tableau appeared to be on the verge of collapse. To ensure the safety of the surrounding area, Yingzhao returned to the tableau alone to try strengthening the seal, but fell unconscious after exhausting herself. She was later rescued by Xihe.

102220901.name: So Should The Mountain And Rivers Be
102220901.desc: Yingzhao regained consciousness and learned that not only was she safe and sound, Xihe had also taken care of Chaos. Jinwu bid farewell to Yingzhao and followed Xihe back to Ruomu Palace to continue her practice. Yingzhao continued to busy herself with the issues surrounding mining on Nanjiao Isle...

102221001.name: A Trip Worthwhile
102221001.desc: Two days prior. Mengzhang came to Mount Dayang to visit Xihe, and spoke of certain secrets that were unknown at the time.

104100101.name: The Slums of Shashvat: Before
104100101.desc: The Tian Lu Traders' Modifier, Luwu, goes to the slums of Shashvat to find the source of illegal medication, and is attacked by hoodlums as soon as she arrives.

104100102.name: The Slums of Shashvat: After
104100102.desc: Another gang comes to Luwu's rescue. She goes to an underground fight club, where she sees a fighter called Azim injecting the illegal substance. After the match, Luwu corners Azim and asks where the substance came from.

104100201.name: Missing Persons: Before
104100201.desc: Kali mediates the conflict between Luwu and Azim, and takes Luwu to Meruism to learn about the situation on the ground. Azim goes to Vimoksha Pharma to buy medicine for his daughter. Luwu helps the Meruism take care of some roaming Visbanes.

104100202.name: Missing Persons: After
104100202.desc: Luwu receives news that Gengchen has gone missing in the Xu Heng disaster. Luliang asks her to keep an eye out for Zhiming, who hasn't been heard from since she went to Shashvat. Zhiming had also visited Meruism, but left no clue as to where she was heading next.

104100301.name: Police Story: Before
104100301.desc: All pharmaceutical sales channels are controlled by the Panthera. Azim doesn't come home at night. Luwu searches through some small inventions Zhiming left with Meruism, and is attacked by a gang when she takes a nighttime stroll to clear her head.

104100302.name: Police Story: After
104100302.desc: The local police are all corrupt and would rather sit back than take any action to address crime in the slums. A bar is set ablaze, which is put out by the Meruism firefighting team. Afterwards, Luwu confides in Kali that she used to be a police officer.

104100401.name: The Last Bullet: Before
104100401.desc: Luwu remembers why she always carries an unused bullet with her: it was given to her by her former police colleague, the CORG Modifier Baize. When morning comes and Azim still isn't home, Kali and Luwu go to Vimoksha Pharma to look for him.

104100402.name: The Last Bullet: After
104100402.desc: Leveraging her status as a Tian Lu Traders partner, Luwu is able to secure a meeting with the CEO of Vimoksha Pharma, Seema. Vimoksha Pharma is popular with the slum dwellers because it provides cut-price medicine. Azim decides to get a job at the company to earn some extra money.

104100501.name: Quagmire: Before
104100501.desc: Luwu carries out a one-woman raid of the Panthera "importing goods." The supplier flees, and Luwu finds herself surrounded by the Panthera.

104100502.name: Quagmire: After
104100502.desc: Luwu finds Zhiming's badge on a shipping container. Police officers in cahoots with the Panthera place Luwu under arrest, until she is freed by Kali.

104100601.name: A Sleepless Night: Before
104100601.desc: All the clues lead Luwu to Vimoksha Pharma. She breaks in, but is quickly caught by the police.

104100602.name: A Sleepless Night: After
104100602.desc: At the police station, Luwu bumps into a gang member she'd fought with before, who gives her information on Zhiming's whereabouts.

104100701.name: A Determined Mind: Before
104100701.desc: While at a fight Azim is supposed to be participating in, Luwu spots one of Vimoksha Pharma's workshop managers, Kumar, and confirms that he is the one supplying the illegal substance.

104100702.name: A Determined Mind: After
104100702.desc: Kali finds out where Zhiming was heading after visiting Meruism, but encounters Visbanes while on her trail. She then finds out that the Panthera have found out about Luwu's connection to the Meruism, and have gone there to make trouble.

104100801.name: Fists and Firearms: Before
104100801.desc: Luwu rushes from the fight to the market after hearing the Panthera are out to cause trouble. She duels with its leader, Ravana, with the gang's territorial boundary as a bet.

104100802.name: Fists and Firearms: After
104100802.desc: Luwu and Ravana are equally matched, but their bout is interrupted by an explosion in the city. Ravana takes her people and leaves. Luwu bumps into Baize during her investigation, who tells her CORG are taking over responsibility for finding Zhiming and dealing with the Visbanes.

104100901.name: Quad Signal
104100901.desc: As she is rewatching the Meruism CCTV footage, Luwu is shocked to see the Quad Signal in the smoke from the explosion, and guesses it was Zhiming's way of asking Baize for help. Baize decides to wait for reinforcements upon learning there might be a Cognizant Visbane, which causes no end of arguing from Luwu.

104101001.name: Crossing the Line: Before
104101001.desc: Luwu remembers her last case as a police officer, and decides she doesn't want any more regrets like that. She breaks into Vimoksha Pharma to look for Zhiming, but is captured by a group of participants.

104101002.name: Crossing the Line: After
104101002.desc: Luwu tries to break out, but Ravana appears and defeats her, breaking her Access Key. The extent of Seema's collaboration with Ravana becomes clear.

104101101.name: Luwu's Spear
104101101.desc: Ravana goes to check on Zhiming. Luwu learns that Zhiming is being held in the main building of the research institute, and uses her backup plan to summon her Access Key to take her there.

104101201.name: Chaotic Battle: Before
104101201.desc: Luwu bursts into the main building, but her way is blocked by Cognizant Visbanes, AGI Mechas, and people under mind control.

104101202.name: Chaotic Battle: After
104101202.desc: The building erupts into chaos. A squad of armed drug testers come running out, weapons raised, while Meruism and Marduk's mercenaries come to the rescue. Seema plans to leave the facility with the Fist of Revenge and seek her revenge in the Affluent District.

104101301.name: So-called Justice: Before
104101301.desc: Luwu stops Seema and the Fist of Revenge. Baize reads out Seema's crimes in the name of CORG.

104101302.name: So-called Justice: After
104101302.desc: Luwu defeats the Fist of Revenge. Kumar knocks Seema out as she makes her escape, then helps Luwu open the way to where Zhiming is being held prisoner in the research institute...

104101401.name: Wrong Moment: Before
104101401.desc: Gengchen sends the Quad's Shuofang Isle representative Zhiming to Shashvat to search for Brahmā and the Book of All Past she's carrying. However, neither of them realizes what's in store for them...

104101402.name: Wrong Moment: After
104101402.desc: After two weeks, and with help from Meruism, Zhiming finally sees Brahmā. She's very cagey, and promises to take Zhiming to see the Book of All Past in another two weeks. Ten days later, Zhiming hears about the incident on Mount Jingdu and has to rush back to Xu Heng to help coordinate the investigation. She looks for Brahmā in the hope of resolving the issue quickly.

104101501.name: A Strange Occurrence: Before
104101501.desc: Zhiming is ambushed by a gang as she leaves the Slums. After a heated exchange of words, she gets some clues from them about the strange substance being used in the boxing ring.

104101502.name: A Strange Occurrence: After
104101502.desc: Zhiming finds Brahmā thanks to a tracking device she secretly planted on her, just as Brahmā is about to use her Prime Power to "build" something. Not wishing to disturb her, Zhiming leaves only to be attacked by Ravana.

104101601.name: Silver Lining
104101601.desc: Zhiming comes to in Vimoksha Pharma's underground laboratory, and finds that both her Divine Power and Access Key have been sealed away. Seema is furious that Ravana has brought an outsider to the facility because she doesn't want to attract any unwanted attention, but upon learning that Zhiming is an academic, instead invites her to help with their research.

104101701.name: Vengeance and Destruction: Before
104101701.desc: Zhiming sees how dangerous Seema's research is, and learns of her plans for vengeance. Zhiming pretends to cooperate, gaining a rough idea of how the facility operates and observing the human trials that are at the heart of the research.

104101702.name: Vengeance and Destruction: After
104101702.desc: Zhiming tries to save the participants being killed by the AGI Mecha, but is overcome by Ravana. Ravana tells Zhiming about Gengchen's disappearance, which both shocks and angers her.

104101801.name: The Art of War: Before
104101801.desc: Zhiming pretends to be frightened, and begins working hard on Seema's plan. The new drug has an even higher mortality rate in the participants, which gives Zhiming more authority to carry out her work.

104101802.name: The Art of War: After
104101802.desc: Rumors and fear spread among the participants that the experiments are getting more and more dangerous. Zhiming pretends she wants to discipline the participants as an excuse to get in the same room as them, and bumps into Azim from Meruism.

104101901.name: Unknown Strategy
104101901.desc: Azim causes trouble as per Zhiming's instructions, making him Seema's first choice as a consumable for the new tests. Although he emerges from the test chamber alive, fear and doubt continue to plague the participants.

104102001.name: Step One: Observe: Before
104102001.desc: Kumar, Seema's brother-in-law and production line manager, doesn't seem to be as obsessed with revenge as she is. Zhiming devises a fake escape to test Kumar's loyalties.

104102002.name: Step One: Observe: After
104102002.desc: Seema catches Zhiming and places her under house arrest. Kumar comes to visit Zhiming and promises to help her escape. As Azim recovers from his injuries, Kumar offers to pay his fine for missing the bout.

104102101.name: Step Two: Analyze: Before
104102101.desc: The development and testing of the Fist of Revenge are drawing to a close, and Zhiming proposes that the participants be the study sample for the Fist of Revenge's combat logic. Seema makes Zhiming choose which of the participants will fight against the Fist of Revenge.

104102102.name: Step Two: Analyze: After
104102102.desc: The Fist of Revenge malfunctions during the fight, nearly killing the participants. The participants turn against Zhiming, who now has Seema's trust and manages to convince her to spare Azim's life.

104102201.name: Step Three: Deduce: Before
104102201.desc: Zhiming gains permission to move freely around the Industrial Park. She seizes the opportunity to secretly make a bomb from chemicals she finds in the old factory.

104102202.name: Step Three: Deduce: After
104102202.desc: The Fist of Revenge is nearly complete, and is absorbing almost all of Seema's attention. Kumar accuses Zhiming of being a traitor and begs Seema not to kill indiscriminately, but he's placed under house arrest. Zhiming goes to visit Kumar—how the tables have turned...

104102301.name: Step Four: Act: Before
104102301.desc: Seema receives a tip-off that Zhiming is still planning on freeing the participants. Zhiming arms the bomb and prepares to escape by herself.

104102302.name: Step Four: Act: After
104102302.desc: Zhiming is captured by the Fist of Revenge. Seema is disappointed in Zhiming's lack of interest, and orders Ravana to lock her in the underground lab to be used as a computing consumable. Seema is about to take the Fist of Revenge to the Affluent District, and Kumar is released.

104102401.name: Fear of Loss: Before
104102401.desc: Kumar visits Zhiming as she's held in captivity in the underground lab, and she reveals her real plan to him. It's at this very moment that Luwu storms Vimoksha Pharma on her own and Zhiming diverts the computer to restore her Access Key, instigating riots by the participants and allowing her to take the key to the Book of All Past.

104102402.name: Fear of Loss: After
104102402.desc: Zhiming is caught by Ravana. She fights back with all her strength but is still no match for her. Her only choice is to stall for time with the Book of All Past key until Luwu and Kali can get there.

104102501.name: Pride of Gain: Before
104102501.desc: Ravana uses her full power to steal the Book of All Past key. Luwu, Zhiming and Kali team up to oppose her.

104102502.name: Pride of Gain: After
104102502.desc: Even the three of them together are at a disadvantage, until the arrival of another Cognizant Visbane breaks the impasse. Just as all hope seems lost, they realize that the Cognizant Visbane was chased here. Brahmā soon arrives to save them.

104102601.name: Uncertain Outcome
104102601.desc: Kumar takes over Vimoksha Pharma. Azim is crowned the Slums champion. The Mods return to Meruism and Brahmā finally allows Zhiming to touch the Book of All Past. However, the trials and tribulations of Shashvat have only just begun...

104110101.name: Looking Back
104110101.desc: Thoth entrusts a mysterious girl into Lokken's care, which piques Lokken's interest in Thoth's past.

104110201.name: Moonchase
104110201.desc: After battle, Thoth heads to the Land of Moons to visit a young woman called Ygritte. Just as she's leaving, Paracaesar sends through yet another factory inspection mission.

104110301.name: Creeping Misfortune
104110301.desc: Thoth and Ygritte meet up to go shopping. On the way, they are ambushed by a Visbane attack.

104110401.name: Ready to Fly
104110401.desc: After her rescue, Ygritte is sent to CORG for a health check, which reveals that her disease is incurable. Paracaesar recommends she be put forward for modification under Project Blacksteel.

104110501.name: Preliminary Exploration
104110501.desc: Ygritte stays with CORG to continue her treatment, while Thoth and her Sigma Squad go to the factory to investigate. An engineer, Jolin, shows them the production line.

104110601.name: Working in Collusion
104110601.desc: Thoth tries to hack into the security system with the help of Sigma No. 6. Separately, Paracaesar puts in motion her plan to capture Liberty.

104110701.name: Dangerous Order
104110701.desc: Thoth is carried away from the investigation by a Mega AGI Mecha that appears from nowhere. Sigma No. 6 and No. 1 request to go rescue her.

104110801.name: One Trouble After Another
104110801.desc: No. 1 and No. 6 get Thoth out of danger for now. Just as she's about to be arrested, Liberty puts the CORG soldiers under her control and orders them to attack Paracaesar.

104110901.name: Enlightenment
104110901.desc: No. 1 sacrifices themselves in battle. Paracaesar orders the Sigma Squad to stall the Mega AGI Mecha's "Apocalypse" so Thoth and No. 6 can activate Deep Consciousness Sharing.

104111001.name: Manpower
104111001.desc: Paracaesar and Liberty negotiate to try and find out the secret behind "Apocalypse." Thoth and No. 6 are embroiled in a fierce battle.

104111101.name: Protection
104111101.desc: No. 6 protects Thoth, who has been rendered unconscious in her victory over "Apocalypse." No. 6's carapace begins to shut down just as backup arrives. The cracked helmet reveals Ygritte's face.

104111201.name: Bright Moon
104111201.desc: Thoth connects to Ygritte's consciousness and searches her memories. She finds out she's been modified, then wakes her up. However, in order to retain her memory, Ygritte decides to abandon her treatment and bids farewell to Thoth in her consciousness.

104111301.name: Fading Light of Life
104111301.desc: The fairytale "The Ibis and the Moon" is successfully published. Thoth tries to console No. 1's family. Norvi chooses this time to visit Thoth.

104111401.name: New Life
104111401.desc: Thoth saves Lokken after her fight with Ver, and talks to her about the Hyperspace experiment and the 07 series.

104111501.name: Resource
104111501.desc: Thoth contacts Marduk for information about the 07 series protobody.

104111601.name: Interests Coincidental
104111601.desc: As Thoth sneaks into the target factory, she comes across Ethan, who's simply here to steal. Thoth suggests they work together.

104111701.name: Cover Up
104111701.desc: The Children of Iron arrive to help. Ethan manages to evade interrogation by Anubis by disguising himself as an engineer.

104111801.name: Crossing Swords
104111801.desc: Ethan is caught by Anubis, and during the ensuing battle he manages to hide in the factory.

104111901.name: Captive
104111901.desc: During a conversation, Thoth works out that Jolin is the one pulling Ethan's strings. Ethan finds the Recycling Center basement and begins pocketing the goods he finds there, but Anubis suddenly appears and detains him.

104112001.name: Rescue
104112001.desc: Anubis is unable to glean any information from her interrogation of Ethan. Thoth leads the Children of Iron to spring Ethan free.

104112101.name: All Square
104112101.desc: Thoth convinces Anubis to stop pursuing her. She then delivers the goods to Ethan and gains intel about Jolin in return.

104112201.name: Restart
104112201.desc: Thoth finds Jolin, and gets him to help her revive Artificial Mod 0705.

104112301.name: Blank Slate
104112301.desc: Thoth revives Skuld but is attacked, only managing to pacify her through Deep Consciousness Sharing.

104112401.name: Lost Wish
104112401.desc: Thoth tries to gently bring back Skuld's memories. Skuld starts learning how to live.

104112501.name: Brand New Chapter
104112501.desc: Thoth is due to leave, and entrusts Skuld to Lokken, who has just returned from Shashvat.

104112601.name: Ep 00
104112601.desc: The Paracaesar from outside the Branching Space finds herself from ten years ago, and gets rid of that particular loose end.

104112701.name: Ep 01
104112701.desc: Thoth takes Lokken back to CORG. She reports her latest mission results to Paracaesar on the way.

104112801.name: Ep 02
104112801.desc: Thoth and Ver return from the Plane Layer. They discover that buildings that are damaged in the Plane Layer are also damaged in the Surface Layer.

104112901.name: Ep 03
104112901.desc: Thoth meets her former self from ten years ago, and they agree to swap identities.

104113001.name: Ep 04
104113001.desc: Thoth once again meets her former self from ten years ago, and they exchange stories on what happened to them after they swapped identities.

104113101.name: Ep 05
104113101.desc: Ningishzida bumps into Thoth on the way to the bookstore, and invites her to breakfast.

104113201.name: Ep 06
104113201.desc: After Thoth and Ver lose contact, Ningishzida summons up the courage to go for backup, but she is stopped by Paracaesar.

104113301.name: Ep 07
104113301.desc: Experiment No. 10 obeys her mentor and kills all of her sisters in the research facility. As the only one who leaves alive, she is given her own name: Lokken.

104113401.name: Ep 08
104113401.desc: Paracaesar leaves Lokken in the Molander Research Institute, where she trains and accomplishes missions every day in a desperate desire to be the strongest.

104113501.name: Ep 09
104113501.desc: Ningishzida brings an old group photo taken with Ver. It causes a great deal of amusement, and everyone decides it should be put on the wall.

104113601.name: Ep 10
104113601.desc: After their afternoon tea, Ningishzida and Ver decide to explore Turing's home on a whim. There, they find him playing a game of online chess.

104113701.name: Ep 11
104113701.desc: Ver and Ningishzida go to the medical center to visit the children, but they're told the children aren't in a good way. Seeing Ver's anxiety, the Prez tells her that there might be one final option.

104113801.name: Ep 12
104113801.desc: As Thoth and Ver search the Plane Layer for the pathway being used by the Cleansers to access the Surface Layer, they talk about what happened to Thoth while she was away.

104113901.name: Ep 13
104113901.desc: Their mission complete, Turing and Gremory dispose of all traces and leave their Molander residence.

104114001.name: Ep 14
104114001.desc: Paracaesar questions Thoth as to why she didn't order Ver to withdraw. Thoth gives Ver the opportunity to prove herself in battle.

104120101.name: A New Friend: Before
104120101.desc: Oneiroi wakes up and sees that her surroundings are different to normal. She tries to go back to her "dream house," but she loses her way. A strange Poker Soldier arrests Drowsie, then tries to arrest Oneiroi too.

104120103.name: A New Friend: During
104120103.desc: A fluffy creature attempts to attack Oneiroi. However, Mama Sheep stops when she realizes that Oneiroi is actually carrying Drowsie instead of her baby lamb.

104120102.name: A New Friend: After
104120102.desc: Oneiroi and Mama Sheep help free a robot stuck in the wall. The robot has lost its thinking module, and wants to seek help from the "Dream Master." Upon hearing Oneiroi's description of the dream house, Mr. Robot decides that the Dream Master must be there too, and offers to accompany her.

104120201.name: White Night Gallery Encounter: Before
104120201.desc: After endless twists and turns, they reach the White Night Gallery in front of the dream house. There, they meet a puppet girl who's looking for her broken strings.

104120202.name: White Night Gallery Encounter: After
104120202.desc: The White Night Gallery crumbles in the face of Mr. Robot's attack. Oneiroi says that the butler in the dream house is very talented; he'll not only be able to rebuild the gallery, but he'll also be able to make everyone's wishes come true. They approach the dream house.

104120301.name: Return to the dream house
104120301.desc: The butler greets Oneiroi as they reach the dream house, but ignores everyone else with her. Oneiroi invites everyone to stay with her in the dream house, but they have other plans and soon want to leave. However, the butler warns them that it's "very dangerous" outside and refuses to let them leave. Oneiroi goes to the window and sees that the outside is dark and twisted like a nightmare.

104120401.name: Off Again: Before
104120401.desc: They manage to escape the dream house by eating their way through the wall, but the noise attracts unwanted attention from a squad of Poker Soldiers.

104120402.name: Off Again: After
104120402.desc: After they defeat the Poker Soldiers, the dream house begins to melt and Oneiroi realizes that this isn't her real home. The group set off again in search of the real dream house.

104120502.name: Mr. Cookie: After
104120502.desc: Mr. Cookie is still alive amongst the rubble of the White Night Gallery. He tells Oneiroi that there is a new Dream Master now, who is plotting to create a dream that will keep a young woman imprisoned in it for all eternity. Just before he dies, Mr. Cookie realizes that Oneiroi must be that woman.

104120601.name: Mama Sheep and the Brave Little Lamb: Before
104120601.desc: A young lamb is fighting Poker Soldiers on the battlefield – it must be the child Mama Sheep is searching for. Oneiroi is inspired by the little lamb, and helps it fight off the soldiers.

104120602.name: Mama Sheep and the Brave Little Lamb: After
104120602.desc: It dawns on Oneiroi that she's never going to get out of here by fighting – she needs to solve the problem at its source. She bids farewell to Mama Sheep and Little Lamb. This is when they realize that they haven't seen Ms. Puppet for a very long time.

104120701.name: Ms. Puppet and Her Strings: Before
104120701.desc: Ms. Puppet is hurt, but Oneiroi isn't able to treat her wounds. Ms. Puppet tells her that she can only heal if she goes back to where she came from and finds her strings. They follow her directions to a familiar aquarium.

104120801.name: Farewell: Before
104120801.desc: Oneiroi goes out to investigate suspicious activity she hears outside the aquarium, and sees Mr. Robot being surrounded by Poker Soldiers. Oneiroi goes to help, but is put in danger when Mr. Robot's battery runs out of power. As things look bleak, Ms. Puppet appears to save the day. She is much more powerful now that her strings are reattached, but Ms. Puppet is also much more irritable than before.

104120802.name: Farewell: After
104120802.desc: Oneiroi understands Ms. Puppet's decision, and leaves with Mr. Robot. Ms. Puppet talks a tough game, but she turns her head to hide the tear rolling down her cheek.

104120901.name: The Robot and the Thinking Module: Before
104120901.desc: With a new thinking module installed, Mr. Robot projects a fuzzy image that tells Oneiroi she needs to go to the Gates of Horn if she wants to put an end to these dreams. Oneiroi doesn't really understand what that means, and asks Mr. Robot to search for any related information. As he's searching, a troop of Poker Soldiers surrounds them.

104120902.name: The Robot and the Thinking Module: After
104120902.desc: Oneiroi on her own is no match for a group of Poker Soldiers, so Mr. Robot uses up most of his remaining power to defeat them. In his last final moments, Mr. Robot finds a sentence that will help Oneiroi: "You first must find yourself." After saying goodbye to Mr. Robot, Oneiroi prepares to head off in search of the real dream house.

104121002.name: Finding Yourself: After
104121002.desc: Oneiroi makes it to the real dream house.

104121101.name: Oneiroi Leaves the Dreamworld: Before
104121101.desc: Oneiroi is prevented from leaving the Gates of Horn by the butler. She notices he's behaving oddly.

104121102.name: Oneiroi Leaves the Dreamworld: After
104121102.desc: Ms. Puppet arrives just in time to help Oneiroi through the Gates of Horn. When she passes through the gates, Oneiroi discovers that the butler was a malevolent imposter, as the real butler is here trying to prevent the collective dream from growing any bigger.

104121201.name: Evil Presence: Before
104121201.desc: Hades appears in the dream and rescues Oneiroi's friends.

104121202.name: Evil Presence: After
104121202.desc: Hades exterminates the Evil Presence, and the dreamworld returns to normal. Oneiroi wakes up.

104121301.name: Waking From a Long Dream
104121301.desc: Not longer after the recent events, Oneiroi returns to the dreamworld to visit her friends.

104140101.name: Summer Starts Now
104140101.desc: Izanami showed up for a sudden visit, and the Admin decided to take her to check out Oceanstar Park. It just so happened that the park was holding a mysterious event during their trip...

104140301.name: Summer Starts Now II
104140301.desc: The ducks steal money! Do ducks even buy things?!

104140401.name: Summer Starts Now III
104140401.desc: Just as they were at a loss as to what to do next, the Admin and Izanami bumped into Apollo, who was doing part-time work at the park. The Modifier gave them a bit of info about the mysterious event.

104140501.name: Summer Starts Now IV
104140501.desc: After arriving at the map location Apollo had given them, the Admin and Izanami found one of the Easter eggs. However, all they found within was a strip of paper with numbers written all over it.

104140601.name: Mystery Easter Egg
104140601.desc: You skipped the story of a CORG soldier making a fool of themselves.

104140602.name: Mystery Easter Egg I
104140602.desc: The CORG soldier thanked you for your help.

104140701.name: Mystery Easter Egg II
104140701.desc: (Sighs) Yep, I knew some people would skip the story. Fine, skip this part if you want. It's only nine lines, anyway.

104140801.name: Mystery Easter Egg III
104140801.desc: As she enjoyed the beach, Sekhmet informed the Admin all a parkgoer needed to do to win the grand prize was collect three treasures. She, however, decided she'd much rather watch Ailuros claw at the sand.

104140901.name: Great Nautical Race
104140901.desc: To the Admin's surprise, Children of Iron members Kingu and Sobek showed up in the park. They provided the Admin with an important piece of information: you had to participate in competitions to win the grand prize. Kingu and Sobek took advantage of the Admin and Izanami being surrounded by AGI Mechas to make their escape.

104141001.name: Great Nautical Race I
104141001.desc: During their hunt for the absconded Kingu and Sobek, the Admin ran into Skadi. She provided the Admin with two clues, which helped the Admin locate Ethan and his cronies. The two sides agreed to face each other in the competition.

104141101.name: Great Nautical Race II
104141101.desc: The Admin and Izanami went shopping for new bathing suits for the boat race. After securing Skadi's assistance, the team headed to the beach in the hopes of clinching a first win in the point sprint.

104141102.name: Great Nautical Race III
104141102.desc: However, a giant duck AGI Mecha dropped from the sky right in the middle of the competition, disrupting all the contestants (including the Admin). One mysterious contestant, however, was able to win the match regardless—with a little help from the people in black's subordinates.

104141201.name: Great Nautical Race IV
104141201.desc:
None too happy with the competition being interrupted, Ethan suggested teaming up with the Admin to deal with Bill, the mysterious person who'd ruined the match. Before the Admin could answer, however, Anubis showed up to capture the Children of Iron. After a chaotic scuffle, they all ran off into the distance.
To comfort the somewhat forlorn Admin, Izanami chose to...

104141301.name: Fugitive Sun
104141301.desc: You mess with one duck—you mess with all the ducks.

104141401.name: Fugitive Sun I
104141401.desc: Within the park, the Admin came across Apollo once more, only this time he was... being chased by a Knight of Convallaria?

104141501.name: Fugitive Sun II
104141501.desc: So, it was all just a misunderstanding.

104141601.name: The Ducky & AGI Mecha Crisis
104141601.desc: The ducks want to take over the park? What?!

104141701.name: The Ducky & AGI Mecha Crisis I
104141701.desc: Huh?! The AGI Mechas are fighting the ducks?

104141801.name: The Ducky & AGI Mecha Crisis II
104141801.desc: And now I'm fighting the AGI Mechas and the ducks?!

104141802.name: The Ducky & AGI Mecha Crisis III
104141802.desc:
Seeing as none of you can beat me, how about we just call this a draw?
"You know we always prefer to settle things with words rather than violence."

104141901.name: The Sound of Music
104141901.desc: The Admin and Izanami wanted to participate in the second competition, but had no idea where it was being held. The two of them bumped into Selene at the shopping street. With her help, the Admin was able to discern two songs playing among all the discordant background music around them. Finding the source of the music led them to the location of the second competition.

104142001.name: The Sound of Music I
104142001.desc: The second competition was just starting when the Admin, Izanami, and Selene arrived at the music shop. The contestants were asked to draw a song, then deduce the location it was hinting at. Finally, they would have to go find a record player at the location and answer a question to get points. Bill ordered his subordinates to make an exhaustive search, while the Admin had Selene and Izanami's support.

104142101.name: The Sound of Music II
104142101.desc: Using Selene's method, the Admin was able to answer many of the questions—but their time was running out. When Admin went back to Ives Music Instruments to answer the question, they found the store completely surrounded by Bill's men, who were trying to head off other contestants by not letting anyone inside.

104142201.name: The Sound of Music III
104142201.desc: The Admin made use of a group of ducks to break up the people in black's barricade. To further throw a wrench in Bill's plans, the Admin also decided to help Selene, tied with Bill in points, win the second competition.

104142203.name: The Sound of Music: Interlude
104142203.desc: Selene answered the question correctly. Bill attacked her, seeking to steal her answer.

104142301.name: The Sound of Music IV
104142301.desc: Bill was defeated handily by Selene, and retreated, licking his wounds. Selene won the prize for the second competition, a signed Steampunk Airship record. The clue for the third competition was a card bearing a drawing of a water gun.

104142401.name: Fugitive Duck
104142401.desc: The wheels of time never stop moving forward—and neither do the Knights of Convallaria.

104142501.name: Fugitive Duck I
104142501.desc:
Selene used her voice to try to capture the duck.
No good, it escaped!

104142601.name: Fugitive Duck II
104142601.desc: Cry all you like—no ducks are coming to save you!

104142602.name: Fugitive Duck III
104142602.desc:
Selene belted out a mighty roar, to great effect!
The duck was captured!

104142701.name: The Great Thievers
104142701.desc: Ethan was as persistent as ever when it came to stealing clues, thieving from whoever figured one out first.

104142801.name: The Great Thievers I
104142801.desc: Stealing a clue doesn't really count as thievery, right? How about stealing a record? Could what the Children of Iron do really be considered stealing?

104142901.name: The Great Thievers ⅠI
104142901.desc: Where a door closes, a window opens. During the chase, the path Zero One took to escape was blocked off!

104142902.name: The Great Thievers III
104142902.desc: If you run fast enough, justice will never catch up with you.

104130101.name: Lost in the Light: Before
104130101.desc: In 2309, Selene, an Astral Council senator, arrived on Krete in search of the lost battleship Nightsong Robin. Helios, commander of the Knights of the Lighthouse, along with fellow Knight Apollo and Artemis, deputy commander of the Knights of Convallaria, sailed in to help. However, along their route, they ran into a mysterious ambush.
