104130102.name: Lost in the Light: After
104130102.desc: Even after repelling the strange pirate assault, the odd conditions didn't change. The intense fog interfered with the ship's navigation, but thankfully a beam of light from Krete's lighthouse, Eternus, dissipated it.

104130201.name: The Town in the Fog: Before
104130201.desc: The ship's crew arrived on Krete to find trouble brewing in the town there. They went to the drinkery to discuss their investigation, only to become embroiled in a conflict with townspeople unsatisfied with the current blockade. The situation quickly escalated to violence.

104130202.name: The Town in the Fog: After
104130202.desc: Artemis took care of the violent villagers, and the island's mayor, Lawrence, dispersed the rest of the unruly townsfolk. The two discussed the current situation; however, they had a disagreement on the subject of going to sea to search for a missing fishing vessel. They parted ways on bad terms.

104130301.name: Trail of Disturbance
104130301.desc: The team investigated the town. Apollo discovered a white figure, but was accosted by townspeople when he went to chase it. A mysterious old person tried to use destiny as an argument to persuade Apollo to join Argentea Vespera, but was chased away by Artemis. Apollo and Artemis then discussed Apollo's uncertainty about his future.

104130401.name: Nightsong Robin: Before
104130401.desc: At the docks, the townsfolk surrounded the Knights' vessel and forced them to sea to conduct a search. As they traveled, Selene informed the other Modifiers on board that there was an entrance to an unknown Sephirah Zone on the sea floor, one that contained great danger. The lighthouse had been placed there by Zeus to watch over the entryway. Their voyage was interrupted by a Visbane assault.

104130402.name: Nightsong Robin: After
104130402.desc: After defeating the Visbanes, the Knights searched for the missing ship, but came up empty-handed. Just as they were at their wit's end, the Nightsong Robin came cutting through the fog—and opened fire on them! Artemis was injured while rescuing Apollo, who'd recklessly gone to protect Lawrence.

104130501.name: Undertow
104130501.desc: Once they'd returned, Lawrence questioned Helios in front of the townsfolk. The Knights of the Lighthouse captured the Nightsong Robin deckhand Kevode. Finally, Helios and Selene visited Artemis in the infirmary before setting out without her, in the hope that they'd be able to solve the problem of the Nightsong Robin that night.

104130601.name: White Waters: Before
104130601.desc: As they traveled, Kevode provided them with information regarding Argentea Vespera. At the ship's stern, Helios told Apollo the story of Lawrence's daughter Elena's sacrifice many years prior. The crew found the Nightsong Robin, where they witnessed the battleship's crew transform into pure white monsters before their eyes.

104130602.name: White Waters: After
104130602.desc: The strange white monsters continued to assault the crew. As they waged their intense battle on the deck of the ship, back in the village, Artemis was conducting an investigation of her own into the strange Argentea Vespera. Her efforts were interrupted, however, by a chance encounter with Lawrence. As she prepared to continue her search, a siren sounded from the lighthouse.

104130701.name: Enemy Tide: Before
104130701.desc: Hearing the lighthouse siren, the crew out at sea decided to return immediately; however, they were suddenly attacked by underwater tentacles. Back on Krete, the worshipers-turned-Leuko Morphs drove the townsfolk to the lighthouse on Lawrence's orders. Artemis contacted the Knights stationed on the island and went to battle with their attackers.

104130702.name: Enemy Tide: After
104130702.desc: In town, Artemis put herself in harm's way to rescue the townsfolk. Out at sea, Apollo successfully fended off the tentacles, allowing the ship and crew to safely return to within the lighthouse's shield. After fighting the White Tide back, they started their return journey.

104130801.name: Song of the Moon: Before
104130801.desc: The Knights rushed back to town and were greeted by a chaotic scene under the lighthouse. The three of them split up, doing their best to restore order to the town. However, as they did so, the lighthouse was extinguished, and the Nightsong Robin reappeared to open fire on the town. Selene, having joined back up with Artemis, hurried down to the beach and prepared to cast her Kotodama.

104130802.name: Song of the Moon: After
104130802.desc: Artemis held off the White Tide while Selene cast her Kotodama, purifying both the White Tide and the Nightsong Robin. They were out of danger for the time being. Helios contacted them, informing them he was in pursuit of the person who'd stolen the lighthouse's energy crystal. Together, they prepared to give chase, hoping to put a stop to whatever plan was in motion.

104130901.name: A Past Impossible to Break Free of
104130901.desc: As he rushed to protect the lighthouse, Apollo ran into Lawrence, who was absconding with the lighthouse's energy crystal. Apollo followed Lawrence out to sea, where he learned Lawrence intended to use the crystal to resurrect his daughter.

104131001.name: A Sight That Should Never Have Existed in the First Place: Before
104131001.desc: As Lawrence escaped into the sea, Apollo was blocked by a tentacle. Thankfully, the other Modifiers showed up just in time to help him deal with his enemies. The team split up. Most of the Modifiers headed back to protect the island, while Selene made for the depths of the sea to deal with the seal.

104131002.name: A Sight That Should Never Have Existed in the First Place: After
104131002.desc: Lawrence handed the energy crystal off to a stranger, who used the Divine Power of Zeus within to break the underwater seal. On their way to the pathway, the stranger was stopped by Selene, and the two began to fight.

104131101.name: A Face That Should Never Have Reappeared: Before
104131101.desc: On their way back to land, Apollo, Artemis, and Helios were once again attacked by Leuko Morphs. Their second battle with the White Tide had begun.

104131102.name: A Face That Should Never Have Reappeared: After
104131102.desc: Apollo patched up Helios, who'd been injured in the battle. On the ocean floor, the mysterious stranger fled their battle with Selene. When she returned to the ship, the White Tide once again launched an assault, and a massive monster bearing Elena's face surfaced from among the waves.

104131201.name: No Way to Retreat: Before
104131201.desc: The team returned to Krete, where they evacuated the townsfolk. Just as they were heading to the lighthouse to discuss what to do, the White Tide started attacking the docks. The Modifiers had no choice but to enter the fight.

104131202.name: No Way to Retreat: After
104131202.desc: Within the lighthouse, the team discussed how best to take on Lilith. If they did nothing, the entire Sephirah Zone would be assimilated. Artemis and Helios had a disagreement on whether or not to abandon Krete to its fate. In the end, they all decided it'd be best to do some aggressive scouting.

104131301.name: No Way to Advance: Before
104131301.desc: Artemis led the Knights out to sea, while Selene remained behind to defend their rear. Out on the water, they found Lilith closing in on Krete, and the two sides began to wage an intense battle.

104131302.name: No Way to Advance: After
104131302.desc: The ship's cannons couldn't get through Lilith's shield. Just as they were reaching the end of their rope, Helios announced that he'd thought of a plan, and instructed to crew to draw Lilith close to the docks.

104131401.name: In a Shining Manner
104131401.desc: Atop the lighthouse, Helios taught Apollo one final lesson. Burning through all of his Aether Code, he used the unique power of his Access Key to launch a dazzling attack on Lilith.

104131501.name: In the Name of the Lighthouse: Before
104131501.desc: The light from Helios' sword broke Lilith's shield. Down on the deck of the ship, the true final battle with Lilith began.

104131502.name: In the Name of the Lighthouse: After
104131502.desc: Artemis and Apollo worked together to take Lilith out. Selene purified the remnants of the White Tide. The conflict was finally at an end.

104131601.name: Returning and Going
104131601.desc: After these events, Selene decided to remain on Krete to investigate the seal and search for clues about Zeus. Artemis accepted the position of commander of the Knights of the Lighthouse. To find the truth behind what happened, Apollo sought out Odin at Aether Gazer. In the end, he decided to join a squad of Modifiers there for the time being.

104131701.name: Turing's Shadow
104131701.desc: In the Source Layer, Novich urged Turing to join forces with a strange person to open the door to the Eleventh Zone and find the Isolation Hold. Soon after, Turing found Scylla, and sent her to Krete to enter the Eleventh Zone with the Prime Access Key he'd given her.

104131801.name: A Rift in Cooperation
104131801.desc: Scylla arrived on Krete. After observing the mysterious person's actions for a while, she begrudgingly agreed to work with her. While suspicious of each other, the two leaped into action together.

104143001.name: Water Cannon Battle
104143001.desc: They may have gotten the stolen record back, but the Admin and Izanami still couldn't figure out where the third competition was going to be held. While they were taking a break, they ran into the vacationing Zenkibo Tengu and Jinwu, who helped them figure out where the competition was to take place—the water park.

104143101.name: Water Cannon Battle I
104143101.desc: At the water park, the Admin once again ran into the Children of Iron and Bill, the businessman. Tensions were high between the three of them, as they all wanted to win the third competition. After the competition kicked off, the Admin discovered they couldn't use normal water guns to eliminate other contestants. They first had to find a special paint.

104143201.name: Water Cannon Battle II
104143201.desc: The Admin and the others found the warehouse where the paint was being kept. They just needed to solve a riddle to get in.

104143202.name: Water Cannon Battle III
104143202.desc: Just as the Admin and the team were filling their guns with the paint, Anubis came rushing in with a horde of ducks at his heels. He informed them he was investigating a massive, rampaging AGI Mecha before running off again. The team determined to worry about whatever he was talking about after they'd won the third competition.

104143301.name: Water Cannon Battle IV
104143301.desc: During the water gun fight, Bill summoned duck AGI Mechas to assault the other contestants. Facing off against both the people in black and the ducks, the Admin was in danger of being eliminated. However, Izanami swooped in to assist just in the nick of time.

104143302.name: Water Cannon Battle V
104143302.desc: With Izanami's help, the Admin escaped the enemies surrounding them. With a perfect shot, they eliminated Bill. Enraged, Bill called on his giant duck AGI Mecha. Faced with such troubling foes, the Admin decided to see if Anubis had any ideas on how to deal with them.

104143401.name: Water Cannon Battle VI
104143401.desc: Anubis gave the Admin a confiscated AGI Mecha especially made to take on the ducks. They used it to launch their attack.

104143402.name: Water Cannon Battle VII
104143402.desc: The Admin won the third competition and received a duck-shaped eraser as a prize. The host informed the Admin that the grand prize would be revealed at the water park's closing ceremony, when all three treasures had been collected.

104143501.name: Mecha Rumble
104143501.desc: All I wanted was a peaceful vacation.

104143601.name: Mecha Rumble I
104143601.desc: A spear-wielding centaur and machine with a giant sword and wings? C'mon, you're gonna need more than a waistcoat to pull the wool over my eyes!

104143701.name: Mecha Rumble II
104143701.desc:
Ducks incoming! They're everywhere!
Then I guess we have to capture them everywhere, too!

104143702.name: Mecha Rumble III
104143702.desc:
Hey kids, messing around like that will pollute the environment. What if you hurt other kids? Even if you don't, you shouldn't hurt the sea creatures...
Don't interrupt Poseidon's lesson.

104143801.name: Moment of Peace and Love
104143801.desc: Seeing as Senba wants to see the AGI Mechas fight, I guess I should help her out.

104143901.name: Moment of Peace and Love I
104143901.desc: Happiness might come late, but it'll always come.

104144001.name: Moment of Peace and Love II
104144001.desc: Should we go to the Underwater Castle Adventure or Smooth Grooves Jacuzzi? Only kids have to pick—I want both!

104144101.name: Bring on the Buzz
104144101.desc: Having won the third competition, the Admin and Izanami enjoyed the rest of their vacation. The day before the closing ceremony, the park management invited the Admin to bring the treasure they'd collected to the event and open the grand prize. Upon arriving at the stage, the Admin discovered they had to create some buzz before they'd be allowed on stage.

104144201.name: Bring on the Buzz I
104144201.desc: At the closing ceremony, the Admin ran into Skadi, Jinwu, and Zenkibo Tengu, who were all buying souvenirs. When they heard the Admin had to create some buzz, they were all eager to help. Together, they put on a fireworks show in front of the floating concert stage.

104144301.name: Bring on the Buzz II
104144301.desc: The atmosphere is buzzing with excitement. Time to get on stage!

104144401.name: Bring on the Buzz III
104144401.desc: Nope, things aren't exciting enough. Time to try again!

104144501.name: Bring on the Buzz IV
104144501.desc: While once again trying to create buzz, the Admin ran into Selene and Artemis. With the Admin's encouragement, Artemis put on a performance that whipped the crowd into a frenzy.

104144601.name: Bring on the Buzz V
104144601.desc: While still hyping up the crowd, the Admin ran into the Children of Iron in the audience. Both were selected to participate in a prize competition, which ended up being a bizarre trivia. This attracted the attention of the crowd, who were all eager to take part.

104144701.name: Just One More Step
104144701.desc: The Admin and Izanami took the main stage, where they were joined by Bill, who rode in on his yacht. The three presented their treasures, which unlocked the mechanism containing the grand prize.

104144702.name: Just One More Step I
104144702.desc: The grand prize was unveiled to the crowd—a sparkling, golden Easter egg, containing nothing whatsoever. The park owner, Rick, proclaimed that the joy and fun of the competitions were the true grand prize. Bill, furious at not having obtained a valuable relic, summoned a Mecha Centaur to destroy the stage. Anubis threw an AGI Mecha remote control to the Admin, but it was snatched midair by a duck.

104144801.name: Just One More Step II
104144801.desc: The Admin and Izanami wrestled the remote control back out of the duck's bill and summoned the AGI Mecha they'd used before to fight the giant duck to assist them. The two AGI Mechas fought an intense battle in front of the stage.

104144901.name: Just One More Step III
104144901.desc: Bill's Mecha Centaur was defeated, and he was taken into custody by Anubis. After taking care of the troublemakers, the Admin and Izanami enjoyed the closing ceremony with the audience as the true stars of the stage.

104145001.name: Mystery Gift
104145001.desc: Heroes, lend me your ears! In recent days, the park has been thrown into chaos. The ducks... the ducks are everywhere... Please, this is truly, really, indelibly the last time!

104145101.name: Mystery Gift I
104145101.desc: The age of the ducks has ended. See ya never, AGI Mecha ducks.

104145201.name: Mystery Gift II
104145201.desc:
Summertime may come and go, but joy is forever.
I hope the beauty and the happiness we've experienced will stay in our hearts forever.
Hope you also enjoyed the trip!

104150101.name: A Trip to Dai Islands
104150101.desc: Zhiming was invited to attend a meeting on the Dai Islands. However, it was postponed as some of the expert attendees had not yet arrived. Taking the attendant's suggestion, Zhiming planned to use the time to get a handle on the current state of affairs on the Dai Islands.

104150201.name: Emergency Evacuation
104150201.desc:
Zhiming discovered that, although CORG had detected no sign of abnormal Bane Energy, the main island was home to hordes of Visbanes.
After she returned from the main island, Zhiming gave her judgment of the islands' current condition. With the support of Quartz from the Skyworks Directorate, she began organizing an evacuation...

104150301.name: Double Clouds
104150301.desc:
Somewhere on the main island, Zhiming defeated a mist that had mimicked her form, and took part of it back with her as a sample. At the same time, as data from the Dai Islands was approaching limits, CORG initiated a mandatory evacuation.
Zhiming returned to the lab to run tests on the mist sample. What she found stunned her...

104150401.name: Temporary Peace
104150401.desc:
Zhiming fought off the Visbanes and AGI Mechas pouring in from all sides while simultaneously fixing the geostabilizer. Just as the situation was at its most dire, Zhiming finished fixing the geostabilizer and CORG reinforcements arrived.
The situation on the Dai Islands began to stabilize; the Bane Energy reaction on the main island, however, vanished without a trace...

910102011.name: Awakening for The New
910102011.desc:
Jinwu, a Modifier from Xu Heng, was on a tour to gain experience in order to complete a mission from her master Xihe: find someone who can cleanse a Visbane named Nian.
However, she ended up in Ain Soph after being struck unconscious by a Yaoguai and was taken in by Aether Gazer.
For bureaucratic reasons, Jinwu got stranded in Ain Soph and was not able to return to Xu Heng to complete her mission.
After speaking to Jinwu, the Administrator learned that although Nian was sealed inside a doll, she had to apply her power from time to time to keep Nian inside.

910103011.name: New Year Delicacies
910103011.desc:
Mi-Nian, the kitty AI in charge of finance at Aether Gazer, was looking for ways to fund and revive one of Ookuninushi's projects that had been rejected by Shu.
Mi-Nian discovered that while there was a dearth of "exotic" cuisines in Ain Soph, it was also nearly impossible to hire a chef with the right skills due to Gaea's strict regulations on immigration for the Sephirah Zones.
Around the same time, Jinwu, who was on her way out to buy some ingredients to make a Xu Heng dish, learned that Aether Gazer Division Nine was holding a Design Your Own Plaza competition. To get her hands on the giant plushie prize, she decided to sign up for the competition with a proposal based on the famous Xu Heng holiday, New Year's Awakening. However, she was at a loss as to how she would actually present the unique Cloudsong Ore technology of Xu Heng in it.
Mi-Nian and Jinwu, who would run into each other at Aether Gazer from time to time, got on like a house on fire and started working together to study Xu Heng cuisine and design the theme event.
After some back and forth, the new dish was finally approved by the Ain Soph Culinary Arts Association. The special festival canteen "New Year Delicacies" opened its doors to the world, and so was Ookuninushi's new project thus funded.

910104011.name: A Glittering Galaxy
910104011.desc:
Although Jinwu had made some headway with her dish, the same could not be said for the New Year's Awakening themed plaza.
Finally, with help from the Administrator, a viable plan to bring the culture of Xu Heng to Ain Soph was created and approved.
To make the plan even better, Jinwu decided to go ahead and make some fireworks. First, she needed some raw materials...

910105011.name: Awakening of Nian (Pre-battle)
910105011.desc:
After carrying the giant fireworks to the center of the plaza, Jinwu and the Administrator ran into the event manager.
The manager informed them that their plan had received much positive response and that the prize was waiting for Jinwu on the first floor. The two then picked up the prize as well as a New Year's gift from Jinwu's teacher, Xihe. As she opened her box, Jinwu realized that the seal on Nian had come loose, and Nian then escaped and plunged the venue into chaos.
Everyone rushed to Nian's location to try and stop it.

910105012.name: Awakening of Nian (Post-battle)
910105012.desc: Nian was finally defeated and sealed back into the doll after much effort from everyone. Peace restored.
